K10avsata_u:5: somo vaḍikaḥ padmāṅkaḥ pañcālo dhūpa eva ca /
K10avsata_u:6: rājānaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vargo hy eṣa samudditaḥ // AVŚ_1 // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:9: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:10: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:14: tatra bhagavato 'cirābhisaṃbuddhabodher yaśasā ca sarvaloka āpūrṇaḥ //
K10avsata_u:15: atha dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:16: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalas tyāgaruciḥ pradānaruciḥ pradānābhirato mahati tyāgo vartate //
K10avsata_u:17: yāvad asau sarvapāṣaṇḍikaṃ yajñam ārabdho yaṣṭum*,
K10avsata_u:19: yadā bhagavatā rājā bimbisāraḥ saparivāro vinītaḥ,
K10avsata_u:20: tasya ca vinayād bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vinayam upagatāni,
K10avsata_u:21: tadā rājagṛhāt pūrṇasya jñātayo 'bhyāgatya pūrṇasya purastād buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣayituṃ pravṛttā dharmasya saṃghasya ca /
K10avsata_u:22: atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavato guṇasaṃkīrtanaṃ pratiśrutya mahāntaṃ prasādaṃ pratilabdhavān* /
K10avsata_u:23: tataḥ śaraṇam abhiruhya rājagṛhābhimukhaḥ sthitvā ubhau jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣipan*,
K10avsata_u:24: dhūpam udakaṃ ca bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttaḥ:
K10avsata_u:25: āgacchatu bhagavān yajñaṃ me anubhavituṃ yajñavāṭam iti /
K10avsata_u:26: atha tāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvenopari bhagavataḥ puṣpamaṇḍapaṃ kṣiptvā tasthuḥ dhūpo 'bhrakūṭavad udakaṃ vaiḍūryaśalākavat //
K10avsata_u:28: kuta idaṃ bhadanta nimantraṇam āyātam iti /
K10avsata_u:30: dakṣiṇāgiriṣv ānanda janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
K10avsata_u:34: bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛtto dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade cārikāṃ caritvā pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya yajñavāṭasamīpe sthitvā cintām āpede:
K10avsata_u:36: atha bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣusahasram antardhāpya ekaḥ pātracarakavyagrahastaḥ pūrṇasmīpe sthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:37: atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavantaṃ dadarśa dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:40: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritaṃ bhagavataḥ samīpam upasaṃkramya bhagavantam uvāca:
K10avsata_u:45: yadi te parityaktaṃ dīyatām asmin pātra iti /
K10avsata_u:46: atha pūrṇo brāhmamahāśālaḥ pañcamāṇavakaśataparivṛto bhagavato vividhabhakṣyabhojyakhādyalehyapeyacoṣyādibhir āhārair ārabdhaḥ pātraṃ paripūrayitum*
K10avsata_u:47: bhagavān api svakāt pātrād bhikṣupātreṣv āhāraṃ saṃkramayati /
K10avsata_u:48: yadā bhagavato viditaṃ pūrṇāni bhikṣusahasrasya pātrāṇīti,
K10avsata_u:53: tataḥ prātihāryadarśanāt pūrṇaḥ prasādajāto mūlanikṛtta iva drumo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ udagraprītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:54: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā,
K10avsata_u:58: atha bhagavān pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt* /
K10avsata_u:59: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād
K10avsata_u:61: yā adhastād gacchanti tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ
K10avsata_u:62: pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ
K10avsata_u:63: narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
K10avsata_u:67: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
K10avsata_u:70: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,
K10avsata_u:74: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
K10avsata_u:80: nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān
K10avsata_u:81: apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān
K10avsata_u:82: bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ
K10avsata_u:86: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_1.1 //
K10avsata_u:87: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:88: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // AVŚ_1.2 // iti
K10avsata_u:89: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
K10avsata_u:90: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
K10avsata_u:114: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:133: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // AVŚ_1.6 // iti
K10avsata_u:136: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
K10avsata_u:138: anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ
K10avsata_u:139: bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya pūrṇabhadro nāma
K10avsata_u:141: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
K10avsata_u:142: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti //
K10avsata_u:143: yadā bhagavatā pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo 'nuttarāyāṃ smyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtaḥ,
K10avsata_u:144: tadā pūrṇena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghas traimāsyaṃ yajñavāṭe bhojitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:146: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ,
K10avsata_u:147: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:150: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:152: (Speyer 8) buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair
K10avsata_u:153: dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ
K10avsata_u:156: saśrāvakasaṃgho vaiśālīm upaniśritya viharati markaṭahradatīre kūṭāgāraśālāyām* /
K10avsata_u:157: atha pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghpuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
K10avsata_u:158: sāvadānīṃ vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:160: atha siṃhasya senāpateḥ snuṣā yasomatī nama abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā /
K10avsata_u:161: sā bhagavato vicitralakṣaṇojjvalakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā atyarthaṃ prasādaṃ labdhavatī /
K10avsata_u:163: asti kaścid upāyo yenāham apy evaṃguṇayuktā syām iti /
K10avsata_u:167: kuryād anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānam iti viditvoktavān*:
K10avsata_u:169: tvam apy evaṃvidhā bhaviṣyasi yādṛśo bhagavān iti //
K10avsata_u:170: (Speyer 9) tataḥ siṃhena senāpatinā yaśomatyāḥ prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ratnāni ca dattāni /
K10avsata_u:171: tato yaśomatyā dārikayā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
K10avsata_u:174: atha yaśomatī dārikā suvarṇamayāni puṣpāṇi kārayitvā rūpyamayāṇi ratnamayāni prabhūtagandhamālyavilepanasaṃgrahaṃ
K10avsata_u:175: kṛtvā śatarasam āhāraṃ sajjīkṛtya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati:
K10avsata_u:177: sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti /
K10avsata_u:178: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:179: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:180: atha yaśomatī dārikā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śatarasenāhāreṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya puṣpāṇi bhagavati kṣeptum ārabdhā
K10avsata_u:181: atha tāni puṣpāṇi upari bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapa ivāvasthitam*,
K10avsata_u:182: yan na na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*,
K10avsata_u:183: yathāpi tad buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devānubhāvena //
K10avsata_u:184: atha yaśomatī dārikā tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhā:
K10avsata_u:185: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā,
K10avsata_u:189: atha bhagavān yaśomatyā dārikāyā hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
K10avsata_u:190: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād
K10avsata_u:193: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim
K10avsata_u:194: arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā
K10avsata_u:199: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
K10avsata_u:202: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,
K10avsata_u:206: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
K10avsata_u:210: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān
K10avsata_u:211: mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān
K10avsata_u:212: anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān
K10avsata_u:213: devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
K10avsata_u:216: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_2.1 //
K10avsata_u:218: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:219: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // AVŚ_2.2 // iti
K10avsata_u:220: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
K10avsata_u:221: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
K10avsata_u:245: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:263: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // AVŚ_2.6 // iti
K10avsata_u:266: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
K10avsata_u:267: paśyasy ānanda anayā yaśomatyā dārikayā mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:269: eṣā ānanda yaśomatī dārikā anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ
K10avsata_u:271: ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya ratnamatir nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati,
K10avsata_u:272: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
K10avsata_u:273: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittasyābhiprasāda iti //
K10avsata_u:275: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:277: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:278: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:283: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:285: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:286: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
K10avsata_u:287: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:290: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:293: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
K10avsata_u:296: ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
K10avsata_u:297: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:302: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:303: tathā hy asau śramaṇabrāhmaṇanaimittikasuhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavavipralabdho 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma /
K10avsata_u:304: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:305: sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubandhā api devatā āyācate sma /
K10avsata_u:307: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:317: saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
K10avsata_u:318: saced dārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
K10avsata_u:322: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:325: pūrvakāyam atyunnamayya *{abhyunnamayya}* dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati:
K10avsata_u:332: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā kṛtyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
K10avsata_u:333: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
K10avsata_u:335: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
K10avsata_u:337: āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ
K10avsata_u:339: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
K10avsata_u:340: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:344: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:348: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya nanda iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:350: nando dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām*
K10avsata_u:351: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:353: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ paṃcavarṣaḥ ṣaḍvarṣo vā,
K10avsata_u:358: so 'pi me kadācit karhicid devatārādhanayā putro jātaḥ,
K10avsata_u:362: yo nāma svasthaśarīro bhūtvā paśur iva saṃtiṣṭhatīti //
K10avsata_u:364: tena ṣaṭ tīrthikāḥ śāstāraḥ svagṛham āhūtāḥ:
K10avsata_u:365: api nāma ayaṃ dārakas teṣāṃ darśanād gauravajātaḥ śayanāsanād api tāvad uttiṣṭhet* /
K10avsata_u:366: atha kusīdo dārakas tāṃś chāstṝn dṛṣṭvā cakṣuḥsaṃprekṣaṇām api na kṛtavān*,
K10avsata_u:367: kaḥ punar vāda utthāsyati vā abhivādayiṣyati vā,
K10avsata_u:369: atha sa gṛhapatis tām evāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhitaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:370: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
K10avsata_u:371: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:377: trī rātres trir divasasya ca buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
K10avsata_u:378: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ
K10avsata_u:380: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam* /
K10avsata_u:388: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_3.1 //
K10avsata_u:390: ayaṃ dārakaḥ kusīdo maddarśanād vīryam ārapsyate yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ pariṇāmayiṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:391: tato bhagavatā tīrthyānāṃ madadarpacchittyarthaṃ dārakasya ca kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇamarīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
K10avsata_u:395: sa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:396: kasya prabhāvān mama śarīraṃ prahlāditam iti /
K10avsata_u:397: tato bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtas tad gṛhaṃ praviveśa /
K10avsata_u:398: dadarśa kusīdo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣulakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītyā
K10avsata_u:401: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paraṃ prasādam āpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:402: sahasā svayam evotthāya bhagavato 'rthe āsanaṃ prajñapayati /
K10avsata_u:406: athāsya mātāpitarāv antarjanaś cādṛṣṭapūrvaprabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ vismayam āpannāḥ //
K10avsata_u:407: tataḥ kusīdo dārako harṣavikasitābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:416: mahān batāyaṃ vīryārambhe viśeṣo yanv ahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā vīryam ārabheyeti /
K10avsata_u:417: sa śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāv avaghoṣaṇaṃ sārthavāham ātmānam udghoṣya ṣaḍvārān mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:418: tataḥ siddhayānapātreṇa mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān antarniveśane saśrāvakasaṃgho bhojitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:420: atha bhagavān kusīdasya dārakasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
K10avsata_u:421: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād
K10avsata_u:425: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim
K10avsata_u:426: arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā
K10avsata_u:431: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
K10avsata_u:434: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,
K10avsata_u:438: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti
K10avsata_u:440: tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino
K10avsata_u:441: brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān
K10avsata_u:442: apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān
K10avsata_u:443: sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
K10avsata_u:446: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_3.1 //
K10avsata_u:447: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:448: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // AVŚ_3.2 // iti
K10avsata_u:449: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
K10avsata_u:450: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
K10avsata_u:474: atha ca tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:493: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // AVŚ_3.6 // iti
K10avsata_u:496: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
K10avsata_u:497: paśyasy ānanda anena kusīdena dārakeṇa mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:499: eṣa ānanda kuśido dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca
K10avsata_u:502: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
K10avsata_u:503: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti //
K10avsata_u:505: āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:508: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:509: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:513: śrāvastyām anyatamo mahāsārthavāho mahāsamudrād bhagnayānapātra āgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:514: sa dvir api trir api svadevatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇo bhagnayānapātra evāgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:517: ko me upāyaḥ svādyena dhanārjanaṃ kuryām iti /
K10avsata_u:519: ayaṃ buddho bhagavān sarvadevaprativiśiṣṭataraḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahādharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ,
K10avsata_u:520: yanv aham idānīm asya nāmnā punar api mahāsamudram avatareyam* /
K10avsata_u:521: siddhayānapātras tv āgaccheyaṃ ced upārdhena dhanenāsya pūjāṃ kuryām iti //
K10avsata_u:523: sa evaṃ kṛtavyavasāyaḥ punar api mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:524: buddhānubhāvena ca ratnadvīpaṃ saṃprāpya mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā kuśalasvastinā svagṛham anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:525: sa mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya bhāṇḍaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:526: tasya nānāvicitrāṇi ratnāni dṛṣṭvā mahāṃllābha utpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:528: mayā īdṛśānāṃ ratnānāṃ śramaṇasya gautamasya upārdhaṃ dātavyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10avsata_u:529: yanv aham etāni svasyāḥ patnyā āyaḥ /
K10avsata_u:530: tena kārṣāpaṇadvayena vikrīya bhagavato gandhaṃ dadyām iti /
K10avsata_u:533: atha bahagavāṃs tad rūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yena sa dhūpa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya sarvāṃ ca śrāvastīṃ sphuritvā mahadabhrakūṭavad avasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:534: tasya tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasāda utpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:536: naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnair nābhyarcayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:537: atha tena sārthavāhena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho 'ntarniveśane bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
K10avsata_u:539: tatas tāni ratnāni upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya mūrdhni bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapaś cāvasthitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:540: yan na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*,
K10avsata_u:541: yathāpi tad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena //
K10avsata_u:542: atha sārthavāho dviguṇajātaprasādas tatpratihāryadarśanān mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:543: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
K10avsata_u:547: atha bhagavāṃs tasya sārthavāhasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāviṣkārṣīt /
K10avsata_u:548: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād
K10avsata_u:551: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim
K10avsata_u:552: arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā
K10avsata_u:557: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
K10avsata_u:560: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ /
K10avsata_u:563: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
K10avsata_u:567: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ
K10avsata_u:569: parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān
K10avsata_u:570: puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā
K10avsata_u:574: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_4.1 //
K10avsata_u:575: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:576: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // AVŚ_4.2 // iti
K10avsata_u:577: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
K10avsata_u:578: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
K10avsata_u:602: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:621: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // AVŚ_4.6 // iti
K10avsata_u:624: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
K10avsata_u:625: paśyasy ānanda anena sārthavāhena mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:627: eṣa ānanda sārthavāho 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ
K10avsata_u:628: bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya ratnottamo nāma
K10avsata_u:630: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
K10avsata_u:631: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittasyābhiprasādaḥ //
K10avsata_u:633: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:636: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:637: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:641: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatiḥ śreṣṭhī prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī
K10avsata_u:643: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:644: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ gṛhapateḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:647: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā vaḍika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtavān pitā /
K10avsata_u:648: vaḍiko dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattaḥ aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:649: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:651: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ pañcavarṣo ṣaḍvarṣo vā,
K10avsata_u:652: tadā gurau bhaktiṃ kṛtvā sarvaśāstrāṇi adhītāni /
K10avsata_u:654: tad anantaraṃ tasya vaḍikasya kiṃcit pūrvajanmakṛtakarmavipākena śarīre kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ patitam iti duḥkhī bhūtaś cintāparaḥ sthitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:656: yad idaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ mama śarīre jātam* /
K10avsata_u:657: tasya pitāpi putrasyedaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahadudvignaḥ putrātyayaśaṅkhayā
K10avsata_u:658: dīnamānasaḥ śokāśruvyāptavadanas tvaritaṃ vaidyam āhūya tasya putrasya rogaṃ darśayati: ko rogaḥ,
K10avsata_u:660: kena hetunā mama putrasya dehe jāta iti /
K10avsata_u:661: tataḥ sa vaidyas tasya rogacihnaṃ dṛṣṭvā cikitsāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:664: pitā putrasya rogaṃ vṛddhaṃ jātaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśyaṃ putro mariṣyati,
K10avsata_u:665: yad vaidyenāpi cāsya rogasya cikitsituṃ na śakyate,
K10avsata_u:667: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo 'pi putrasya cintā jātā /
K10avsata_u:669: sa dārako rogī bhūto 'śakyo 'pi vadituṃ kathaṃcit pitaraṃ babhāṣe:
K10avsata_u:672: mamātyayāśaṅkayā mā bhūs tvam api mādṛśaḥ /
K10avsata_u:673: mama nāmnā devānāṃ pūjāṃ kuru, dānaṃ dehi /
K10avsata_u:675: sa gṛhapatir iti putrasya vaca ākarṇya sarvadevebhyaḥ pūjāṃ kṛtavān* /
K10avsata_u:682: tatas tathāgataguṇān anusmṛtya buddhaṃ namaskāraṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:683: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
K10avsata_u:684: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:691: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ
K10avsata_u:693: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam* /
K10avsata_u:701: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_6.1 //
K10avsata_u:702: tato bhagavatā vaḍikasya gṛhapateḥ putrasya tām avasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcayaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ,
K10avsata_u:712: atha bhagavān praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:721: aho bata śakro devendro gandhamādanāt parvatāt kṣīrikām oṣadhīm ānayed iti /
K10avsata_u:722: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devendro gandhamādanāt parvatāt kṣīrikām oṣadhīm ānīya bhagavate dattavān* /
K10avsata_u:723: bhagavatā ca svapāṇinā gṛhītvā vaḍikāya dattā:
K10avsata_u:725: sa kāyikaṃ prasrabdhisukhaṃ labdhvā bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsa /
K10avsata_u:726: prasannacittaś ca rājñaḥ prasenajito nivedya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā śatasahasreṇa vastreṇācchadya sarvapuṣpamālyair abhyarcitavān*
K10avsata_u:729: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena yathaivāhaṃ bhagavatā anuttareṇa vaidyarājena cikitsitaḥ,

K10avsata_u:1260: rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhīto bhagnaḥ parājitaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛta ekarathena śrāvastīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /

K10avsata_u:1265: tena śrutaṃ yathā rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhagnaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ,

K10avsata_u:1268: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā ca (Speyer: uvāca)
K10avsata_u:1271: yena devaḥ punar api yatheṣṭapracāraṇaṃ kariṣyatīti /

K10avsata_u:1431: atha nāvikā nadyā ajiravatyās tīram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpayāmāsur ucchritacchatradhvajapatākaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ gandhaghaṭikāvadhūpitam*
K10avsata_u:1433: prabhūtaṃ ca puṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā nausaṃkramaṃ puṣpamaṇḍapair alaṃkārayāmāsuḥ /

K10avsata_u:1438: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat* /

K10avsata_u:1441: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcatarāṇy āsanāni gṛhītvā
K10avsata_u:1443: atha bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ nāvikānām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
K10avsata_u:1444: yāṃ śrutvā anekair nāvikaiḥ srotaāpattiphalāni prāptāni,
K10avsata_u:1450: sarvā ca sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā /

K10avsata_u:1456: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni,
K10avsata_u:1461: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:1462: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani bhāgīratho nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato
K10avsata_u:1463: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10avsata_u:1465: sa dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto janapadacārikāṃ caran gaṅgātīram anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:1466: tasmin samaye 'nyataraḥ sārthavāho 'nekaśataparivāro nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ sārtham uttārayati /
K10avsata_u:1468: atha dadarśa sārthavāho bhāgīrathaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:1473: tatas tena sārthavāhena bhāgīrathaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto mahatyā vibhūtyā nausaṃkrameṇottāritaḥ /
K10avsata_u:1474: praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam* //
K10avsata_u:1476: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāho babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ /
K10avsata_u:1481: tasya me karmaṇo vipākenānantasaṃsāre mahatsukham anubhūtam* /
K10avsata_u:1482: idānīm apy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaivavidhā pūjā /

K10avsata_u:2039: yac chravaṇād rājā prasenajid anyatamaś ca mahājanakāyaḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2040: tato bhagavān api vaiḍūryadaṇḍāṃ vīṇām āśrāvitavān*:
K10avsata_u:2041: yata ekaikasyāṃ tantryām aneke svaraviśeṣā mūrcchanāś ca bahuprakārā darśitāḥ,
K10avsata_u:2046: yac chravaṇād āvarjitaḥ supriyo gandharvarājo vīṇāṃ gandhakuṭyāṃ niryātya bhagavatsakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2047: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā
K10avsata_u:2050: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2051: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:2052: tata āvarjitā devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā bhhagavacchāsane rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
K10avsata_u:2053: pañcānām api gāndharvikaśatānāṃ prītisaumanasyajātānām etad abhavat*:
K10avsata_u:2054: vayaṃ nīce karmaṇi vartāmahe kṛcchravṛttayaś ca /
K10avsata_u:2055: yan nu vayaṃ rājānaṃ vijñāpya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ nagarapraveśenopanimantrayemahīti /
K10avsata_u:2056: yāvat tair gāndharvikair labdhānujñair bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2057: adhivāsitaṃ ca bhagavatā teṣāṃ gāndharvikāṇāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena /
K10avsata_u:2058: tatas tair gāndharvikair rājāmātyapaurajānapadasahāyaiḥ sarvā śrāvastī nagarī apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallā
K10avsata_u:2060: te ca gāndharvikāḥ svayam eva vīṇām ādāya mṛdaṅgaveṇupaṇavādiviśeṣair upasthānaṃ cakruḥ,
K10avsata_u:2063: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
K10avsata_u:2064: tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
K10avsata_u:2067: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim
K10avsata_u:2068: arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā
K10avsata_u:2073: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
K10avsata_u:2077: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
K10avsata_u:2081: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
K10avsata_u:2085: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān
K10avsata_u:2086: mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān
K10avsata_u:2087: anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān
K10avsata_u:2088: devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
K10avsata_u:2091: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_17.2 //
K10avsata_u:2092: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:2095: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
K10avsata_u:2096: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
K10avsata_u:2120: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:2138: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // AVŚ_17.7 // iti
K10avsata_u:2141: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
K10avsata_u:2142: paśyasy ānanda ebhir gāndharvikair mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:2144: ete ānanda gāndharvikāḥ anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca
K10avsata_u:2145: yathākālānugatāṃ pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya anāgate 'dhvani varṇasvarā nāma pratyekabuddhā
K10avsata_u:2147: ayam eṣāṃ deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti //
K10avsata_u:2149: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:2150: kāni bhadanta bhagavatā kuśalamūlāni kṛtāni yeṣām ayam anubhāva iti /
K10avsata_u:2152: tathāgatenaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:2155: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:2159: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
K10avsata_u:2162: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_17.1 //
K10avsata_u:2163: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani prabodhano nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato
K10avsata_u:2164: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10avsata_u:2166: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2168: atha sa bhagavāṃs tad udyānaṃ praviśya rājānugrahārtham anyatamaṃ vṛkṣam upaniśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2170: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ strīmayena tūryeṇa vādyamānenodyānaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2171: atha sa rājā tad udyānam anuvicaran dadarśa bhagavantaṃ prabodhanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ
K10avsata_u:2172: prāsādikaṃ prasādanīyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa cittadamavyupaśamena samanvāgataṃ suvarṇayūpam
K10avsata_u:2174: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasādajātaḥ sa rājā sāntaḥpuro vividhena vādyena vādyamānena bhagavantaṃ tataḥ samādheḥ prabodhayāmāsa,
K10avsata_u:2177: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ /
K10avsata_u:2178: yan mayā prabodhanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:2179: tenaiva hetunā idānīṃ mama gāndharvikair evaṃvidhaṃ satkāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2181: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2182: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2185: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:2187: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:2188: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:2192: atha śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ pāradāriko maline karmaṇi vartate /
K10avsata_u:2195: tato rājñā aparādhika iti kṛtvā vadhya utsṛṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2196: sa rājapuruṣair nīlāmbaravasanair udyataśastraiḥ karavīramālābaddhakaṇṭheguṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvyamāṇo dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa apanīyate //
K10avsata_u:2197: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
K10avsata_u:2198: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:2205: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
K10avsata_u:2206: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:2214: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_18.1 //
K10avsata_u:2215: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K10avsata_u:2216: dadarśa sa puruṣo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:2219: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:2226: athāyuṣmān ānando yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2227: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavadvacanenovāca: anujānīhi,
K10avsata_u:2231: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:2234: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2235: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:2236: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:2237: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā sarvaṃ cintitamātraṃ samṛdhyatīti /
K10avsata_u:2241: jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
K10avsata_u:2244: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:2248: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
K10avsata_u:2251: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_18.1 //
K10avsata_u:2252: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani indradhvajo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
K10avsata_u:2253: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10avsata_u:2255: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2257: athendradhvajaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya tāṃ rājadhānīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K10avsata_u:2258: adrākṣīt sa brāhmaṇa indradhvajaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
K10avsata_u:2259: samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ
K10avsata_u:2261: dṛṣṭvā ca punar mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatyovāca:
K10avsata_u:2264: atha bhagavān indradhvajaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tasyānugrahārtham agrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2265: agrāsane niṣaṇṇaś cendradhvajaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tena brāhmaṇena padaśatena stutaḥ,
K10avsata_u:2269: tat kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena brāhmaṇo babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ /
K10avsata_u:2270: yan me indradhvajasya tathāgatasya pūjā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:2271: taddhaitukaṃ ca me saṃsāre anantaṃ sukham anubhūtam* /
K10avsata_u:2276: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2277: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2280: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:2283: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:2284: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:2287: rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
K10avsata_u:2289: tadā tena kṛtapratyupakārasaṃdarśanārthaṃ buddhapūjāsaṃvartanārthaṃ gṛhavistarasaṃdarśanārthaṃ buddhotpādabahumānasaṃjananārthaṃ ca bhagavān
K10avsata_u:2294: sarvaṃ ca rājagṛhaṃ nagaram apagatapāṣāṇasarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpayitavyam*,
K10avsata_u:2295: nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇam ucchritadhvajapatākaṃ yāvac ca veṇuvanaṃ yāvac ca rājagṛham*,
K10avsata_u:2296: atrāntarā sarvo mārgo vicitrair vastrāir ācchādayitavya iti /
K10avsata_u:2298: tato rājā bimbisāraḥ svayam eva bhagavato mūrdhni śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dhārayati,
K10avsata_u:2300: atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta
K10avsata_u:2301: āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhann arhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
K10avsata_u:2302: prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
K10avsata_u:2303: siṃha iva daṃṣṭrigaṇaparivṛto haṃsa iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛto suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto
K10avsata_u:2304: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ svaśva iva turagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto
K10avsata_u:2305: deśika ivādhvagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ
K10avsata_u:2306: koṭṭarāja iva mantrigaṇaparivṛtaś cakravartīva putrasahasraparivṛtaś candra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
K10avsata_u:2307: sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto virūḍha iva
K10avsata_u:2308: kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto
K10avsata_u:2309: vemacitrīvāsuragaṇaparivṛtaḥ śakra iva tridaśagaṇaparivṛto brahmā iva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ
K10avsata_u:2310: stimita iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntair indriyair
K10avsata_u:2311: asaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro 'nekair āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ parivṛto bhagavāṃs tat puraṃ praviśati //
K10avsata_u:2312: yadā ca bhagavatā indrakīle pādo nyastaḥ,
K10avsata_u:2314: bhagavataḥ purapraveśe evaṃrūpāṇy adbhutāni bhavanty anyāni ca /
K10avsata_u:2316: hastinaḥ krośanti aśvāś ca heṣante ṛṣabhā nardante gṛhagatāni vividhavādyabhāṇḍāni svayaṃ nadanti,
K10avsata_u:2326: āntarikṣāś ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā divyaṃ puṣpam utsṛjanti //
K10avsata_u:2327: atha bhagavān evaṃvidhayā vibhūtyā rājakulaṃ praveṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2328: rājā ca bimbisāraḥ svayam eva bahirdvāraśālastho gośirṣacandanodakena pādyaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ pādau bhikṣusaṃghasya ca prākṣalayati /
K10avsata_u:2329: sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śatarasenāhāreṇa pratipādayāmāsa /
K10avsata_u:2332: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:2334: yato bhagavata evaṃvidhā pūjā bhikṣusaṃghasya ceti /

K10avsata_u:2340: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,

K10avsata_u:2349: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10avsata_u:2351: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2353: kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann asmākaṃ rājadhānīm anuprāpta iti /
K10avsata_u:2354: śrutvā ca mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:2356: upasaṃkramya kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2357: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktam kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati /
K10avsata_u:2358: atha sa rājā labdhaprasādaḥ kṣemaṃkaraṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ rājakule nimantrya śatarasenāhāreṇa pratipādayāmāsa /
K10avsata_u:2360: parinirvṛtasya ca samantayojanaṃ stūpaṃ kāritavān krośam uccatvena //
K10avsata_u:2361: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ /

K10avsata_u:2364: idānīṃ tenaiva hetunā rājā bimbisāreṇāpi tathāgatasya me evaṃvidhā pūjā kṛtā /

K10avsata_u:2381: sa āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanenāvarjitaḥ śāsane ca avatārito bhagavaty atyartham abhiprasannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2386: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasya gṛhapates tūṣṇībhāvena,
K10avsata_u:2387: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas taṃ gṛhapatim ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
K10avsata_u:2388: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2389: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam idam avocat:
K10avsata_u:2390: ayaṃ bhadanta gṛhapatir ākāṅkṣati bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitum* /
K10avsata_u:2391: tad asya bhagavān adhivāsayed anukampām upādāyeti /
K10avsata_u:2393: atha sa gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā śatarasam āhāraṃ samudānayati,
K10avsata_u:2397: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa veṇuvanaṃ nandavanam abhinirmitam*,
K10avsata_u:2401: cānekāni gandharvasahasrāṇy upanītāni ye vicitrair vādyaviśeṣair vādyaṃ kurvanti,
K10avsata_u:2403: tataḥ sa gṛhapatir divyamānuṣair upakaraṇair bhagavantam upasthāya sarvāṅgeṇa bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇīdhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:2404: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
K10avsata_u:2408: atha bhagavāṃs tasya gṛhapater hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
K10avsata_u:2409: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād
K10avsata_u:2412: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim
K10avsata_u:2413: arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā
K10avsata_u:2418: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
K10avsata_u:2421: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ /
K10avsata_u:2424: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
K10avsata_u:2430: brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ
K10avsata_u:2431: śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān
K10avsata_u:2432: akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
K10avsata_u:2435: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_20.1 //
K10avsata_u:2436: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:2437: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // AVŚ_20.2 // iti
K10avsata_u:2438: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
K10avsata_u:2439: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
K10avsata_u:2463: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:2482: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // AVŚ_20.6 // iti
K10avsata_u:2485: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
K10avsata_u:2486: paśyasy ānanda anena gṛhapatinā mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:2488: eṣa ānanda gṛhapatir anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ
K10avsata_u:2489: bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya divyānnado nāma
K10avsata_u:2490: samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ
K10avsata_u:2492: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2493: etac ca prakaraṇaṃ rājā bimbisāro māgadhakāś ca paricārakāḥ śrutvā paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ //
K10avsata_u:2494: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:2495: paśya bhagavan yāvad anena gṛhapatinā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho divyamānuṣībhir ṛddhibhir abhyarcita iti //
K10avsata_u:2497: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:2500: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:2504: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;

K10avsata_u:2517: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ pūrṇaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair upanimantritavān* /
K10avsata_u:2518: adhivāsitaṃ ca pūrṇena samyaksaṃbuddhena rājñas tūṣṇībhāvena /
K10avsata_u:2519: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ pūrṇasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ
K10avsata_u:2525: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ /
K10avsata_u:2526: yan mayā pūrṇasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tādṛśī pūjā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:2528: tenaiva ca hetunā tathāgatasya ca me śreṣṭhinā śakreṇa ca īdṛśī pūjā kṛtā /
K10avsata_u:2530: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2531: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /

K10avsata_u:2538: candano hy atha padmaś ca cakraṃ daśaśirās tathā /
K10avsata_u:2540: nirmalo valgusvaraś ca vargo bhavati sattamaḥ // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:2542: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:2543: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:2546: magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gaṅgātīram anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2547: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgātīrasya nātidūre stūpam avarugṇaṃ vātātapābhyāṃ pariśīrṇam* /
K10avsata_u:2548: bhikṣubhir dṛṣṭvā bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kasya bhagavann ayaṃ stūpa iti /
K10avsata_u:2552: kuto bhagavaṃś candanasya pratyekabuddhasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ceti /
K10avsata_u:2554: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrotuṃ yathā candanasya pratyekabuddhasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ca?
K10avsata_u:2557: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:2558: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ
K10avsata_u:2559: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:2562: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate tadyathā:
K10avsata_u:2563: ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:2564: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate /
K10avsata_u:2565: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:2567: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2568: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:2573: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:2577: tad divase divase vardhate na tu phullati /
K10avsata_u:2579: rajñā uktaḥ parīkṣyatām etat padmam iti /
K10avsata_u:2580: yāvad apareṇa samayena sūryodaye tat padmaṃ vikasitam* /
K10avsata_u:2581: tasya ca padmasya karṇikāyāṃ dārakaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:2584: prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ uccaghoṣaḥ
K10avsata_u:2585: saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātro 'śītyānuvyañjanair virājitagātraḥ /
K10avsata_u:2586: tasya mukhāt padmagandho vāti śarīrāc ca candanagandhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2588: tato rājā sāmātyaḥ sāntaḥpuraś ca tad udyānaṃ gataḥ /
K10avsata_u:2589: sahadarśanāt tena dārakeṇa rājā saṃbhāṣitaḥ: ehi tāta,
K10avsata_u:2593: tato rājā padminīm avagāhya taṃ dārakaṃ padmakarṇikāyāṃ gṛhītvā pāṇitale sthāpitavān* /
K10avsata_u:2594: yatra yatra sa dārakaḥ pādau sthāpayati,
K10avsata_u:2596: tatas tasya candana iti nāma kṛtam* //
K10avsata_u:2600: tad arhati devaś candanaṃ kumāram utsraṣṭam* (Speyer: utsraṣṭum)/
K10avsata_u:2604: tataś candanaḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣito 'mātyaputraparivṛto vividhair vādyair vādyamānai rājakulād bahir upayāti nagaraparva pratyanubhavitum*
K10avsata_u:2605: tatra tasya gacchataḥ padavinyāse padavinyāse padmāni prādurbhavanti darśanīyāni manoramāṇi ca /
K10avsata_u:2607: atha tasya śuddhasatvasya kalyāṇāśayasya pūrvabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlasya taddarśanād yoniśo manasikāra utpannaḥ:
K10avsata_u:2611: tasyaivaṃ cintayatas tulayata uparīkṣamāṇasya saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyadharmā abhimukhībhūtāḥ /
K10avsata_u:2612: te tasyaiva janakāyasya madhye sthitena pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā /
K10avsata_u:2613: yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikair devais tasmai kāṣāyāṇy upanāmitāni /
K10avsata_u:2616: yaddarśanād rājñāmātyanaigamasahāyena mahān prasādaḥ pratilabdho vicitrāṇi ca kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni /
K10avsata_u:2620: kāni bhadanta candanena pratyekabuddhena karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāsya śarīraṃ sugandhi tīkṣṇendriyaś ceti /
K10avsata_u:2627: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2628: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /

K10avsata_u:2641: anyatamā ca strī dārakaṃ svabhujābhyām ādāya vīthīm avatīrṇā /
K10avsata_u:2642: dadarśa ca sa dārako buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:2645: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasādajātaḥ sahasā bāhum abhiprasārya ārāmikasakāśāt padmaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavato mūrdhni prakṣiptavān* /

K10avsata_u:2735: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ /

K10avsata_u:2755: tatas tasyāḥ svāmī svastikṣemābhyāṃ mahāsamudrād aśu pratyāgataḥ /

K10avsata_u:2760: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:2767: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /

K10avsata_u:2812: anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān
K10avsata_u:2813: devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,

K10avsata_u:2895: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ
K10avsata_u:2896: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:2900: sa ca rājā aputraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
K10avsata_u:2901: tadyathā: ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:2902: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate /
K10avsata_u:2904: tasya codyāne nahatī padminī utpalapadmakumudapadmapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā haṃsacakravākakāraṇḍavādiśakunopaśobhitā nalinī /
K10avsata_u:2906: tad divase divase vardhate na tu phullati /
K10avsata_u:2910: yāvad apareṇa samayena sūryodaye tat padmaṃ vikasitam* /
K10avsata_u:2911: tasya padmasya karṇikāyāṃ dārakaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:2912: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa
K10avsata_u:2913: uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛto 'śītyānuvyañjanair virājitagātraḥ /
K10avsata_u:2915: śrutvā rājā sāmātyaḥ sāntaḥpuraś ca tad udyānaṃ gataḥ /
K10avsata_u:2917: dṛṣṭvā ca punar hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajātaḥ padminīm avagāhya
K10avsata_u:2918: taṃ gṛhītvā mahatā satkāreṇa svagṛham ānīya śramaṇabrāhmaṇanaimittikānāṃ nivedya
K10avsata_u:2919: trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatiṃ divasān jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā daśaśirā iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtavān* //
K10avsata_u:2920: daśaśirā dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:2921: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cott{aptott}aptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:2923: sa ca kumāraḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2924: sa paśyati pitaraṃ rājadharme sthitaṃ sāvadyam avadyāni karmāṇi kurvāṇam* /
K10avsata_u:2925: dṛṣṭvā ca kumāraḥ saṃvignaḥ pitaraṃ vijñāpayāmāsa:
K10avsata_u:2928: yāvat pitrānujñātaḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2929: tena vinopadeśena saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān āmukhīkṛtya pratyekā bodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā /
K10avsata_u:2930: sa gaganatalam utpatya pituḥ sakāśe vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi cakāra /
K10avsata_u:2932: sa śarīrabhārodvahanaparikhinno vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśayitvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirvṛtim upajagāma /
K10avsata_u:2934: atha bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:2939: daśaśirasaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
K10avsata_u:2940: daśaśirasā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
K10avsata_u:2941: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:2945: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
K10avsata_u:2949: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_24.1 //

K10avsata_u:2951: udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
K10avsata_u:2954: atha vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat*
K10avsata_u:2955: anyataraś ca sārthavāhaḥ padmam ādāya vīthīṃ pratipannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2956: athāsau paśyati vipaśyinaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:2959: sahadarśanād bhagavata upari tat padmaṃ cikṣepa /
K10avsata_u:2960: tat kṣiptamātraṃ bhagavata upari śakaṭacakramātraṃ bhūtvā bhagavantaṃ gacchantam upagacchati,
K10avsata_u:2962: yāvad vipaśyinā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa sārthavāhaḥ pratyekabodhau vyākṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:2964: prajāpatī cāsya tena kālena prajāyamānā sasvaraṃ kranditavatī /
K10avsata_u:2968: tataḥ sārthavāhaḥ saṃvignaḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:2969: mā kadācit saṃsāre mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyeyam iti //

K10avsata_u:2999: sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti /

K10avsata_u:3002: atha sa gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaviṣṭaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītenāhāreṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati /

K10avsata_u:3004: atha bhagavān gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati /
K10avsata_u:3005: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya tūṣṇīṃbhūtaḥ /

K10avsata_u:3525: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān
K10avsata_u:3526: mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān
K10avsata_u:3527: anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān
K10avsata_u:3528: devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
K10avsata_u:3531: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_29.1 //
K10avsata_u:3532: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:3534: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
K10avsata_u:3535: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
K10avsata_u:3559: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:3578: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // AVŚ_29.6 // iti
K10avsata_u:3581: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
K10avsata_u:3582: paśyasy ānanda anenārāmikeṇa mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:3584: eṣa ānanda ārāmiko 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trayodaśa kalpān vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati,
K10avsata_u:3585: paścime bhave paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe nirmalo nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati /
K10avsata_u:3586: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti /
K10avsata_u:3588: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3589: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3592: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:3595: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:3596: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:3600: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K10avsata_u:3601: saṃbahulāś ca goṣṭhikā madyamadākṣiptā vīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavair vividhair vādyair vādyamānair
K10avsata_u:3605: dadṛśus te goṣṭhikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ
K10avsata_u:3608: sahadarśanāc ca teṣāṃ yo 'sau madyamadaḥ sa prativigataḥ /
K10avsata_u:3609: tato vigatamadyamadāḥ prasādāvarjitamanaso nṛtyagītavādyair bhagavataḥ upasthānaṃ cakruḥ,
K10avsata_u:3611: nikṣiptāni copari bhagavato nīlakūṭāgāro nīlacchatraṃ nīlamaṇḍapa ivāvasthitāni /
K10avsata_u:3616: atha the goṣṭhikā labdhaprasādāḥ cetanāṃ puṣṇānti:
K10avsata_u:3617: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkūryāmeti //
K10avsata_u:3619: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
K10avsata_u:3620: tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
K10avsata_u:3623: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim
K10avsata_u:3624: arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā
K10avsata_u:3629: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
K10avsata_u:3633: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
K10avsata_u:3637: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
K10avsata_u:3641: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān
K10avsata_u:3642: mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān
K10avsata_u:3643: anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān
K10avsata_u:3644: devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
K10avsata_u:3647: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_30.1 //
K10avsata_u:3648: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:3650: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
K10avsata_u:3651: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
K10avsata_u:3676: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:3694: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // AVŚ_30.6 // iti
K10avsata_u:3697: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
K10avsata_u:3698: paśyasy ānanda ebhir goṣṭhikair mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:3700: ete ānanda goṣṭhikā anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca viṃśatyantarakalpān vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyanti,
K10avsata_u:3701: paścime bhave paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe valgusvarā nāma pratyekabuddhā bhaviṣyanti /
K10avsata_u:3702: ayam eṣāṃ deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti /
K10avsata_u:3707: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:3711: padmakaḥ kavaḍaś caiva dharmapālaḥ śibis tathā /
K10avsata_u:3713: anāthapiṇḍaḥ subhadraś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:3715: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:3716: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:3720: śaratkālasamaye bhikṣavo rogeṇa bādhyante pītapāṇḍukāḥ kṛśaśarīrā durbalāṅgāḥ /
K10avsata_u:3723: paśya bhadanta ete bhikṣavaḥ śāradikena rogeṇa bādhyante,
K10avsata_u:3728: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:3731: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:3735: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
K10avsata_u:3736: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
K10avsata_u:3738: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_31.1 //
K10avsata_u:3739: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ padmako nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati
K10avsata_u:3740: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:3744: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahatī tyāge vartate /
K10avsata_u:3745: tasmiṃś ca samaye vārāṇasyāṃ kālavaiṣamyād dhātuvaiṣamyād vā vyādhir utapannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3747: tato rājñā tān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇikam utpāditam:
K10avsata_u:3748: mayā hy eṣāṃ paritrāṇaṃ karaṇīyaṃ cikitsā ceti /
K10avsata_u:3749: tataḥ sa rājā sarvaviṣayanivāsino vaidyān saṃnipātya teṣāṃ satvānāṃ nidānam āśayānuśayaṃ copalakṣya
K10avsata_u:3751: svayam ārabdhaś cikitsāṃ sarvauṣadhasamudānayaṃ ca kartum* /
K10avsata_u:3752: tataś cikitsyamānānāṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ bahavaḥ kālā atikrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:3753: na ca śakyante vaidyadravyauṣadhaparicārakasaṃpannā api cikitsitum* /
K10avsata_u:3754: tato rājñā sarvavaidyān āhūya ādarajātena punaḥ pṛṣṭāḥ:
K10avsata_u:3755: ko 'tra hetur na me duścikitsyā iti /
K10avsata_u:3758: api tu deva asty ekabhaiṣajyaṃ rohito nāma matsyaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3761: tato rājā rohitaṃ matsyaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3762: sa bahubhir api cārapuruṣair mṛgyamāṇo na labhyate /
K10avsata_u:3764: atha rājā apareṇa samayena bahiryāṇāya nirgacchati /
K10avsata_u:3765: te ca vyādhina ekasamūhena sthitvā rājānam ūcuḥ:
K10avsata_u:3768: tato rājā karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānas tadāturavacanaṃ śrutvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ sāśrudurdinavadanaṃ cintayāmāsa:
K10avsata_u:3769: kiṃ mamānenaivaṃvidhena jīvitena rājyaiśvaryādhipatyena vā īdṛśena,
K10avsata_u:3770: yo 'haṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhārtānāṃ na śakto 'smi śāntiṃ kartum iti /
K10avsata_u:3771: evaṃ vicintya rājā mahāntam arthotsargaṃ kṛtvā jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājyaiṣvaryādhipatyeṣu
K10avsata_u:3772: pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṃ kṣamayitvā paurāmātyāṃś ca kṣamayitvā dīnān samāśvāsya aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ
K10avsata_u:3773: vrataṃ samādāya upariprāsādatalam abhiruhya dhūpapuṣpagandhamālyavilepanaṃ ca kṣiptvā
K10avsata_u:3775: yena satyena satyavacanena mahāvyasanagatān satvān vyādhiparipīḍitān dṛṣṭvā svajīvitam iṣṭaṃ parityajāmi /
K10avsata_u:3776: anena satyena satyavākyena asyāṃ vālukāyāṃ nadyāṃ mahān rohitamatsyaḥ prādurbhaveyam* /
K10avsata_u:3778: sa patitamātraḥ kālagato nadyāṃ vālukāyāṃ mahān rohitamatsyaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3780: eṣa dīrghakālamahāvyādhyutpīḍitānām amṛtakalpo nadyāṃ vālukāyāṃ mahān rohitamatsya prādurbhūtaḥ iti /
K10avsata_u:3781: yataḥ sahaśravaṇān mahājanakāyaḥ śastravyagrakaraḥ piṭakān ādāya nirgatya vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ śastrair jīvita eva māṃsāny utkartitum ārabdhaḥ
K10avsata_u:3782: sa ca bodhisatvo vikartyamānaśarīras tān sarvān maitryā sphuran sabāṣpāśruvadanaś cintayāmāsa:
K10avsata_u:3783: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ yan nāma ime satvā madīyena māṃsarudhireṇa sukhino bhaviṣyantīti /
K10avsata_u:3784: tad anenopakrameṇa satvān dvādaśavarṣāṇi svakena māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa,
K10avsata_u:3786: yadā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ sa vyādhir upaśāntas tadā tena rohitamatsyena śabda udīritaḥ:
K10avsata_u:3789: mayā yuṣmākam arthe svajīvitaparityāgenāyam evaṃvidha ātmabhāva upāttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3794: ahaṃ tadā yuṣmān atyantavyādheḥ parimocya atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti /
K10avsata_u:3795: tacchravaṇāt sa janakāyo labdhaprasādo rājāmātyapaurāś ca puṣpadhūpamālyavilepanair abhyarcya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
K10avsata_u:3800: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena padmako nāma rājā babhūva, ahaṃ sa /
K10avsata_u:3805: yena me aśitapītakhāditāsvāditaṃ samyak sukhena pariṇamati /
K10avsata_u:3811: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:3813: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:3814: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:3819: saced bhikṣavaḥ satvā jānīyur dānasya dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākaṃ yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipakām*,
K10avsata_u:3820: apīdānīṃ yo 'sāv apaścimakaḥ kavaḍaś carama ālopaḥ,
K10avsata_u:3821: tato 'pi nādatvā asaṃvibhajya paribhuñjīta sacel labheta dakṣiṇīyaṃ pratigrāhakam* /
K10avsata_u:3822: na caiṣām utpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhet* /
K10avsata_u:3823: yasmāt tarhi satvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam*,
K10avsata_u:3824: yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam*,
K10avsata_u:3825: tasmāt te adatvā asaṃvibhajya paribhuñjate āgṛhītena cetasā,
K10avsata_u:3826: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati //
K10avsata_u:3828: idam uktvā sugato hy athāparam etad uvāca śāstā:
K10avsata_u:3829: evaṃ hi satvā jānīyur yathā proktaṃ maharṣiṇā /
K10avsata_u:3830: vipākaḥ saṃvibhāgasya yathā bhavati mahārthikaḥ // AVŚ_32.1 //
K10avsata_u:3831: nādatvā paribhuñjīran na syur matsariṇas tathā /
K10avsata_u:3832: na caiṣām āgrahe cittam utpadyeta kadācana // AVŚ_32.2 //
K10avsata_u:3834: yasmāt tu na prajānanti bālā mohatamovṛtāḥ /
K10avsata_u:3835: tasmāt tu bhuñjate satvā āgṛhītena cetasā /
K10avsata_u:3836: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati // AVŚ_32.3 //
K10avsata_u:3837: yadā bhagavatā etat sūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:3838: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavān dānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam iti /
K10avsata_u:3840: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yat tathāgato dānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K10avsata_u:3842: yan mayātīte 'dhvani yācanakahetor mukhadvāragataḥ svakavaḍaḥ parityaktaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3844: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
K10avsata_u:3846: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca
K10avsata_u:3847: sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:3851: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca /
K10avsata_u:3853: yāvad apareṇa samayena mahaddurbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ durbhikṣāntarakalpasadṛśam* /
K10avsata_u:3854: tatas te janakāyā durbhikṣākālabhayabhītāḥ kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhakapolāḥ pretāśrayasadṛśāḥ saṃgamya samāgamyaikasamūhena rājānam upasṛtya jayenāyuṣā
K10avsata_u:3858: asti bho puruṣa koṣṭhāgāre annapānaṃ yad asmākaṃ syād eṣāṃ ca janakāyānām*?
K10avsata_u:3861: tato gaṇitakuśalair gaṇanāṃ kṛtvā sarveṣāṃ viṣayanivāsināṃ divase divase ekakavaḍo rājño dvau kavaḍāv iyantaṃ kālaṃ bhaviṣyatīti samākhyātam*
K10avsata_u:3863: tena hi bhavanto divasānudivasam āgatya rājakule kavaḍam abhyavahṛtya gacchateti /
K10avsata_u:3864: tatas te pratidivasam āgatya pratyekam ekaikaṃ kavaḍam abhyavahṛtya yatheṣṭaṃ gacchanti //
K10avsata_u:3869: tato rājā svakāt kavaḍadvayād ekaṃ brāhmaṇāya dattavān* /
K10avsata_u:3875: atha śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya bhojanakāle rājānam upasṛptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3878: tato rājā svajīvitaparityāgaṃ vyavasāyakāruṇyāt svakavaḍaṃ brāhmaṇāya datvānāhāratāṃ pratipannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:3880: taṃ ca mahājanakāyaṃ bhuñjānaṃ dṛṣṭvā parāṃ prītim āpede /
K10avsata_u:3881: atha śakro devendras taṃ rājño 'tiduṣkaraṃ vyavasāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svena rūpeṇa sthitvā rājānaṃ saṃvardhayāmāsa:

K10avsata_u:3937: tatra ca rājña udyāne 'ntaḥpurajanena saha krīḍata īrṣyāroṣaparītā durmatir devī kupitā /
