K10avsata_u:4250: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
K10avsata_u:4252: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4253: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
K10avsata_u:4259: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:4261: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutaḥ tasya prajāpatyā kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4272: saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
K10avsata_u:4273: saced dārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
K10avsata_u:4277: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:4278: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati:
K10avsata_u:4285: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
K10avsata_u:4286: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
K10avsata_u:4288: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
K10avsata_u:4290: āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ
K10avsata_u:4292: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
K10avsata_u:4293: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:4294: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4295: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:4301: maitrakanyako dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:4302: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:4306: yadā maitrakanyako mahān saṃvṛtas tadā mātaram uvāca:
K10avsata_u:4308: tataḥ paścād aham api (Speyer: ahaṃ pi )
K10avsata_u:4314: yady aham asmai vakṣyāmi mahāsamudravaṇig āsīd iti,
K10avsata_u:4315: eṣo 'pi kadācin mahāsamudram avatīrṇas tatraiva nidhanam upagacched iti //
K10avsata_u:4317: tataḥ prathame divase catvāraḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4329: tataḥ prathame divase ṣoḍaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4333: yāvad dhairaṇyikair īrṣyāprakṛtaiḥ sarvān adhiṣṭhānavyavahārān viditvoktaḥ:
K10avsata_u:4339: amba evam anuśrūyate pitāsmākaṃ mahāsamudravaṇig āsīd iti /
K10avsata_u:4344: kiṃ tu tvaṃ bāla ekaputrakaś ca /
K10avsata_u:4346: sa īrṣyāprakṛtibhir akalyāṇamitrair vipralabdho na nivartate /
K10avsata_u:4347: tatas tena mātur vacanam avacanaṃ kṛtvā vārāṇasyām nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*:
K10avsata_u:4350: ye yuṣmākam utsahante maitrakanyakena sārthavāhena sārdham aśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudram avatartum*,
K10avsata_u:4352: sa kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ pañcavaṇikśataparivāraḥ śakaṭair bhārair mūṭaiḥ piṭakaiḥ uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānīya saṃprasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4353: mātā cāsya snehavyākulahṛdayā sāśrusurdinavadanā pādayor lagnā:
K10avsata_u:4354: putraka mā māṃ parityajya mahāsamudram avatareti /
K10avsata_u:4357: ucyamānaḥ kṛtavyavasāyo mātaraṃ pādena śirasy abhihatya sārthasahāyaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4359: mā me putraka asya karmaṇo vipākam anubhavethā iti //
K10avsata_u:4360: yāvad asau grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīpaṭṭanāny avalokayan samudratīram anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4361: sa pañcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ bhṛtvā paṃca pauruṣeyān gṛhītvā āhāraṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4362: yāvad vahantaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayād vayasanam āpāditam* /
K10avsata_u:4363: tato maitrakanyakaḥ phalakam āsādya sthalam anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4364: tataḥ sthale cañcūryamāṇo nadūrān nagaraṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāmnā dṛṣṭavān* /
K10avsata_u:4371: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
K10avsata_u:4373: sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*,
K10avsata_u:4378: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati sadāmattaṃ nāma nagaram* /
K10avsata_u:4380: yāvat tasmād apy aṣṭāv apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4384: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
K10avsata_u:4386: sa tābhiḥ sahānekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*
K10avsata_u:4389: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
K10avsata_u:4392: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati nandanaṃ nāma nagaram* /
K10avsata_u:4394: yāvat tasmād api ṣoḍaśāpsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4398: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
K10avsata_u:4400: sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān* yathāpi tatkṛtapuṇyaḥ satvaḥ kṛtakuśalaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4401: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
K10avsata_u:4404: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati brahmottaraṃ nāma prāsādam* /
K10avsata_u:4406: yāvat tasmād api dvātriṃśad apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4410: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
K10avsata_u:4412: sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān* yathāpi tatkṛtapuṇyaḥ satvaḥ kṛtakuśalaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4413: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
K10avsata_u:4418: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena yathā gacchan paśyaty ayomayaṃ nagaram* /
K10avsata_u:4425: mūrdhni cāsya ayomayaṃ cakraṃ bhramaty ādīptaṃ pradīptaṃ saṃprajvalitam ekajvālībhūtam* /
K10avsata_u:4428: tato maitrakanyakas taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān*: bho puruṣa,
K10avsata_u:4432: udāhṛtamātre ca tena puruṣeṇa maitrakanyakasya tat karmābhimukhībhūtam*:
K10avsata_u:4433: aham api mātur apakārīti manye tenaivāhaṃ karmaṇā ihākṛṣṭa iti /
K10avsata_u:4434: atha tasminn antare ākāśāc chabdo nirgataḥ:
K10avsata_u:4437: ity uktamātre tasya puruṣasya mūrdhni cakram antarhitam*,
K10avsata_u:4439: tato duḥkhārtaṃ maitrakanyakam avekṣya sa puruṣo gāthayā pratyabhāṣata:
K10avsata_u:4441: brahmottaraṃ ca prāsādaṃ kena tvam ihāgataḥ // AVŚ_36.1 //
K10avsata_u:4444: brahmottaraṃ ca prāsādam icchayāham ihāgataḥ // AVŚ_36.2 //
K10avsata_u:4445: dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrāt karma pravartate /
K10avsata_u:4446: tatra prakarṣate karma yatra karma vipacyate // AVŚ_36.3 //
K10avsata_u:4449: ādīptaṃ saṃprajvalitaṃ mama prāṇoparodhakam* // AVŚ_36.4 // iti
K10avsata_u:4452: pādenābhyāhatā mūrdhni tasya te karmaṇaḥ phalam* // AVŚ_36.5 // iti
K10avsata_u:4455: ādīptaṃ saṃprajvalitaṃ mama prāṇoparodhakam* // AVŚ_36.6 // iti
K10avsata_u:4458: ādīptam āyasaṃ cakraṃ tava mūrdhni bhramiṣyati // AVŚ_36.7 // iti
K10avsata_u:4464: tato maitrakanyako duḥkhavedanābhibhūtaḥ satvānām antike kāruṇyaṃ janayitvā taṃ puruṣam āha:
K10avsata_u:4465: icchāmy ahaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa sarvasatvānām arthe idaṃ cakraṃ upari śirasā dhārayitum* /
K10avsata_u:4466: mā kaścid anyo 'py evaṃvidhakarmakārī ihāgacchatv iti /
K10avsata_u:4467: ity uktamātre maitrakanyakasya bodhisatvasya tac cakraṃ saptatālamātraṃ mūrdhni udgamyākāśe sthitam* /
K10avsata_u:4468: sa ca kālaṃ kṛtvā tuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ //
K10avsata_u:4470: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena maitrakanyaka āsīt, ahaṃ sa /
K10avsata_u:4471: yan mayā saṃvyavaharatā mātā kārṣāpaṇaiḥ pratipāditā,
K10avsata_u:4472: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu mahānagareṣu mahatsukham anubhūtam* /
K10avsata_u:4474: tasya me karmaṇo phalavipākenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhūtam* /
K10avsata_u:4477: tad ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye maitrakanyakasya /
K10avsata_u:4478: pṛthagjanasya eṣa eṣa guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaiva devaputrabhūtasya /
K10avsata_u:4481: duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau āpyāyakau poṣakau saṃvardhakau stanyasya dātārau,
K10avsata_u:4483: ya ekenāṃsena putro mātaraṃ dvitīyena pitaraṃ pūrṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ pariharet*,
K10avsata_u:4484: yad vā asyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajatajātarūpam aśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartaḥ,
K10avsata_u:4486: na iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā /
K10avsata_u:4487: yas tv asāv aśrāddhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ śraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati,
K10avsata_u:4498: iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā //
K10avsata_u:4500: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:4503: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:4504: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:4508: śrāvastyāṃ anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:4510: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:4511: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:4512: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:4515: pitā cāsya dhanakṣayam anuprāpto bhogakṣayam anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4516: sa ca vistīrṇasuhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavas taṃ putraṃ kālānukālaṃ jñātisakāśaṃ preṣayati /
K10avsata_u:4517: sa tair jñātibhis tathā lālito yathā teṣu pravṛddhasnehaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:4519: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:4522: sa prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:4524: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāre doṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4525: sa evaṃ pravrajitaḥ san jñātibhiḥ saha saṃsṛṣṭo viharati /
K10avsata_u:4526: tato bhagavāṃs taṃ gṛhisaṃsargān nivārya araṇye niyojayate /
K10avsata_u:4528: yāvad bhagavāṃs taṃ trir api gṛhisaṃsargān nivārayati:
K10avsata_u:4530: santi cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṃhitāni rañjanīyāni /
K10avsata_u:4535: manovijñeyā dharmāḥ iṣṭāḥ kāntāḥ priyā manāpāḥ kāmopasaṃhitā rañjanīyāḥ kaṇṭakabhūtāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4537: yatra sthitasya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vṛddhir bhavati /
K10avsata_u:4538: yāvat tena kulaputreṇa bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya araṇyavāsena vasatā yujyamānena
K10avsata_u:4539: ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānenedam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
K10avsata_u:4542: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4543: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4544: sa pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya bhagavato 'syātiduṣkarāṇi dṛṣṭvā bhagavantam upasaṃkramya sagauravaḥ stauti mānayati ca //
K10avsata_u:4546: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:4548: yāvad ayaṃ kulaputro bhagavatā yāvat trir api grāmāntān nivārya araṇye niyojitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:4551: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
K10avsata_u:4553: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena ayaṃ kulaputro yāvan trir api grāmāntān
K10avsata_u:4556: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
K10avsata_u:4557: ayaṃ kulaputraḥ svajīvitaparityāgena grāmāntān nivārya araṇyavāse niyuktaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4559: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:4560: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatarasmin girikandare prasravaṇapuṣpaphalakandasaṃpanno ṛṣiḥ prativasati kaṣṭatapāḥ phalamūlāmbubhakṣo 'jinavalkalavāsī agnihotrikaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4561: tasya ca ṛṣeḥ śaśo vayasyo mānuṣapralāpī /
K10avsata_u:4568: tataḥ sa ṛṣis tatrāśramapade upabhogaviharān nābhiramate /
K10avsata_u:4570: atha śaśas taṃ tathā pravṛttaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavān*:
K10avsata_u:4575: tataḥ sa ṛṣivacanam upaśrutya jātasaṃtāpo mātāpitṛviyogam iva manyamānaḥ pādayor nipatya tam ṛṣim uvāca:
K10avsata_u:4577: api ca anekadoṣasaṃkulo gṛhavāso 'nekaguṇasaṃpannaś cāraṇyavāsa iti /
K10avsata_u:4578: sa bahv apy ucyamāno na nivartate /
K10avsata_u:4585: yasmād ime tiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃcayaparā iti /
K10avsata_u:4587: atha kṛtāhnikam āhārakāle śaśa upasaṃkramya tam ṛṣiṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:4588: kṣamasva mama maharṣe yan mayā ūhāpohavirahitena tiryagyonāv upapannena tava kiṃcid apakṛtaṃ syāt* /
K10avsata_u:4590: tataḥ sa ṛṣir jātasaṃvego bāṣpadurdinamukhaḥ priyaikaputram ivopaguhyovāca (Speyer:
K10avsata_u:4593: śaśa uvāca: maharṣe araṇyapriyatayā madīyena māṃsenāhorātraṃ yāpayiṣyasi / kiṃ ca:
K10avsata_u:4594: na santi mudgā na tilā na taṇḍulā vane vivṛddhasya śaśasya kecana /
K10avsata_u:4595: śarīram etat tv analābhisaṃskṛtaṃ mamopayojyādya tapovane vasa // AVŚ_37.1 // iti
K10avsata_u:4597: tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ śaśavacanam upaśrutya jātasaṃvega uvāca:
K10avsata_u:4598: yady evaṃ tava priyatayā kāmam ihaiva jīvitaṃ parityakṣyāmi,
K10avsata_u:4601: ūrdhvamukhaś ca gaganatalam abhivīkṣya yācituṃ pravṛttaḥ / āha ca:
K10avsata_u:4602: araṇye me samāgamya viveke ramate manaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4603: anena satyavākyena māhendraṃ deva varṣa nu // AVŚ_37.2 //
K10avsata_u:4608: yāvac chakreṇa devendreṇa māhendravarṣaṃ vṛṣṭaṃ yena tadāśramapadaṃ punar api tṛṇagulmauṣadhipuṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ saṃvṛttam* //
K10avsata_u:4609: tatas tena ṛṣiṇā śaśaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya tatra vasatā pañcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4610: tataḥ sa ṛiṣiḥ śaśam uvāca: bhoḥ śaśa,
K10avsata_u:4611: tena duṣkareṇa vyavasāyena kāruṇyabhāvāc ca kiṃ prārthayase iti /
K10avsata_u:4612: tenoktam*: andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
K10avsata_u:4616: tataḥ sa ṛṣir idaṃ vacanam upaśrutya śaśam abravīt:
K10avsata_u:4621: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śaśa āsīt, ahaṃ sa /
K10avsata_u:4625: na pāpamitrā na pāpasahāyā na pāpasaṃparkā /
K10avsata_u:4628: iha mama bhadanta ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasyaivaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi:
K10avsata_u:4629: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
K10avsata_u:4630: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
K10avsata_u:4633: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
K10avsata_u:4634: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
K10avsata_u:4635: sakalam idam ānanda kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
K10avsata_u:4636: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4638: māṃ hy ānanda kalyāṇāmitram āgamya jātidharmāṇaḥ satvā jātidharmatayā (Speyer:
K10avsata_u:4642: tad anenaiva te ānanda paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ yat sakalam idaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
K10avsata_u:4643: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4646: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:4650: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:4651: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:4656: kalyam evotthāya bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkramya jetavanaṃ svayaṃ saṃmārṣṭum* /
K10avsata_u:4657: athānyatamena kālena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ kaścid vyākṣepaḥ samutpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4658: tato bhagavān puṇyakāmānāṃ satvānāṃ puṇyatīrthopadarśanārthaṃ svayam eva saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvā jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4659: bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāśrāvakā api śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapanandarevataprabhṛtayaḥ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4660: tato jetavanaṃ saha śrāvakaiḥ saṃmṛjya upasthānaśālāṃ praviśya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4668: kāyasya ca bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate /
K10avsata_u:4670: tataś catasraḥ parṣado bhagavataḥ sakāśāt saṃmārjanasyeti pañcānuśaṃsān upaśrutya
K10avsata_u:4671: prasādajātāḥ prītisaumanasyaprasannacittāḥ svasvāsanād utthāya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ
K10avsata_u:4678: tatas tāś catasraḥ parṣado bhagavato 'dhivāsanāṃ viditvā saṃmārjanīgṛhītvā sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4679: sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ cārāmamārgaparyantaṃ saṃmārjya bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ śrotum ekānte niṣaṇṇā ādarayuktāḥ //
K10avsata_u:4680: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir api taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4681: tena śrutaṃ yathā bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayam eva jetavanaṃ saṃmṛṣṭam iti /
K10avsata_u:4682: bhagavatā deśitān saṃmārjane pañcāsnuśaṃsān upaśrutya vipratisārībhūtaḥ iti cintitavān:
K10avsata_u:4683: kimarthaṃ mayā bhagavato vihāre tasmin puṇyakṣetre,
K10avsata_u:4689: aviditaprabhāve pāpācārāṇām alabdhāgamane pāpamitrahastagatānām amanāpajāte śraddhāvigatānāṃ
K10avsata_u:4690: tyāgadharmarahitānām adṛṣṭacintitabhāvane duḥśīlānāṃ kuvṛttinām amanogamane dayābhāvavirahitānāṃ
K10avsata_u:4693: duṣprajñānāṃ kubuddhilabdhajñānāntarāṇām aprāptāgamanabhāve dātṝṇām atīva manorathakṛte
K10avsata_u:4696: ādarāgamanalabdhe vīryārabdhānāṃ nityānugamanaprāpte dhyānaratānām ālīnabhūvane prajñādhāriṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:4697: prabodhaprakāśāparityaktakṣetre etādṛśe buddhavikrīḍite vihāre saṃmārṣṭuṃ cittākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4698: na punaḥ kadāpi mayā tathā kṣamaṃ kartum* /
K10avsata_u:4700: yatra bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayaṃ saṃmārjanaṃ kṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:4704: tena bhikṣavaḥ pṛṣṭāḥ: ka eṣa iti /
K10avsata_u:4706: anāthapiṇḍado bhadanta bhagavato lajjāyamānarūpo 'patrāpyaparigatahṛdayo necchati bhagavataḥ sakāśam atropariṣṭāt pādanyāsenopasaṃkramitum*,
K10avsata_u:4707: yatra nāma bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmṛṣṭam iti /
K10avsata_u:4715: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gāthābhigītena gāyan yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4716: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastād ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmakathāśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:4717: tato bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4718: so 'nekaparyāyeṇa bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ saṃprakrāntaḥ //
K10avsata_u:4719: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:4720: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavān dharme sādarajātaḥ sagauravajāto dharmasyaiva varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti /
K10avsata_u:4721: paśya bhadanta yāvad dharmaratnasyāmī bhājanahūtaḥ satvā ādareṇa sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttāḥ,
K10avsata_u:4724: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ tathāgato vigatarāgadveṣamoho 'tha parimukto
K10avsata_u:4727: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair dharmahetoḥ svajīvitasyāpi parityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4729: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:4730: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ
K10avsata_u:4731: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:4734: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahatī tyāge vartate /
K10avsata_u:4735: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:4736: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā devī satvavatī saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:4741: ta ūcuḥ: deva asya satvasyānubhāva iti /
K10avsata_u:4742: tatas tena rājā saubhāṣaṇikasyārthe suvarṇapiṭako grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu
K10avsata_u:4746: yāvat paripūrṇair navabhir māsaiḥ sā devī prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:4747: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4748: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:4751: yasmād ayaṃ dārako 'jāta eva subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhāṣitagaveṣī nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:4753: subhāṣitagaveṣī dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:4754: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:4756: yadā krameṇa mahān saṃvṛttas tadāpi subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate,
K10avsata_u:4758: sa pitur atyayād rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ amātyānām ājñāpayati:
K10avsata_u:4761: tatas tair amātyaiḥ sakale jambūdvīpe hiraṇyapiṭakāḥ subhāṣitahetoḥ saṃdarśitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4764: tataḥ sa rājā subhāṣitaśravaṇahetor utkaṇṭhati paritapyati //
K10avsata_u:4769: atha śakro devānām indro guhyakarūpadhārī bhūtvā vikṛtakaracaraṇanayano rājñaḥ purastād gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:4770: dharmaṃ caret sucaritaṃ nainaṃ duścaritaṃ caret* /
K10avsata_u:4771: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃl loke paratra ca // AVŚ_38.1 // iti //
K10avsata_u:4778: yadi yad bravīmi tan me kariṣyasi,
K10avsata_u:4783: saptāhorātrāṇi khadirakāṣṭhair agnikhadāṃ tāpayitvā tatra yady ātmānam utsrakṣyasi,
K10avsata_u:4785: tacchravaṇāc ca rājā prītamanās taṃ guhyakam uvāca:
K10avsata_u:4787: tato rājñā guhyakaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam* saptame divase rājā subhāṣitaśravaṇahetor agnikhadāyām ātmānam utsrakṣyati /
K10avsata_u:4790: tato 'nekeṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu gaganataleṣu cānekeṣu devatāśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu bodhisatvasyādhyāśayaśuddhitām avagamyādbhutabhāvaṃ ca draṣṭum ihāvatasthuḥ /
K10avsata_u:4791: atha sa guhyaka ākāśam utpatya bodhisatvam uvāca:
K10avsata_u:4793: tato rājā jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya amātyān naigamajānapadāṃś ca kṣamayitvā janakāyaṃ cāśvāsya agnikhadāsamīpam upagamya imāṃ gāthāṃ
K10avsata_u:4797: eṣā cāgnikhadā bhaviṣyati śubhā puṇyānubhāvān mama
K10avsata_u:4799: ity uktvā bodhisatvas tasyām agnikhadāyāṃ patitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4801: tataḥ śakro devānām indras tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā yakṣarūpam antardhāpya svarūpeṇa sthitvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:4802: dharma caret sucaritaṃ nainaṃ duścaritaṃ caret* /
K10avsata_u:4803: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete loke 'smiṃ ca paratra // AVŚ_38.3 // iti //
K10avsata_u:4804: atha bodhisatvena tāṃ gāthām udgṛhītvā suvarṇapatreṣv abhilikhya kṛtsne jambudvīpe grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhāniṣu paryaṭitā //
K10avsata_u:4806: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva, ahaṃ sa /
K10avsata_u:4807: tadāpi me subhāṣitaśravaṇahetoḥ svajīvitaṃ parityaktaṃ prāg evedānīm* /
K10avsata_u:4809: yad dharmaṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4810: dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4813: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:4816: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:4817: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:4821: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastyāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K10avsata_u:4824: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:4827: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ suciraṃ nirīkṣya pṛthivyāṃ lekhāṃ niṣkṛṣya (Speyer: nikṛṣya)
K10avsata_u:4830: na tāvad ut te lekhā laṅghayitavyā,
K10avsata_u:4833: tato bhagavān karmaṇām avipraṇāśasaṃdarśanārtham adattādānavairamaṇyārthaṃ ca indrakīla iva tasmin pradeśe sthitaḥ //
K10avsata_u:4834: eṣa ca śabdaḥ śrāvastyāṃ samantato visṛtaḥ:
K10avsata_u:4835: yathā kila bhagavān rājamārge 'nyatamena brāhmaṇena pañcānāṃ purāṇaśatānām arthaṃ vidhārita iti /
K10avsata_u:4836: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ sahaśravaṇād evāmātyagaṇaparivṛtto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4842: tathā viśākhā mṛgāramātā ṛṣidattapurāṇau sthapatī śakrabrahmādayo devā vaiśravaṇaprabhṛtayaś catvāro lokapālā hiraṇyasuvarṇam upādāya bhagavantam upasṛptāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4846: sa hiraṇyasuvarṇasya helāṃ pūrayitvā upari pañca purāṇaśatāni datvā bhagavantam upagataḥ: bhagavan*,
K10avsata_u:4851: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā sā suvarṇahelā brāhmaṇāya dattā //
K10avsata_u:4852: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarājikā ca parṣat sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:4853: paśya bhagavan yāvad anena brāhmaṇena bhagavān vidhārito 'nāthapiṇḍadena ca kārṣāpaṇā dattāḥ /
K10avsata_u:4854: kutaś ca prabhṛti bhagavān asmai dhārayata iti /
K10avsata_u:4859: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye /
K10avsata_u:4861: The portion from tathāgatenaitāni up to khalu dehinām is out of place here.)
K10avsata_u:4862: bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu avaśyaṃbhāvīni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
K10avsata_u:4867: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
K10avsata_u:4869: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_39.1 //
K10avsata_u:4870: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ
K10avsata_u:4871: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:4875: so 'pareṇa samayena vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe amātyaputraparivṛtaḥ krīḍati ramate /
K10avsata_u:4878: tato 'mātyaputras tena puruṣeṇa pañca purāṇaśatāni nirjitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4880: (There seem to be a long gap.)
K10avsata_u:4884: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:4887: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:4893: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:4895: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:4896: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:4899: kuśinagaryāṃ viharati sma mallānām upavartane yamakaśālavane /
K10avsata_u:4900: atha bhagavāṃs tad eva parinirvāṇakālasamaye āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
K10avsata_u:4901: prajñāpaya ānanda tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcam* /
K10avsata_u:4902: adya tathāgatasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10avsata_u:4903: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K10avsata_u:4905: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat /
K10avsata_u:4906: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirā mañcaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4908: upasaṃkramya dakṣinena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pāde pādam ādhāya alokasaṃjño smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvan //
K10avsata_u:4909: tena khalu samayena kuśinagaryāṃ subhadraḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati jīrṇavṛddho mahallakaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4910: sa viṃśatiśatavayaskaḥ kauśināgarāṇāṃ mallānāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rhan saṃmataḥ /
K10avsata_u:4912: atra śramaṇasya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10avsata_u:4915: pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamaḥ tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* /
K10avsata_u:4916: śrutvā ca punaḥ kuśinagaryā niṣkramya yena yamakaśālavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ //
K10avsata_u:4917: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān ānando bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe caṃkrame caṃkramyate /
K10avsata_u:4919: dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān ānandas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4920: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmatānandena sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte 'sthāt* /
K10avsata_u:4921: ekāntasthitaḥ subhadraḥ parivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:4922: śrutaṃ me ānanda adya śramaṇasya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
K10avsata_u:4927: pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* /
K10avsata_u:4936: dvir api trir api subhadraḥ parivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat* śrutaṃ bho
K10avsata_u:4937: ānanda adya śramaṇasya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
K10avsata_u:4941: pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* /
K10avsata_u:4947: dvir api trir api āyuṣmān ānandaḥ subhadraṃ parivrājakam idam avocat:
K10avsata_u:4952: punar api subhadraḥ parivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:4953: śrutaṃ bho ānanda purāṇānāṃ parivrājakānām antikāj jīrṇānāṃ buddhānāṃ (Speyer: vṛddhānāṃ)
K10avsata_u:4955: kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpadyante,
K10avsata_u:4957: tasya cādya bhagavato gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10avsata_u:4960: pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* /
K10avsata_u:4965: punar apy ānandaḥ subhadraṃ parivrājakam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:4970: imāṃ ca punar āyuṣmatā ānandasya subhadreṇa parivrājakenā sārdham antarākathāṃ viprakṛtām aśrauṣīd bhagavān divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa
K10avsata_u:4971: śrutvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
K10avsata_u:4975: ayaṃ me paścimo bhaviṣyati anyatīrthikaparivrājakaiḥ sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ /
K10avsata_u:4976: ayaṃ ca me caramo bhaviṣyati sākṣācchrāvakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānām*,
K10avsata_u:4978: atha subhadra parivrājako bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4979: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:4980: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavantam idam avocat:
K10avsata_u:4989: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:4998: ito bahir vai śramaṇo 'sti nānyaḥ // AVŚ_40.2 //
K10avsata_u:4999: yasya subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo nopalabhyate,
K10avsata_u:5001: dvitīyas tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ śramaṇas tatra nopalabhyate /
K10avsata_u:5002: yasmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate prathamaḥ śramaṇas tatropalabhyate /
K10avsata_u:5004: asmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate /
K10avsata_u:5009: na santi ito bahiḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā /
K10avsata_u:5010: śūnyāḥ parapravādāḥ śramaṇair vā brāhmaṇair vā /
K10avsata_u:5012: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe subhadrasya parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* /
K10avsata_u:5013: atha subhadraḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas
K10avsata_u:5015: ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān ānandas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam idam avocat /
K10avsata_u:5016: lābhā bhadanta ānandena sulabdhā yad bhagavatā ānando mahācāryeṇa mahācāryāntevāsikābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5017: api tu asmākam api syur lābhāḥ sulabdhā yad vayaṃ labhemahi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K10avsata_u:5019: ayaṃ bhadanta subhadraḥ parivrājaka ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K10avsata_u:5024: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* /
K10avsata_u:5025: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
K10avsata_u:5026: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya pravedayati:
K10avsata_u:5028: uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nānyam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi /
K10avsata_u:5030: athāyuṣmataḥ subhadrasyārhatvaprāptasya vimuktisukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata etad abhavat*:
K10avsata_u:5031: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ śāstāraṃ parinirvāpayantaṃ paśyeyam* /
K10avsata_u:5035: yadā bhagavatā paścimaśayanopagatena dharmoparodhikāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartamānāyām*,
K10avsata_u:5039: bahavaś ca kauśīnāgarā mallā dharme niyuktāḥ,
K10avsata_u:5040: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:5042: yad ayaṃ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavatā chidyamāneṣu dharmeṣu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayitvā yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpita iti /
K10avsata_u:5044: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
K10avsata_u:5049: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
K10avsata_u:5050: ūhāpohavirahitena tiryagyonāv upapannena svajīvitaparityāgena subhadraḥ paritrātaḥ,
K10avsata_u:5053: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:5054: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatarasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ mṛgayūthapaḥ prativasati anekamṛgasahasraparivāraḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī /
K10avsata_u:5055: tac ca mṛgayūthaṃ lubdhakena vicārya rājñe niveditam* /
K10avsata_u:5056: tato rājñā caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena nirgatya tan mṛgayūthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃkaṭīkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:5058: yady aham idānīm imān na rakṣiṣyāmi,
K10avsata_u:5061: katamena pradeśenāsya mṛgakulasya niḥsaraṇaṃ syād iti /
K10avsata_u:5062: sa paśyati tasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ nadīṃ vahamānām* /
K10avsata_u:5065: tato yūthapatiḥ sahasā tāṃ nadīm avatīrya madhye sthitvā śabdam udīrayati:
K10avsata_u:5067: etasmāt kūlād utplutya mama pṛṣṭe pādān sthāpayitvā paratra kūle pratitiṣṭhata /
K10avsata_u:5073: na cāsya vyavasāyo nivṛttaḥ tadgatakāruṇyo mṛgāṇām antike /
K10avsata_u:5078: tato yūthapatiś chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu iṣṭajīvitam agaṇayitvā
K10avsata_u:5079: kūlam uttīrya mṛgaśāvakaṃ pṛṣṭham adhirohya nadīm uttārya kūle sthāpayitvā taṃ mṛgagaṇam
K10avsata_u:5080: uttīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā maraṇakāle praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:5081: yathā me ime mṛgā ayaṃ ca mārgaśāvaka iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāḥ,
K10avsata_u:5083: evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya etān saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:5085: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena mṛgapatir āsīt*, ahaṃ sa /
K10avsata_u:5088: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:5089: kāni bhadanta subhadreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena paścimaḥ sākṣācchrāvakāṇām iti /
K10avsata_u:5091: subhadreṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
K10avsata_u:5096: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
K10avsata_u:5098: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_40.1 //
K10avsata_u:5099: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ
K10avsata_u:5100: kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
K10avsata_u:5101: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:5102: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:5107: sa svādhīnaṃ mokṣaṃ manyamāno na vyāyacchate /
K10avsata_u:5109: bhagavāṃś ca kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgniḥ paścimaśayanopagataḥ,
K10avsata_u:5110: aśokaś ca bhikṣur aśokasyādhastāt pratisaṃlīno babhūva /
K10avsata_u:5111: atha yā devatā tasminn aśokavṛkṣe vyuṣitā,
K10avsata_u:5112: sā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ śrutvā rodituṃ pravṛttā /
K10avsata_u:5113: tasya rudantyā aśrubindavo 'śokasya kāye nipatituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
K10avsata_u:5114: athāśoka ūrdhvamukhas tāṃ devatāṃ rudantīm āha:
K10avsata_u:5117: adya rātryā madhyame yāme bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:5118: athāśoko devatāvacanam upasṛtya marmaviddha iva pracalitavān* /
K10avsata_u:5128: apakṛṣṭatvād adhvano na śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti /
K10avsata_u:5130: yadi punar ahaṃ bhavantaṃ bhagavatsakāśam upanayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:5134: yathā sahadarśanād eva bhagavataḥ śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti /
K10avsata_u:5135: tato devatayā aśoko bhagavatsakāśam ṛddhyanubhāvān nītaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5137: prasādajātasya ca bhagavatā kāśyapena tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ yacchravaṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:5140: tataḥ sā devatā āyuṣmato 'śokasya parinirvāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim utpādayāmāsa /
K10avsata_u:5144: evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
K10avsata_u:5145: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
K10avsata_u:5146: tasyāham eva paścimaśayanopagatasya caramaḥ sākṣācchravakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānāṃ bhaveyam*,
K10avsata_u:5152: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kalyāṇamitratā vihariṣyāmaḥ kalyāṇsahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
K10avsata_u:5153: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5156: iha mama bhadanta ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi:
K10avsata_u:5157: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
K10avsata_u:5158: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
K10avsata_u:5161: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
K10avsata_u:5162: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
K10avsata_u:5165: kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
K10avsata_u:5166: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5168: māṃ hy ānanda kalyāṇamitram āgamya jātidharmāṇaḥ satvā jātidharmatāyāḥ parimucyante,
K10avsata_u:5170: tad anenaiva te ānanda paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ yat sakalam idaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
K10avsata_u:5171: na pāpasahāyatā na pāpamitratā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5174: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:5178: guḍaśālā ca bhaktaṃ ca toyaṃ varcaghaṭena ca /
K10avsata_u:5179: koliko hy uttaraś cāpi jātyandhaḥ śreṣṭhir eva ca /
K10avsata_u:5180: putro jāmbālakaś caiva vargo bhavati samudditaḥ // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:5182: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:5183: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:5191: , yāvan narakatiryakpretebhya ekasatvam api na mocayāva iti /
K10avsata_u:5192: tatas tāv āyuṣmatau kālena kālaṃ kadācin narakacārikāṃ carataḥ,
K10avsata_u:5194: tau tatra satvānāṃ vividhayātanābhyāhatānām asatpralāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān āgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocayataḥ /
K10avsata_u:5196: tatas tau tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurutaḥ,
K10avsata_u:5199: yāvad apareṇa samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretacārikāṃ carann adrākṣīt pretaṃ
K10avsata_u:5202: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanām anubhavantam*,
K10avsata_u:5203: yena yenoccāraprasrāvabhūmis tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaṃ tad api kṛcchreṇāsādayantam* /
K10avsata_u:5205: kiṃ te bhoḥ karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayasa iti /
K10avsata_u:5206: preta āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
K10avsata_u:5210: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K10avsata_u:5212: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /

K10avsata_u:5827: uttiṣṭhatu kṣipram ayaṃ pretalokāt sudāruṇāt* // AVŚ_48.1 // iti //
K10avsata_u:5828: tataḥ sa preto bhagavati cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ pretamarddhikeṣūpapannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5829: tataḥ pretamaharddhikaś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitramauliḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras
K10avsata_u:5831: tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā
K10avsata_u:5832: sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ
K10avsata_u:5839: kiṃ bhagavan asyām rātrau brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ?
K10avsata_u:5841: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:5842: api sa pretaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā pretamaharddhikeṣūpapannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5851: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:5853: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:5854: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:5857: rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
K10avsata_u:5858: athāyuṣmān nāladaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K10avsata_u:5859: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamarpya pretacārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ //
K10avsata_u:5860: sa gṛdhrakūṭaparvatasāmantake pretīṃ dadarśa yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* /
K10avsata_u:5861: rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tādṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhūya putrasnehe saty api kṣutkṣāmatayā putrāṃs tān bhakṣayantīm* /
K10avsata_u:5863: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavasīti /
K10avsata_u:5864: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
K10avsata_u:5867: yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt karmaṇaḥ prativiraṃsyantīti /
K10avsata_u:5869: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
K10avsata_u:5870: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ
K10avsata_u:5873: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
K10avsata_u:5874: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nāladam idam avocat*: ehi nālada,
K10avsata_u:5877: nālada āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
K10avsata_u:5878: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* / āha ca:
K10avsata_u:5879: pañca putrān ahaṃ rātrau divā pañca tathāparān* /
K10avsata_u:5880: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptas tathāpi me // AVŚ_49.1 // iti
K10avsata_u:5881: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /
K10avsata_u:5882: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* // AVŚ_49.2 // iti
K10avsata_u:5888: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:5889: bhūtapūrvaṃ nālada atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām 'nyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:5891: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:5892: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato naiva putro na duhitā /
K10avsata_u:5893: sa kare kapolaṃ kṛtvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:5896: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:5897: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma /
K10avsata_u:5898: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:5899: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
K10avsata_u:5900: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
K10avsata_u:5902: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5903: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:5908: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:5909: tasya devatārādhane 'pi sati na putro na duhitā //
K10avsata_u:5913: tena sadṛśāt kulād dvitīyā bhāryā ānītā /
K10avsata_u:5914: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:5915: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:5919: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
K10avsata_u:5921: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udanayati:
K10avsata_u:5930: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate:
K10avsata_u:5931: idaṃ tayor yatrayatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
K10avsata_u:5932: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvopariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte śītopakaraṇair
K10avsata_u:5933: uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair
K10avsata_u:5935: hārārdhahāravirājitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharimāṃ bhūmim* /
K10avsata_u:5936: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya //
K10avsata_u:5937: tatas tasyāḥ pūrvikāyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ prathamapatnyās tāṃ bahumānāl lālitāṃ (Speyer: laḍitaṃ)
K10avsata_u:5946: tayā aniṣṭagatiprapātanamugdhayā visrambham utpādya tathāvidhaṃ garbhaśātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattaṃ yena pītamātreṇaiva tasyās tapasvinyāḥ srasto garbhaḥ
K10avsata_u:5947: tatas tayā dvitīyapatnyā sarvajñātīn saṃnipātya sā prathamā patnī samanuyujyate:
K10avsata_u:5948: tvayā me visrambham utpādya śātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattam*,
K10avsata_u:5950: tato 'sau prathamapatnī jñātimadhye śapathaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttā:
K10avsata_u:5951: yadi mayā garbhaśātanaṃ dravyam anupradattaṃ syāt*,
K10avsata_u:5952: ahaṃ pretī bhūtvā jātāñ jātān putrān bhakṣayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:5955: yat tayā īrṣyāprakṛtayā garbhaśātanaṃ dattaṃ tena preteṣūpapannā /
K10avsata_u:5957: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tān eva bhakṣayati /
K10avsata_u:5958: tasmāt tarhi te nālada vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye tasyāḥ pretyāḥ /
K10avsata_u:5961: āttamanā āyuṣmān nālado 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:5963: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:5964: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:5968: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyām anyatarasyāṃ nagaraparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni prativasanti
K10avsata_u:5969: vāntāśāny ujjhitāśāni kheṭamūtropajīvīni pūyaśoṇitaviṣṭhāhārāṇi ghorāṇi prakṛtiduḥkhitāni ca / āha ca:
K10avsata_u:5975: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:5976: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:5978: tatas tena brāhmaṇena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ /
K10avsata_u:5980: yo 'yam udarastho dārakas tasyāyaṃ prabhāva iti /
K10avsata_u:5981: yāvad asau navānāṃ māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:5982: dārako jāto durvarṇo durdarśano avakoṭimako 'medhyamrakṣitagātro durgandhaś ca /
K10avsata_u:5983: tathāpy asau snehapāśānubaddhābhyāṃ paramabībhatso 'pi mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ saṃvardhitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5987: tasya bālo jāmbāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā //
K10avsata_u:5988: yāvad asāv itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman pūraṇena kāśyapena dṛṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5993: sa tena pravrājito nagnaḥ paryaṭati satkriyāsu ca vartate /
K10avsata_u:5994: tatas tena paryaṭatā vaiśālīparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni dṛṣṭāni /
K10avsata_u:5995: sa pūrvakarmavipākasaṃbandhāt tāṃ nagaraparikhām avatīrya taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgamya samāgamya saṃmodate,
K10avsata_u:5997: yāvad apareṇa samayena jāmbālo dārakaḥ kvacit prayojanena vyākṣipto vaiśālīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:5999: dadṛśus te pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:6005: te ūcuḥ: pipāsitāḥ smo bhagavann iti /
K10avsata_u:6006: tato bhagavatā pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo 'ṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya pañca dhārā utsṛṣṭāḥ,
K10avsata_u:6008: tatas te bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:6010: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
K10avsata_u:6018: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti /
K10avsata_u:6019: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ
K10avsata_u:6020: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:6021: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvāṃ kūṭāgāraśālāṃ udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ
K10avsata_u:6022: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:6025: dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
K10avsata_u:6026: yāṃ śrutvā pañcabhir devaputraśatair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptam* /
K10avsata_u:6030: sarvarogaparimuktā ivāturā yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatās tayaiva vibhūtyā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ //
K10avsata_u:6031: atha jāmbālo nagaraparikhām āgatas tān pretān nādrākṣīt* /
K10avsata_u:6033: sa ca tān parimārgamāṇaḥ khedam āpanno na ca tān āsādayati //
K10avsata_u:6034: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
K10avsata_u:6035: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:6042: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
K10avsata_u:6043: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:6051: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_50.2 //
K10avsata_u:6052: tato bhagavāñ jāmbālasya kulaputrasyānugrahārthaṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K10avsata_u:6053: yāvad anupūrveṇa piṇḍapātam aṭan vīthīm avatīrṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6054: jāmbālaś ca itas tato 'nvāhiṇḍamāno bhagavato 'grataḥ sthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6055: atha dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā
K10avsata_u:6059: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭa uvāca:
K10avsata_u:6060: yadi bhagavan mādṛśānāṃ satvānām asmin dharmavinaye pravrajyāsti;
K10avsata_u:6062: tato bhagavān mahākaruṇāparigatahṛdayaḥ satvānām āśayānuśayajñas taṃ bhavyarūpaṃ viditvā rajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasāryedam
K10avsata_u:6064: ity uktamātre bhagavatā saptāhāvaropitair iva keśair dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpannasyeva bhikṣor īryāpathena pātrakarakavyagrahasto 'vasthitaḥ / āha
K10avsata_u:6066: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6067: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthāv evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena // AVŚ_50.3 //
K10avsata_u:6069: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:6072: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6073: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6076: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ lūhādhimuktānām*,
K10avsata_u:6078: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:6079: kiṃ bhadanta jāmbālena sthavireṇa karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavatīti /
K10avsata_u:6081: jāmbalenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:6084: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:6088: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:6089: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
K10avsata_u:6090: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_50.4 //
K10avsata_u:6091: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:6092: prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
K10avsata_u:6093: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:6095: tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyām anyatamena gṛhapatinā vihāraḥ kārito yatra nānādigdeśavāsino bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ ca manyante /
K10avsata_u:6096: tasmiṃś ca vihāre pṛthagjano bhikṣur naivāsikaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6099: āgantukān bhikṣūn dṛṣṭvā 'bhiṣajyate kupyati vyāpadyate madguḥ pratitiṣṭhati kopaṃ saṃjanayati /
K10avsata_u:6100: ye tu tasmād vihārād bhikṣavaḥ prakrāmanti,
K10avsata_u:6102: yāvad apareṇa samayena janapadād arhadbhikṣur āgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:6105: tataḥ prasādajātena śvo bhaktena jentākasnātreṇa copanimantritaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
K10avsata_u:6107: yāvad dvitīye divase jentākasnātre pratipādite bhakte sajjīkṛte āvāsiko bhikṣur āgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:6109: paśyati vihārasvāminam ekaśāṭakanivasitam āgantukasya bhikṣoḥ parikarma kurvāṇam* /
K10avsata_u:6114: varaṃ khalu te bhikṣo amedhyena śarīram upaliptam*,
K10avsata_u:6115: na tu evaṃvidhasya dānapateḥ sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkṛtam iti /
K10avsata_u:6117: mā haivāyaṃ tapasvī gāḍhatarasya karmaṇo bhāgī bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:6118: yāvat sāmagrīdeśakāle saṃprāpte naivāsikena bhikṣuṇā śrutam*:
K10avsata_u:6122: kṣamasva ārya yan mayā tvayi paruṣā vāg niścāriteti /
K10avsata_u:6123: tato 'rhaṃs tasya prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6125: tena tasya purastāt tat karma atyayenādeśitaṃ prakāśitam uttānīkṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:6126: ca na cānena śakitaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ jñānam utpādayitum* /
K10avsata_u:6131: yat tu mayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ dānapradānāni dattāni saṃghasya copasthānām kṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:6132: tasya karmaṇo vipākena anāgatān samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:6133: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayenāvāsiko bhikṣuḥ,
K10avsata_u:6136: asya karmaṇo vipākenānantaṃ saṃsāre duḥkham anubhūtam* /
K10avsata_u:6137: tenaiva ca karmāvaśeṣeṇa etarhi paścime bhave evaṃ durgandhaḥ paramadurgandho 'medhyāvaskarasthānanivāsābhiprāyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6138: yat punar anena tatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca
K10avsata_u:6139: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:6140: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyam * /
K10avsata_u:6148: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:6152: kṛṣṇasarpaś ca candraś ca sālaḥ śrīmatir eva ca /
K10avsata_u:6153: vastraṃ śukaś ca dūtaś ca mahiṣaḥ poṣadhaś ca vai /
K10avsata_u:6157: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:6158: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:6162: rājagṛhe nagaradvāre 'nyataro gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī
K10avsata_u:6163: sa ca matsarī kuṭukuñcaka āgṛhītapariṣkāraḥ kākāyāpi baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati /
K10avsata_u:6165: svake codyāne mahān hiraṇyasuvarṇasya rāśiḥ sthāpitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6167: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā tasyaivopari āśīviṣa utapanno mahān kṛṣṇasarpo dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6168: atha ye tad udyānaṃ janakāyāḥ praviśanti,
K10avsata_u:6170: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtaḥ:
K10avsata_u:6175: kas taṃ śakyati vinetum anyatra buddhād bhagavata iti /
K10avsata_u:6176: atha rājā bimbisāro mahājanakāyaparivṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6177: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6178: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
K10avsata_u:6179: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K10avsata_u:6180: atha rājā bimbisāra utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:6181: iha bhagavan rājagṛhe nagare 'muṣminn udyāne mahānāśīviṣaḥ kṛṣṇasarpo dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ prativasati,
K10avsata_u:6183: sādhu bhagavāṃs tam vinayed anukampām upādāyeti /
K10avsata_u:6185: atha rājā bimbisāro bhagavatas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
K10avsata_u:6186: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya yena tad udyānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6187: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
K10avsata_u:6192: atha sa āśīviṣa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:6193: kasya prabhāvān mama śarīraṃ prahlāditam iti /
K10avsata_u:6194: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:6198: prassannacittasya ca bhagavatā tan mayyā gatyās tan mayyā yonyā dharmo deśitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:6203: mā haiva itaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā narakeṣūpapatsyasa iti /
K10avsata_u:6206: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:6210: tiryagyoniṃ virāgyeha tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // AVŚ_51.2 // iti //
K10avsata_u:6211: yāvad bhagavatā pātre prakṣipya veṇuvanaṃ nītaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6212: atrāntare rājñā māgadhena janakāyena ca śrutaṃ yathāsāv āśīviṣo bhagavatā vinīta iti //
K10avsata_u:6216: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
K10avsata_u:6224: yan nu aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:6226: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:6227: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāsam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsayan
K10avsata_u:6228: bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:6229: atha bhagavān āśīviṣapūrvikasya devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
K10avsata_u:6230: yāṃ śrutvā āśīviṣapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam* /
K10avsata_u:6232: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:6250: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // AVŚ_51.5 // iti
K10avsata_u:6256: saṃpannasasya iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6257: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upagatas tayaiva vibhūtyā
K10avsata_u:6258: tasyām eva rātrau rājño bimbisārasya sakāśam upasaṃkramya sarvaṃ rājakulam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya
K10avsata_u:6262: atha rājā prabuddhaḥ paśyati tam udāram avabhāsaṃ taṃ ca devaputram* /
K10avsata_u:6263: dṛṣṭvā prītamanās taṃ papraccha kas tvam iti /
K10avsata_u:6265: ahaṃ sa dṛṣṭyāśīviṣo bhagavatā tatrodyāne vinītaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6267: bhagavantaṃ ca me paryupāsya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:6269: gatvā tad udyānam amukasmāt pradeśān mahānidhānam utpāṭya mama nāmnā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojaya,
K10avsata_u:6272: athāśīviṣapūrvako devaputro rājñas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ //
K10avsata_u:6273: atha sa rājā bimbisāras tasyām eva rātrau māgadhānāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ nivedya tad
K10avsata_u:6274: udyānaṃ gatvā nidhānam utpāṭya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsyaṃ bhojayitvā
K10avsata_u:6276: kāni bhagavann aśīviṣapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni,
K10avsata_u:6286: kāśyape ca samykasaṃbuddhe upāsakabhūtena śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:6289: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye āśīviṣasya /
K10avsata_u:6291: yas tasyaiva devaputrasyety evaṃ te mahārāja śikṣitavyam* /
K10avsata_u:6292: atha rājā bimbisāro bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
K10avsata_u:6294: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:6297: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:6298: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:6304: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:6305: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:6306: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:6308: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:6312: tasmād bhavatu asya dārakasya candra iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:6313: sa ca tena brāhmaṇena kṛcchreṇa labdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6316: sa sarvalokaprahlādanakaratvād brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ kṛtsnaṃ nagaram anvāhiṇḍyata iti /
K10avsata_u:6317: sa brāhmaṇas tasmin bhūyasyā mātrayādhyavasito nityam eva kramasthānaśayyāsu saṃrakṣaṇaparo 'vatiṣṭhite /
K10avsata_u:6319: atha sa brāhmaṇadārako 'nāthapiṇḍadasaṃsargāj jetavanaṃ gatvā buddhavacanaṃ śṛṇoti /
K10avsata_u:6321: sa cālpāyuṣkaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ //
K10avsata_u:6322: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
K10avsata_u:6325: paśyati manuṣyebhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
K10avsata_u:6330: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:6333: divyānām utpalakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam
K10avsata_u:6334: udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:6335: atha bhagavān brāhmaṇapūrvakasya devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
K10avsata_u:6336: yāṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* /
K10avsata_u:6338: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:6356: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // AVŚ_52.3 // iti
K10avsata_u:6361: atha brāhmaṇapūrvako devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6363: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā hi vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ //
K10avsata_u:6367: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātryāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
K10avsata_u:6369: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
K10avsata_u:6370: api yo 'sāv ekaputro 'sya brāhmaṇasya putro 'lpāyuṣkaḥ kālagataḥ,
K10avsata_u:6371: sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6375: atra cāntare sa brāhmaṇas tam ekaputrakam iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpaṃ kṣāntam apratikūlaṃ śmaśāne nirhṛtyotsaṅge kṛtvā karuṇakaruṇaṃ vilapan*
K10avsata_u:6377: jñātayaḥ subahv api śokavinodanaṃ kurvaṇā na śaknuvanty utthāpayitum* /
K10avsata_u:6378: sa kākakuraraśvaśṛgālagṛdhraparivṛtaḥ prakīrṇakeśībhiḥ strībhir anugato mahājanakāyena codvīkṣyamāṇas tiṣṭhati /
K10avsata_u:6379: tato 'sya putro devabhūtaḥ pitaraṃ paridevamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ pituḥ śokavinodanārtham ṛṣiveṣadhāriṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya śmaśānasamīpe pañcatapāvasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6380: atha sa brāhmaṇas tam ṛṣiṃ papraccha:
K10avsata_u:6381: bho maharṣe anena tapasā kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
K10avsata_u:6383: sauvarṇaś ca me rathaḥ syān nānāratnavicitraḥ,
K10avsata_u:6386: so 'haṃ taṃ ratham abhiruhyemāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anvāhiṇḍeyeti /
K10avsata_u:6389: na lapsyase 'pi tat sthānaṃ paramatapasāpi hi // AVŚ_52.5 // iti //
K10avsata_u:6391: tvaṃ ca punar anena mṛtakuṇapenāśucinā paramadurgandhena śavena kāṣṭhabhūtena kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
K10avsata_u:6397: na lapsyase 'pi taṃ putraṃ ruditena hi kiṃ tava // AVŚ_52.6 // iti //
K10avsata_u:6398: tatas tasya brāhmaṇasya bhūtam ṛṣivacanam avagatya prasādo jātaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6401: tata ṛṣis taṃ veṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā pitaram āha:
K10avsata_u:6402: ahaṃ te sa ekaputrako bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ /
K10avsata_u:6405: ehi tvaṃ tāta buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha,
K10avsata_u:6406: apy eva tvam api saṃsārasamatikrāmaṃ kuryā iti //
K10avsata_u:6407: atha sa brāhmaṇo mṛtaśarīram apahāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6408: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:6410: yāṃ śrutvā tena brāhmaṇeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* /
K10avsata_u:6411: sa labdhodayo labdhalābho bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāntaḥ //
K10avsata_u:6412: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:6414: yāvad anena devaputreṇāyaṃ pitā śokaṃ vinodya satyadarśane pratiṣṭhāpita iti /
K10avsata_u:6416: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad anenaitarhi dṛṣṭasatyena pitā paritrātaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6417: yat tv anena atīte 'dhvani pṛthagjanena satā yāvat trir api pitā jīvitād vyavaropyamāṇaḥ paritrātaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6419: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:6420: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ pāradārikaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6424: tataḥ putreṇa yāvat trir api rājānaṃ vijñāpya iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditaḥ //
K10avsata_u:6426: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena pāradārika āsīt*,
K10avsata_u:6430: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena pitāputrābhyāṃ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti /
K10avsata_u:6436: śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti nirvāṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6439: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:6442: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:6443: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair

K10avsata_u:6799: ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam
K10avsata_u:6802: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya
K10avsata_u:6805: yāvad asau bhagavaddarśanotkaṇṭhitaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6810: aśrauṣīd bhagavān divāvihāropagato divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa rājā bimbisāra utkaṇṭhita iti /
K10avsata_u:6811: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
K10avsata_u:6812: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛtt{ak}ānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:6817: trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
K10avsata_u:6818: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ,
K10avsata_u:6819: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:6827: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_56.1 //
K10avsata_u:6828: tato bhagavān rājño bimbisārasyānugrahārthaṃ trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭḥitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaram janapadacārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6829: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carann anyatamaṃ vanaṣaṇḍam anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6830: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe manuṣyapralāpī śukaḥ prativasati /
K10avsata_u:6837: tato bhagavāñ chukasyānugrahārthaṃ yatra vkṣe śukasyālayas tatra tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ saṃstīrya paryaṅkeṇa niṣaṇṇaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6839: tataḥ śukaḥ kṛtsnāṃ rātrim itas tatas taṃ vanaṣaṇḍaṃ paryaṭati,
K10avsata_u:6840: mā haiva kaścid bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ viheṭhayiṣyatīti manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yakṣo vā rākṣaso vā śvāpadaś caṇḍaśṛṅgo veti /
K10avsata_u:6841: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣīṇīkṛtya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6843: nāsti me vibhavo yena bhagavantam abhyarcayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:6849: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:6855: tad arhati devo bhaktaṃ sajjīkartum iti /
K10avsata_u:6856: tato rājā tvaritatvaritaṃ prāsādād avatīryāmātyagaṇaparivṛto bhagavato 'rthena āsanakāni prajñapya chatradhvajapatākābhir vicitraiś ca gandhapuṣpadhūpair bhagavantaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:6857: tato rājñā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho mahatā satkāreṇa praveśitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6860: yad bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgha evaṃvibhūtis tat sarvaṃ māmāgamya /
K10avsata_u:6861: iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto rājñaḥ purastād itaś cāmutaś ca paryaṭan* śyenakenāpahṛtya pañcatvam āpāditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6864: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
K10avsata_u:6867: sa paśyati: tiryagbhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6870: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
K10avsata_u:6871: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:6872: atha śukapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ
K10avsata_u:6873: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām
K10avsata_u:6874: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ
K10avsata_u:6875: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:6876: atha bhagavāṃś chukapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
K10avsata_u:6877: yāṃ śrutvā śukapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:6879: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:6897: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // AVŚ_56.4 //
K10avsata_u:6903: atha śukapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6904: sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6905: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ //
K10avsata_u:6909: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātrau bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
K10avsata_u:6911: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:6912: api tu dṛṣṭaḥ sa yuṣmābhiḥ śuko yena vayaṃ tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe rātriṃ vastum upanimintritā iti?
K10avsata_u:6919: kāni bhadanta śukapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena śukeṣūpapannaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6923: śukapūrvakeṇaiva bhikṣavo devaputreṇa pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
K10avsata_u:6926: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:6930: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:6931: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
K10avsata_u:6932: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_56.6 //
K10avsata_u:6933: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:6934: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
K10avsata_u:6935: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:6936: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati sma /
K10avsata_u:6944: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:6947: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:6951: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:6954: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:6955: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:6959: atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6960: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā vijñāpayati:
K10avsata_u:6961: yat khalu deva jānīyāś ciradṛṣṭo 'smābhir bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:6965: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kutra bhagavān etarhi varṣā upagata iti?
K10avsata_u:6967: śrutaṃ me deva bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagata iti //
K10avsata_u:6968: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena anāthapiṇḍadādyaiś ca paurajānapadāmātyair anyatamaḥ puruṣo dūtyenāhūyoktaḥ:
K10avsata_u:6971: upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
K10avsata_u:6972: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha alpātaṅkaṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
K10avsata_u:6974: rājā bhadanta kauśalaḥ śrāvastīnivāsinaś ca paurā ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam* /
K10avsata_u:6978: sādhu bhagavāñ chrāvastīm āgacched anukampām upādāyeti /
K10avsata_u:6979: evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya sāmātyapaurajānapadasya pratiśrutya śrāvastīto 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇo rājagṛhaṃ nagaram anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6980: tataḥ pūrvaṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaram avalokya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6981: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:6982: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ sa puruṣo bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:6983: rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalaḥ śrāvastīnivāsinaś ca paurā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ pṛcchanti,
K10avsata_u:6984: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
K10avsata_u:6988: sādhu bhagavāñ chrāvastīm āgacched anukampām upādāyeti /
K10avsata_u:6990: sacen me bhoḥ puruṣa rājā bimbisāro 'nujñāsyati;
K10avsata_u:6992: tataḥ sa dūto rājānaṃ bimbisāram anujñāpya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:6996: atha bhagavāṃs trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ mahatā parivāreṇa śrāvastyabhimukho 'bhijagāma
K10avsata_u:6998: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ padbhyāṃ saṃprasthitam* /
K10avsata_u:6999: tato rathād avatīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:7004: vicarāmi mahīṃ kṛtsnām akṣataḥ kleśakaṇṭhakaiḥ // AVŚ_57.1 // iti //
K10avsata_u:7008: atha bhagavān dūtasyānugrahārtham ṛddhyā rathasyopari sthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7011: atha rājā sāmātyaḥ sapaurajānapado bhagavantaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:7012: tatraiva ca jetavane rātriṃvāsam upagato dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:7013: sa ca dūto 'lpāyuṣko dharmaṃ śrutvā tasyām eva rātrau kālagataḥ /
K10avsata_u:7014: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ //
K10avsata_u:7015: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
K10avsata_u:7018: sa paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7021: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
K10avsata_u:7022: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:7023: atha dūtapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ
K10avsata_u:7024: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām
K10avsata_u:7025: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ
K10avsata_u:7026: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:7027: atha bhagavān dūtapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
K10avsata_u:7028: yāṃ śrutvā dūtapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7030: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7048: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // AVŚ_57.4 //
K10avsata_u:7054: atha dūtapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7055: sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7056: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā hi vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ //
K10avsata_u:7057: tato rājā prasenajid upariprāsādatalagatas tam udāram avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhagavantaṃ papracha:
K10avsata_u:7058: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
K10avsata_u:7060: na mahārāja brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
K10avsata_u:7061: api tu tāvako dūtaḥ sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7066: aho buddho aho dharmaḥ aho saṃgho yatra nāma parīttaṃ karma kṛtvā mahān vipāka iti /
K10avsata_u:7067: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
K10avsata_u:7073: ye kecid satvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo va saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7077: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /
K10avsata_u:7080: ye kecid dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā,
K10avsata_u:7084: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /
K10avsata_u:7087: ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā pariṣado vā,
K10avsata_u:7091: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /
