K10avsata_u:7096: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:7097: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:7101: saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carann anyatamavanaṣaṇḍam anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7102: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe mahān mahiṣīyūthaḥ prativasati,
K10avsata_u:7104: yāvat tatrānyatamo mahiṣo balavān parameṇa balena samanvāgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:7107: tato mahiṣīpālair bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho dūrata eva dṛṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7108: tatas tair uccaiḥ śabdair uktaḥ: bhagavan,
K10avsata_u:7114: athāsau duṣṭamahiṣo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā lāṅgūlam unnāmya yena bhagavāṃs tena pradhāvitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7115: tato bhagavatā purastāt pañca kesariṇaḥ saṭādhāriṇaḥ (Speyer:
K10avsata_u:7118: vāme dakṣiṇe ca pārśve dvāv agniskandhau,
K10avsata_u:7120: tataḥ sa mahiṣaḥ samantato mahābhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavataḥ pādau niśritya dīnavadanaś ca bhagavantaṃ prekṣyate (Speyer: prekṣate) /
K10avsata_u:7121: tato 'sya bhagavatā tanmayyā gatyās tanmayyā yonyās tribhiḥ pādair dharmo deśitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:7127: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:7130: sādhu prasādyatāṃ cittaṃ mayi kāruṇike jine /
K10avsata_u:7131: tiryagyoniṃ virāgyeha tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // AVŚ_58.2// iti //
K10avsata_u:7134: sa āśu kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ //
K10avsata_u:7135: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
K10avsata_u:7138: sa paśyati: tiryagbhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7141: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
K10avsata_u:7142: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:7143: atha mahiṣapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ
K10avsata_u:7144: kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:7145: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ taṃ vanaṣaṇḍam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ
K10avsata_u:7146: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:7147: atha bhagavān mahiṣapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
K10avsata_u:7148: yāṃ śrutvā mahiṣapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7150: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na
K10avsata_u:7152: devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7170: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // AVŚ_58.5 //
K10avsata_u:7175: atha tair mahiṣīpālaiḥ sa udāro 'vabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7178: rātrau divyam avabhāsaṃ kṛtvā bhagavatsakāśam anuprāpta iti /
K10avsata_u:7180: sa eṣa bhavanto mahiṣo mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7184: tatas te mahiṣīpālāḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ:
K10avsata_u:7185: āścaryaṃ yan nāma ayaṃ tiryagyonigato bhūtvā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āsādya deveṣūpapannaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7187: kathaṃ nāma vayaṃ manuṣyabhūtā viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchemeti?
K10avsata_u:7188: tatas te buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya bhagavato 'ntike pravrajitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:7189: tair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* //
K10avsata_u:7190: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:7191: kāni bhadanta mahiṣapūrvikeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena mahiṣeṣūpapannaḥ?
K10avsata_u:7192: ebhiś ca mahiṣīpālaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yenāhartvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*?
K10avsata_u:7194: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:7197: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:7201: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:7203: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_58.7 //
K10avsata_u:7204: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ
K10avsata_u:7205: kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
K10avsata_u:7210: tatra ca kāle bhikṣūṇāṃ viniścaye vartamāne tripiṭo bhikṣuḥ pañcaśataparivāro viniścaye 'avasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7225: yan mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena deveṣūpapannaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7227: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye mahiṣasya mahiṣīpālāṇāṃ ca /
K10avsata_u:7228: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaiva devaputrabhūtasya /
K10avsata_u:7231: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:7233: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:7234: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:7238: tena khalu punaḥ samayena devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānām upoṣadho nāma devaputro 'sakṛdasakṛd bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmati dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:7239: yāvad apareṇa samayena upoṣadho nāma devaputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7240: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:7241: atha bhagavān upoṣadhasya devaputrasya āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
K10avsata_u:7242: yāṃ śrutvā upoṣadhena devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7244: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7263: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // AVŚ_59.3 //
K10avsata_u:7268: tato bhikṣavaḥ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktā viharanti /
K10avsata_u:7271: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
K10avsata_u:7273: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:7274: api tu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu upoṣadho nāma devaputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7277: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:7278: kuto bhadanta upoṣadhasya devaputrasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ceti /
K10avsata_u:7283: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:7284: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrakalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ
K10avsata_u:7285: kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
K10avsata_u:7286: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:7287: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:7288: yāvad apareṇa samayena kṛkī rājā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati paryupāsanāya /
K10avsata_u:7289: yāvad dvau brāhmaṇāu ṛṣipatanaṃ gatau kenacit karaṇīyena /
K10avsata_u:7290: tābhyāṃ rājā drṣṭo mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena /
K10avsata_u:7294: kiṃ karma kṛtvā yac cintayati yat prārthayate tad asya sarvaṃ samṛdhyatīti /
K10avsata_u:7297: yac cintayati yat prārthayate tad asya sarvaṃ samṛdhyatīti /
K10avsata_u:7298: tatas tau brāhmaṇau āṣāḍhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśād aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upalabhyopoṣitau /
K10avsata_u:7300: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kṛkeḥ putratvam abhyupagataḥ /
K10avsata_u:7305: tasyopari divase divase saptakṛtvaḥ taptavālukā nipatati yayā so 'sthiśeṣaḥ kriyate /
K10avsata_u:7307: kasyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ kasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalavipāko yenāham īdṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhavāmīti /
K10avsata_u:7308: sa paśyati: aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ me upavāsaṃ samādāya śikṣāśaithilyaṃ kṛtaṃ yenāham īdṛśaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
K10avsata_u:7309: yena punaḥ samādāya rakṣitaṃ tena rājyaṃ pratilabdham iti /
K10avsata_u:7314: apy eva nāma nāgayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti /
K10avsata_u:7315: tato nāgavarṇam antardhāpya brāhmaṇavarṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7322: tato rājā bhītas trastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo hiraṇyapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa:
K10avsata_u:7328: atra me stambhe pitā asakṛdgandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtavān* /
K10avsata_u:7334: saha pañca copāsakaśikṣāpadāni saptatriṃśac ca bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ /
K10avsata_u:7335: tato rājñā tasya nāgasyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upavāso likhitvā dattaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7336: ṛṣipatananivāsibhiś ca dvādaśabhir ṛṣisahasraiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ pratyakṣīkṛtāḥ /
K10avsata_u:7337: sa ca nāgo 'ṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upoṣya sthalam udgamyotsṛṣṭakāyo 'vasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7338: so 'nāhāratāṃ pratipaṇṇaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā pañcaśataparivāraḥ praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7341: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:7343: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:7344: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:7348: śrāvastyāṃ rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca
K10avsata_u:7349: subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ
K10avsata_u:7352: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā prasenajit kauśalo jetavanaṃ nirgato bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya /
K10avsata_u:7353: rājñā ca pañcālena rājñaḥ prasenajit kauśalasya prābhṛtaṃ pañca haṃsaśatāni preṣitāni /
K10avsata_u:7354: yadā rājā jetavanaṃ nirgatas tadā tāni pañca haṃsaśatāny upanāmitāni /
K10avsata_u:7355: tato rājñā prasenajitā teṣām abhayapradānaṃ datvā tatraiva jetavanae samutsṛṣṭāṇi /
K10avsata_u:7359: bhagavān api tebhya ālopam anuprayacchanti mahāśrāvakāś ca /
K10avsata_u:7362: yadā bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K10avsata_u:7363: tadā te haṃsā bhagavatsakāśaṃ gatvā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
K10avsata_u:7364: te cālpāyuṣkāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ //
K10avsata_u:7365: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
K10avsata_u:7368: paśyanti haṃsebhyaś cyutāḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
K10avsata_u:7370: atha haṃsapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitracūḍāḥ

K10avsata_u:7372: puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ
K10avsata_u:7373: puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:7374: atha bhagavān haṃsapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
K10avsata_u:7375: yāṃ śrutvā haṃsapūrvibhir devaputrair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam* /
K10avsata_u:7377: sasyasaṃpannā iva karṣakāḥ śūrā iva vijitasaṃgrāmāḥ,
K10avsata_u:7378: sarvarogaparimuktā ivāturāḥ yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatās tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ //
K10avsata_u:7382: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ?
K10avsata_u:7384: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:7385: api tu dṛṣṭās te yuṣmābhir bhikṣavas tāni pañca haṃsaśatāni rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena ihotsṛṣṭāni?
K10avsata_u:7392: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:7393: kāni bhadanta haṃsapūrvakair devaputraiḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni yena haṃseṣūpapannāḥ,
K10avsata_u:7394: kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yena deveṣūpapannāḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti?
K10avsata_u:7396: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:7399: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:7403: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:7405: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_60.1 //
K10avsata_u:7407: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo
K10avsata_u:7408: nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10avsata_u:7410: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:7413: yan mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena deveṣūpapannāḥ /
K10avsata_u:7414: yat pariśiṣṭāni śikṣāpadāni tena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti /
K10avsata_u:7415: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7418: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:7422: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:7426: suvarṇābhaḥ sugandhiś ca vapuṣmān balavān priyaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7430: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:7431: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:7435: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:7437: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:7438: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:7439: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:7440: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇaṃ jāmbūnadaniṣkasadṛśaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7441: suvarṇavarṇayā cānena prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam* /
K10avsata_u:7442: taddarśanān mātāpitarāv anye ca kutūhalābhyāgatāḥ satvāḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:7445: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:7448: yasmād anena jātena suvarṇavarṇayā prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam*,
K10avsata_u:7449: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya suvarṇābha iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:7450: suvarṇābho dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:7451: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:7453: sa ca paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ //
K10avsata_u:7454: yāvad apareṇa samayena rūpamadamatto bahir adhiṣṭhānasya krīḍati /
K10avsata_u:7456: tatas tena suvarṇābhena dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca:
K10avsata_u:7458: tair uktam*: nyagrodhārāmaṃ gacchāmo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ draṣṭum iti /
K10avsata_u:7459: suvarṇābhasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ nāma śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭani,
K10avsata_u:7462: yanv aham api buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:7464: tatas tatra dadarśa suvarṇābhakumāro buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
K10avsata_u:7465: samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ
K10avsata_u:7470: sa bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:7472: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7474: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:7475: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K10avsata_u:7477: tato bhagavān gajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasārya suvarṇābhadārakam idam avocat*: ehi kumāra,
K10avsata_u:7479: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7480: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthāv evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena // AVŚ_61.1 //
K10avsata_u:7481: yāvat saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrur dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpanneryāpathaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7483: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:7486: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7487: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7488: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:7489: kāni bhadanta suvarṇābhena karmāṇi kṛtāni yenaivaṃrūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ pravrajya ca acirād (Speyer: cāciraṃ)
K10avsata_u:7492: suvarṇābhenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:7495: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:7499: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:7500: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
K10avsata_u:7501: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_61.2 //
K10avsata_u:7502: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka
K10avsata_u:7503: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:7505: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7506: tato rājñā bandhumatā bhagavataḥ śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaḥ stūpaś catūratnamayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena
K10avsata_u:7509: yāvad anyatamo gṛhapatis tasmin stūpamahe vartamāne nirgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:7510: tena tasmāt stūpāt sauvarṇavarṇa ādarśaḥ patito dṛṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7511: sa tenāvataṃsakaṃ kārayitvā tatra stūpe āropitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7512: gandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
K10avsata_u:7513: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyāmi,
K10avsata_u:7516: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatir āsīt*,
K10avsata_u:7518: yat tena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe kārāḥ kṛtāḥ,
K10avsata_u:7520: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tad ihaiva janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7521: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7524: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:7528: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************

K10avsata_u:7531: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:7535: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ kulaputraḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī
K10avsata_u:7537: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:7538: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko atikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
K10avsata_u:7539: tasya mukhān nīlotpalagandho vāti sarvaśarīrāc candanagandhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7540: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:7545: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sugandhir iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:7546: sugandhir dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:7547: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:7549: sa pūrvahetubalādhānāc chrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ /

K10avsata_u:7556: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:7560: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:7561: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:7562: yāṃ śrutvā sugandhidārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7563: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /

K10avsata_u:7568: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //

K10avsata_u:7589: tatrānyatamena gṛhapatinā prasādajātena vicitrair gandhaiḥ pralepaṃ datvā dhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:

K10avsata_u:7665: tatra ca rājñā bandumatā saputravargeṇa sāmātyagaṇaparivṛtena stūpamahaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7666: yāvad anyatamasmin divase 'nyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ stūpāṅgaṇaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7669: tatas tena buddhaguṇān anusmṛtya prasādajātena saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvā stūpaḥ saṃmṛṣṭo nirmālyaṃ cāpanītam* /
K10avsata_u:7670: tato 'pagatarajaṃ stūpaṃ nirmalaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasādajātaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
K10avsata_u:7671: anenāhaṃ kuśalena cittotpādena caivaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyāmīty evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:7675: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena daridraḥ puruṣa āsīt*,
K10avsata_u:7679: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ teneha janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7680: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7683: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:7687: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:7689: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:7690: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:7694: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:7696: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:7697: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrāntapauruṣabalaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7698: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:7702: prāptaṃ syād asya balavān iti nāma /
K10avsata_u:7703: balavān dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:7704: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:7706: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ //
K10avsata_u:7708: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:7712: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:7713: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:7714: yāṃ śrutvā balavatā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7715: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7716: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ
K10avsata_u:7719: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7720: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:7721: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:7722: kāni bhadanta balavatā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni yenāsyāśrayo balavān*,
K10avsata_u:7725: balavataiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:7728: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:7732: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:7734: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_64.1 //
K10avsata_u:7735: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka
K10avsata_u:7736: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:7738: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7739: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaḥ stūpaś catūratnamayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
K10avsata_u:7740: tatra stūpamahe vartamāne mahājanakāyena nṛtyatā gāyatā ca stūpaṃ pāṃsunā malinīkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7743: tatas tena gṛhapatinā buddhaguṇān anusmṛtya prasādajātena tailavyāmiśro gandhakāyo dattaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7746: evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //

K10avsata_u:7750: yad anena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe kārāḥ kṛtās tena balavān saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:7751: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7752: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:7755: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:7759: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //

K10avsata_u:7767: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:7769: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /

K10avsata_u:7776: tasmād asya priya iti nāma bhavatu /
K10avsata_u:7777: priyo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām*

K10avsata_u:7789: yāṃ śrutvā priyeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:7790: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /

K10avsata_u:7817: yāvad apareṇa samyena vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādeṣu nānāvicitriteṣu puṣpeṣu prādurbhūteṣv anyatamo gṛhapatī rājānaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa:
K10avsata_u:7818: icchāmy ahaṃ devasahāyo vipaśyinaḥ stūpe puṣpāropaṇaṃ kartum iti /
K10avsata_u:7821: yāvat tena gṛhapatinā rājāmātyapauruṣaiḥ sahāyena ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇena vicitrapuṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā vipaśyinaḥ stūpe puṣpārohaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:7822: yatrānekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiś cittāni prasādya kuśalamūlāni samāropitāni //

K10avsata_u:8183: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /

K10avsata_u:8187: yadāsau kumāro jātas tadā devatābhir divyāḥ patākāḥ samantata ucchrāpitāḥ,
K10avsata_u:8190: sarvaṃ ca kapilavastu nagaraṃ yaśasā āpūritam*,

K10avsata_u:8207: prasādajātaś ca bhagavatpādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /

K10avsata_u:8306: saptame divase suprabhā dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati,

K10avsata_u:8740: yenāḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śrutidharā ca saṃvṛtteti /
K10avsata_u:8742: somayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:8745: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:8749: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:8751: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_74.1 //
K10avsata_u:8752: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:8753: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
K10avsata_u:8754: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:8755: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:8756: yāvad anyatarā brāhmaṇadārikā bhagavataḥ kāsyapasya śāsane pravrajitā /
K10avsata_u:8757: tayā tatroddiṣṭaṃ paṭhitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:8758: na tu śaktitaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ jñānam utpādayitum* /
K10avsata_u:8760: sā bhagavatā kāśyapena śrutadharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
K10avsata_u:8761: tataḥ somayā bhikṣuṇyā maraṇakāle praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
K10avsata_u:8762: yathā me upādhyāyikā śrutadharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā,
K10avsata_u:8763: evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapenottaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
K10avsata_u:8764: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
K10avsata_u:8765: tasya śāsane pravrajitā bhagavatā śākyamuninā śrutidharīṇām agrā nirdiśyeya //
K10avsata_u:8766: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau brāhmaṇadārikā āsīt*,
K10avsata_u:8772: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:8775: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:8779: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:8782: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:8783: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:8787: tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare girivalgusamāgamo nāma parva pratyupasthitam* /
K10avsata_u:8788: tatra sarvebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyo mahānagarebhyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatati /
K10avsata_u:8790: tasya duhitā kuvalayā nāma abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā /
K10avsata_u:8798: asti bhavanto rājagṛhe nagare kaścin manuṣyabhūto yo me rūpeṇa samo viśiṣṭataro veti /
K10avsata_u:8804: tatas tadvacanam upaśrutya kuvalayā sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
K10avsata_u:8805: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā nṛtyati gāyati vādayate strīliṅgāni strīcihnāni strīnimittāni copadarśayati /
K10avsata_u:8806: ye sarāgā bhikṣavas te tayā saṃbhrāmitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:8807: tato bhagavān rāgabahulānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ vinayanārthaṃ kuvalayāyāś ca rūpayauvanamadāpanayanārthaṃ tadrūpān ṛddhyabhisaṃkārān abhisaṃkṛtavān*,
K10avsata_u:8808: yena kuvalayā jīrṇā vṛddhā palitaśiraskā khaṇḍadantā kubjagopānasīvaktrā nirmitā /
K10avsata_u:8809: tatkālasamanantaram eva kuvalāyā ātmānaṃ bībhatsam abhivīkṣya yo 'sau rūpayauvanamadaḥ sa prativigataḥ /
K10avsata_u:8811: tataḥ kuvalayā apagatamadā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ vijñāpitavatī:
K10avsata_u:8812: sādhu me bhagavāṃs tathā dharmaṃ deśayatu,
K10avsata_u:8816: atha bhagavān kuvalāyās teṣāṃ cāvītarāgāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tāthavidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān*,
K10avsata_u:8817: yāṃ śrutvā kaiścid viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:8822: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:8825: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā
K10avsata_u:8828: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:8829: tair api naṭais tena saṃvegena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* //
K10avsata_u:8830: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:8831: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā kuvalayā naṭadārikā rūpayauvanamadamattā jarayā saṃvejya yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā iti /
K10avsata_u:8833: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
K10avsata_u:8835: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena kuvalayā dārikā rūpayauvanamadamattā jarayā
K10avsata_u:8837: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
K10avsata_u:8838: kuvalayā dārikā saṃvejya pañcasu vratapradeśeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitā /
K10avsata_u:8840: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:8841: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ
K10avsata_u:8842: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:8845: yāvad asau rājā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:8846: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:8847: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:8848: dāriko jāto abhirūpo darśanīyo prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaṇaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
K10avsata_u:8849: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:8854: tasmād bhavatu dārikasya kāśisundara iti nāma /
K10avsata_u:8855: kāśisundaro dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:8856: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:8859: so 'nekadoṣaduṣṭam anarthamūlaṃ rājatvaṃ viditvā ṛiṣiṣu pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:8860: sa ca himavatkandare prativasati phalamūlāṃbubhakto 'jinavalkaladhārī agnihotrikaḥ /
K10avsata_u:8861: yāvad apareṇa samayena phalānām artham anyataraṃ parvatakandaram anupravṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:8863: ṛiṣikumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃraktā nṛtyati gāyati vādayati strīcihnāni strīnimittāni strīvikrīḍitāny upadarśayati /
K10avsata_u:8864: yāvat kāśisundareṇa ṛṣiṇā tasyā dārikāyā dharmadeśanā dattā /
K10avsata_u:8866: prathamas te svaro madhuraḥ snigdhaś ca,
K10avsata_u:8876: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena ṛṣikumāro babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ /
K10avsata_u:8879: kāni bhadanta kuvalayayā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
K10avsata_u:8881: kāni karmaṇi kṛtāni yenārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam api /
K10avsata_u:8883: kuvalayayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:8886: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:8890: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:8892: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_75.1 //
K10avsata_u:8894: nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10avsata_u:8899: rājñā bhagavataḥ sakāśāt satyadarśanaṃ kṛtvā naṭācāryāṇām ājñā dattā:
K10avsata_u:8900: bauddhaṃ nāṭakaṃ mama purastān nāṭayitavyam iti /
K10avsata_u:8903: tataḥ sarvanaṭair bauddhaṃ nāṭakaṃ vicārya muninirjitaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:8904: yāvad rājño 'mātyagaṇaparivṛtasya purato naṭā nāṭayitum ārabdhāḥ /
K10avsata_u:8907: tato rājñā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditena naṭācāryapramukho naṭagaṇo mahatā dhanaskandhenācchāditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:8908: tatas te bhagavacchāsane labdhaprasādā dānapradānāni datvā samyakpraṇidhānaṃ cakruḥ:
K10avsata_u:8909: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca anāgatān buddhān ārāgayema,
K10avsata_u:8911: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo ye te naṭāḥ,
K10avsata_u:8913: yad ebhis tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:8914: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:8917: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:8921: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:8925: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:8926: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:8930: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ rājā brahmadatto rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ
K10avsata_u:8931: ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ
K10avsata_u:8934: yāvad asau rājā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:8935: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:8936: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:8937: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā /
K10avsata_u:8938: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:8941: yasmād iyaṃ kāśirājasya duhitā surūpā ca,
K10avsata_u:8943: kāśisundarī dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:8944: sā 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:8946: yadā kāśisundarī dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā,
K10avsata_u:8947: tadā prātisīmaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ rājabhī rājñe brahmadattasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*:
K10avsata_u:8948: śrutam asmābhir yathā tava duhitā jāteti /
K10avsata_u:8949: tad arhasy asmākaṃ putrāṇām anyatarasmai anupradātum iti /
K10avsata_u:8950: tato rājā śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaś cintayati:
K10avsata_u:8954: kāśisundarī dārikā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
K10avsata_u:8955: tayā pitā śokārto dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca:
K10avsata_u:8960: saptame divase kāśisundarī dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:8961: yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti /
K10avsata_u:8962: yāvat saptame divase ṣaṭ prātisīmā rājānaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:8963: kāśisundary api ratham abhiruhya kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhapaṭaṃ hastena gṛhītvā rājasabhāṃ gatvovāca:
K10avsata_u:8967: ya eṣa eva me bhagavān buddhaḥ paṭe likhitas tasyāhaṃ śrāvikā /
K10avsata_u:8969: yāvad ṛṣipatanaṃ gatvā bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:8970: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣu{ṇī}bhāvam* /
K10avsata_u:8974: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ
K10avsata_u:8976: viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:8977: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
K10avsata_u:8978: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:8979: tatas te rājaputrās tasyā rūpayauvanaśobhāṃ samanusmṛtya rāgamadamattāḥ pravrajitām api prārthayituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
K10avsata_u:8980: sā taiḥ prārthyamānā vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam (Speyer:
K10avsata_u:8984: tatas te rāputrā atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayitum ārabdhāḥ:
K10avsata_u:8987: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān parimuñjīthā iti /
K10avsata_u:8988: tataḥ kāśisundarī dārikā gaganatalād avatīrya janakāyasya purastāt sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī,
K10avsata_u:8989: yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ //
K10avsata_u:8990: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:8995: kāśisundaryaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:8998: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:9002: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:9004: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_76.1 //
K10avsata_u:9005: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe triṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:9006: prajāyāṃ kanakamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
K10avsata_u:9007: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:9008: (The name of the place is missing.) /
K10avsata_u:9009: yāvat tatrānyatarā rājaduhitā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā ātmahitaparahitapratipannā /
K10avsata_u:9010: tayā vihāraṃ kārayitvā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ paripūrya bhagavate saśrāvakasaṃghāya pratipāditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9011: kanakamunau ca samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajya daśavarṣasahasrāṇi maitrī bhavitā //
K10avsata_u:9012: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yā sā rājaduhitā,
K10avsata_u:9014: yad anayā vihāraḥ pratipāditas tenābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:9015: yat kanakamunau bhagavati pravrajya daśavarṣasahasrāṇi maitrī bhāvitā tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:9016: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:9019: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:9023: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:9026: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:9027: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:9031: śrāvastyāṃ puṣyo nāma śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:9033: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:9034: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:9035: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:9036: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā muktāmālayā śirasi baddhayā /
K10avsata_u:9037: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:9040: yasmād asyā jātamātrāyā muktamālā śirasi prādurbhūtaṃ,
K10avsata_u:9042: muktā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām*
K10avsata_u:9043: sā 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:9045: yāvan muktā dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:9046: tasyāḥ sā muktāmālā avatāritā punaḥ prādurbhavati /
K10avsata_u:9047: tataḥ sā dārikā kṛpaṇavanīpakān dṛṣṭvā bhāgasaṃvibhāgaṃ karoti /
K10avsata_u:9049: tadā tasyā bahavo yācanakā āgacchanti rājaputrā amātyaputrāḥ śreṣṭhiputrāś ca /
K10avsata_u:9050: tato 'syāḥ pitā śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaś cintayati:
K10avsata_u:9059: yāvad anāthapiṇḍadasya supriyo nāma kanīyaḥ putras tena pitā vijñaptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9063: evaṃ kṛtaṃ sāṃbandhikaṃ yāvajjīvasukhyaṃ kṛtaṃ ca bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:9064: tataḥ puṣyeṇa gṛhapatinā svasyāṃ duhitari so 'rtho niveditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9066: samayato yadīndriyāṇāṃ paripākān mayā saha bhagavacchāsane pravrajati,
K10avsata_u:9069: yāvad ubhāv eva gṛhān niṣkramya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitau /
K10avsata_u:9070: tābhyāṃ yujyamānābhyāṃ ghaṭamānābhyāṃ vyāyacchamānābhyām idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:9075: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyau mānyāv abhivādyau ca saṃvṛttau //
K10avsata_u:9077: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:9078: kāni bhadanta muktayā karmāṇi kṛtāni yena muktāmālayā śirasy ābaddhayā,
K10avsata_u:9081: muktayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:9084: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:9088: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:9090: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_77.1 //
K10avsata_u:9091: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:9092: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
K10avsata_u:9093: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:9094: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:9095: yāvad anyatamaḥ sārthavāhaḥ sa mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9098: tasya ca bhāryā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā /
K10avsata_u:9100: vārāṇasyām anyatamo gṛhaptiḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9102: yanv ahaṃ chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya śāsane pañcavārṣikaṃ kuryām iti /
K10avsata_u:9104: icchāmy ahaṃ chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ samādāpya bhagavataḥ pañcavārṣikaṃ kartum iti /
K10avsata_u:9106: athāsau gṛhapatir hastiskandhārūḍho vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryāṃ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ yācituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9107: yāvat sārthavāhabhāryā muktāhāraṃ śiraso 'vamucya tasmiṃś chandakabhikṣaṇe dattavatī /
K10avsata_u:9108: yāvat sārthavāha āgatas taṃ muktāhāraṃ śiraso 'panītaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavān*:
K10avsata_u:9114: yāvat sārthavāhena puṣkalena mūlyena niṣkrīya tasyai patnyai dattaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9121: tato 'sau dārikā taṃ gṛhītvā prabhūtaṃ puṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā gandhamālyāni ca gṛhītvā ṛṣipatanaṃ gatā /
K10avsata_u:9122: tato gandhakuṭyāṃ gandhapralepaṃ kṛtvā puṣpair ākīrya muktāhāraṃ bhagavato mūrdhni kṣiptavatī /
K10avsata_u:9123: sa sahasā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya mūrdhani sthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9125: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ labhinī syām*,
K10avsata_u:9126: evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:9127: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāhabhāryā,
K10avsata_u:9129: yad anayā bhagavati kāśyape kārāḥ kṛtās tenābhirūpā darśaniyā prāsādikā /
K10avsata_u:9134: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:9137: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:9141: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:9143: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:9144: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:9149: sā ghaṭam ādāya udakārthinī kūpam upasṛptā /
K10avsata_u:9157: yāvat kacaṅgalā pānīyaghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gatā /
K10avsata_u:9158: dadarśa kacaṅgalā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:9163: sā ūrdhvabāhuḥ putra putreti bhagavantaṃ pariṣvaktum ārabdhā /
K10avsata_u:9166: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣava imāṃ vṛddhāṃ vārayata /
K10avsata_u:9168: pañca janmaśatāny eṣā mama mātā āsīn nirantaram* /
K10avsata_u:9169: iyaṃ me putrasnehena gātreṣu samaślikṣata // AVŚ_78.1 //
K10avsata_u:9170: saced eṣā nivāryeta mama gātreṣu śleṣaṇāt* /
K10avsata_u:9171: idānīṃ rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ kaṇṭhād asyāḥ sravet kṣaṇāt* // AVŚ_78.2 //
K10avsata_u:9174: yāvad asau putrasnehaṃ vinodya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:9175: bhagavān cāsyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:9176: yāṃ śrutvā kacaṅgalayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:9178: yat kartavyaṃ hi putreṇa mātur duṣkarakariṇā /
K10avsata_u:9179: tat kṛtaṃ bhavatā mahyaṃ cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇam* // AVŚ_78.4 //
K10avsata_u:9181: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge mikṣe ca te aham* /
K10avsata_u:9182: sthāpitā sarvayatnena viśeṣaḥ sumahān kṛtaḥ // AVŚ_78.5 //
K10avsata_u:9183: yāvad asau svāminam anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā /
K10avsata_u:9184: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:9187: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
K10avsata_u:9188: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:9189: yadā bhagavān bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saṃkṣepeṇoddiśya pratisaṃlayanāya praviśati,
K10avsata_u:9192: eṣāgra me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇāṃ yaduta kacaṅgalā bhikṣuṇīti //
K10avsata_u:9193: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:9194: kāni bhadanta kacaṅgalayā karma kṛtaṃ yena vṛddhā pravrajitā,
K10avsata_u:9195: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena bhagavān paścimagarbhavāsena *{S:
K10avsata_u:9200: kacaṅgalayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:9203: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:9207: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:9209: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_78.1 //
K10avsata_u:9210: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ vartamānasyaiṣā me pañca janmaśatāni mātā āsīt* /
K10avsata_u:9216: kiṃ tv anayā naivaṃvidhāni maheśākhyasaṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi kṛtāni,
K10avsata_u:9222: yat tatrānayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthanakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:9225: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:9228: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:9232: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:9235: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:9236: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:9240: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājā ca brāhmadatta ubhāv apy etau parasparaviruddhau /
K10avsata_u:9241: yāvad rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ svaviṣayaparyantaṃ gatvā kāṣṭhavāṭaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:9242: rājā brahmadattaś ca caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ nadyāḥ kūle kāṣṭhavāṭaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9244: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:9245: brahmadatto 'pi devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:9246: yenaikadivasa eva rājñaḥ prasenajitkauśalasya duhitā jātā,
K10avsata_u:9248: yāvad ubhayor api skandhāvāre brahmadattasya skandhāvāre pravartate yenāyam evaṃvidha utsava iti /
K10avsata_u:9254: tato rājñā brahmadattena rājñaḥ prasenajito dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*:
K10avsata_u:9255: śrutaṃ mayā yathā tava duhitā jāteti /
K10avsata_u:9258: kiṃ tu dīyatām eṣā dārikā mama putrāya /
K10avsata_u:9259: evaṃ kṛte sāṃbandhike yāvajjīvaṃ vairotsargaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:9262: tatas tābhyāṃ parasparaṃ prītau kṛtāyāṃ kṣeme jāte rājñā brahmadattena dārakasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ kṣemaṃkara iti /
K10avsata_u:9263: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena dārikāyā jātāyā jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kṣemeti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:9266: atha sa dārako dārikāyā hārārdhahāramālāṃ badhnan kaṇṭhemaṇīn preṣayati /
K10avsata_u:9278: yasmāt tava janmani mama kṣemaṃ jātam iti /
K10avsata_u:9279: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena rājño brahmadattasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*:
K10avsata_u:9284: yat te kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kuruṣveti /
K10avsata_u:9287: tataḥ kṣemā bhītā trastā saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā śaraṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya jetavanābhimukhī buddhaṃ bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttā / āha ca:
K10avsata_u:9291: mama vidhivadapāyān mocaya tvaṃ hi nāthaḥ
K10avsata_u:9292: śaraṇam upagatāhaṃ lokanāthaṃ hy anāthā // AVŚ_79.1 //
K10avsata_u:9293: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
K10avsata_u:9294: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛtt{ak}ānām ekārakṣāṇām
K10avsata_u:9299: daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya
K10avsata_u:9301: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
K10avsata_u:9302: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:9307: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_79.1 //
K10avsata_u:9308: atha bhagavān kṣemāyā vinayakālam avekṣya ṛddhyā upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9310: yāṃ śrutvā kṣemayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam abhijñānirhāraś ca /
K10avsata_u:9312: yāvat saptame divase vivāhakāle saṃprāpte pratyupasthite rājakumāre anekajanaśatasahāye vedīmadhyagatāyāṃ brāhmaṇena purohitena lājā ghṛtasarpiṣānupradattā
K10avsata_u:9313: tato dārakadārikāhastasaṃśleṣaṇe kriyamāṇe kṣemā paśyatām anekeṣāṃ prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhiruhya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhā /
K10avsata_u:9314: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājā ca brahmadattaḥ kṣemaṃkaraś ca rājakumāro 'nye ca kutūhalābhyāgatāḥ satvā vismayam upagatāḥ pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāḥ:
K10avsata_u:9315: marṣaya bhagini ya ete tvayā dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
K10avsata_u:9316: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān parimuñjīthā iti /
K10avsata_u:9317: atha kṣemā gaganatalād avatīrya janakāyasya puraḥ sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī,
K10avsata_u:9318: yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:9319: tataḥ kṣemā dārikā pitaram anujñāpya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
K10avsata_u:9322: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:9326: saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā
K10avsata_u:9327: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:9329: eṣā agrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ mahāprājñānāṃ mahāpratibhānāṃ yaduta kṣemā bhikṣuṇīti //
K10avsata_u:9330: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:9331: kāni bhadanta kṣemayā karmāṇi kṛtāni yena mahāprājñānāṃ mahāpratibhānām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
K10avsata_u:9333: kṣemayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:9336: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:9340: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:9342: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_79.1 //
K10avsata_u:9343: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:9344: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
K10avsata_u:9345: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:9346: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:9347: yāvat tatrānyatarā śreṣṭhiduhitā bhagavataḥ kāsyapasya śāsane pravrajitā /
K10avsata_u:9348: tayā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya śāsane dānapradānāni dattāni,
K10avsata_u:9352: sā bhagavatā kāśyapena prajñāvatīnām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
K10avsata_u:9355: evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
K10avsata_u:9356: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
K10avsata_u:9357: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajitvā prajñāvatīnām agrā bhaveyam iti //
K10avsata_u:9359: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhiduhitā,
K10avsata_u:9363: yat tayā dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi brahmacaryavāsaḥ paripālitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:9365: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:9368: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:9372: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:9375: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:9376: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:9380: tena khalu samayena prasenajit kauśalo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ
K10avsata_u:9381: ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ
K10avsata_u:9384: yāvat sa rājā anyatamayā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:9385: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:9386: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:9387: dārikā jātā aṣṭādaśabhir daurvarṇikair aṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā /
K10avsata_u:9388: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā virūpeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
K10avsata_u:9391: sa tāṃ virūpeti kṛtvā na pratigṛhṇāti //
K10avsata_u:9392: yāvad dakṣiṇāpathād gaṅgo nāma sārthavāho 'bhyāgato vistīrṇavibhavaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9398: gaṅgaṃ dūtenāhvāpya sā dārikā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā bhāryārthe dattā gaṅgāya /
K10avsata_u:9400: yāvad gaṅgena sārthavāhena dvitīye divase prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ sā dārikā dṛṣṭā paramabībhatsā /
K10avsata_u:9401: yāṃ dṛṣṭvā rājāpekṣayā na śaknoty avamoktum* /
K10avsata_u:9403: yāvad gaṅgaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kasmiṃścit parvaṇy upasthite goṣṭhikānāṃ madhyaṃ gataḥ /
K10avsata_u:9405: saha bhāryayā amukam udyānaṃ yo no yāsyati,
K10avsata_u:9406: sa goṣṭhikānāṃ pañca purāṇaśatāni daṇḍam anupradāsyatīti /
K10avsata_u:9407: tato gaṅgaḥ svagṛham āgatya śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ kṛtvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9412: atha gaṅgo dvāraṃ baddhvā pañca purāṇaśatāni
K10avsata_u:9417: yatra me na ca svāmicittaṃ sukhitam*, na cāham* /
K10avsata_u:9420: tato rajjuṃ gṛhītvā avarakaṃ praviṣṭā udbandhanahetoḥ //
K10avsata_u:9421: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
K10avsata_u:9422: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛtt{ak}ānām ekārakṣāṇām
K10avsata_u:9427: trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
K10avsata_u:9428: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ,
K10avsata_u:9430: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:9435: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_80.1 //
K10avsata_u:9436: tato bhagavatā jetavanāvasthitena kanakavarṇā prabhā utsṛṣṭā,
K10avsata_u:9438: ṛddhyā copasaṃkramya tadgalād udbandhanam avamucya dārikāṃ samāśvāsitavān* /
K10avsata_u:9440: tathāgatasya tathāgatapraveditasya dharmavinayasya manuṣyatvasya āryāyatane pratyājātatvasya indriyair avikalatvasya kuśaladharmacchandakasya āścaryādbhuto loke prādurbhāvaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9441: tato bhagavatā tasyā dārikāyās tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:9442: yāṃ śrutvā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:9443: tato labdhaprasādayā bhagavān bhaktena pratipāditaḥ paṭena cācchāditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9450: sa eṣa īrṣyāprakṛtir daṇḍam utsahate dātum*,
K10avsata_u:9452: yan nu vayam enaṃ viruddhair madyaiḥ pāyayitvā tāḍam ādāya gṛham asya gatvā bhāryāṃ paśyemeti /
K10avsata_u:9453: tatas tais taṃ ghanaghanena viruddhamadyena pānena kṣībaṃ (Speyer: kṣīvaṃ)
K10avsata_u:9454: kṛtvā tāḍam apahṛtya gṛhaṃ gatvā dvāram avamucya dārikā dṛṣṭā /
K10avsata_u:9455: tato dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam upagatāś cintayanti:
K10avsata_u:9457: tatas te punar āgatya madyavaśāt suptam utthāpya
K10avsata_u:9461: tato gaṅgo bhūyasyā mātrayā duḥkhī durmanā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:9465: dvāram avamucya tāṃ bhāryāṃ dṛṣṭavān vanadevatām iva kusumitamadhye 'tīva vibhrājamānām* /
K10avsata_u:9471: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa bhartāram anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā /
K10avsata_u:9472: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:9475: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
K10avsata_u:9476: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā //
K10avsata_u:9477: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:9480: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena virūpā saṃvṛttā,
K10avsata_u:9483: gaṅgarasthayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:9486: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:9490: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:9492: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_80.1 //
K10avsata_u:9493: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamā śreṣṭhibhāryā caṇḍā rabhasā karkaśā /
K10avsata_u:9494: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
K10avsata_u:9495: yāvad anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tad gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo virūpaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9496: sa tayā bahu paribhāṣya gṛhān niṣkāsitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:9497: kenāyaṃ virūpo mama gṛhe praveśita iti /
K10avsata_u:9498: tataḥ pratyekabuddhas tasyā anugrahārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9500: yāvad asau kṣamitaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaś ca /
K10avsata_u:9514: tatrānayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ kṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:9517: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:9520: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:9524: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:9528: samudraḥ sumanāś caiva hiraṇyapāṇis tripiṭena ca /
K10avsata_u:9530: bhadriko rāṣṭrapālaś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:9532: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:9533: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:9539: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:9540: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato buddhir utpannā:
K10avsata_u:9545: ŚvaṇikśataŚ}* yānapātram ādāya bhāryāsahāyo mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9549: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam*:
K10avsata_u:9550: yasmāt samudramadhye jātas tasmāt samudra iti nām /
K10avsata_u:9551: yāvad asau sārthavāhaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsidhhayānapātro mahāsamudrāt pratyāgataḥ //
K10avsata_u:9552: yadā samudro darako mahān saṃvṛttas tadā pitrā sārthavāhatve pratiṣṭhāpya pañcavaṇikchataparivāro *{Vaidya:
K10avsata_u:9554: so 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇo grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīpaṭṭanāny avalokayan samudratīram anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9555: sa pñcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ bhṛtvā pañca pauruṣeyān* gṛhītvā āhāraṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9556: tatas teṣāṃ samudramadhyagatānāṃ kālikāvātena tad vahanam itaś cāmutaś ca paribhrāmyate /
K10avsata_u:9559: tathāpi tad vahanaṃ vāyunā bhrāmyata eva /
K10avsata_u:9560: yāvad anye vaṇijo devatāsahasrāṇy āyācituṃ pravṛttāḥ / āhuś ca:
K10avsata_u:9562: bhuvi ca tuvimagho yo viśvadevo maharṣiḥ /
K10avsata_u:9563: vayam iha maraṇārtā vaḥ prapannāḥ sma śīghraṃ
K10avsata_u:9564: vyasanam idam upetaṃ trātum icchantu sārtham* //
K10avsata_u:9566: tatas teṣām evam api paridevamānānāṃ nāsti kaścit trātā /
K10avsata_u:9568: sa uvāca: kiṃ vo bhavantaḥ ṣaṭ śāstāra anye ca devatāḥ kariṣyanti?
K10avsata_u:9569: buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyakṣadevataṃ bhāvena śaraṇaṃ prapadyadhvam* /
K10avsata_u:9571: tataḥ samudrapramukhāni pañca vaṇikchatāni ekasvareṇa bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannāni //

K10avsata_u:9578: trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:

K10avsata_u:9581: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:9586: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet // AVŚ_81.1 //
K10avsata_u:9587: yāvad bhagavatā jetavanāvasthitena sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
K10avsata_u:9592: yāvat samudraḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsiddhayānapātraḥ pratyāgatas tenaiva maraṇasaṃvegena
K10avsata_u:9593: dānapradānāni datvā bandhujanaṃ samāśvāsya śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakān saṃtarpya

K10avsata_u:9599: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:9600: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:9601: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā imāni samudrapramukhāni pañca vaṇikchatāni iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāni,
K10avsata_u:9605: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
K10avsata_u:9611: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ ime vaṇijaḥ paritrātāḥ
K10avsata_u:9613: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye //
K10avsata_u:9614: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany anyatarasmin samudratīre pañcābhijñaḥ ṛṣiḥ prativasati,
K10avsata_u:9617: sa ca kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalo vyasanagatānāṃ paritrātā /
K10avsata_u:9620: tam ṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā prasādajātāni pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāni:
K10avsata_u:9621: yady asmākaṃ bhagavan samudramadhyagatānāṃ kiṃcid vyasanam utpadyate,
K10avsata_u:9625: tatas te vaṇijo ratnāny ādāya jambudvīpābhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:9629: bho maharṣe anena duṣkareṇa vyavasāyena kāruṇyabhāvāc ca kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
K10avsata_u:9630: tenoktam*: andhe loke 'nāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā,
K10avsata_u:9634: tair uktam*: yadā tvaṃ buddho bhaves tadā asmān api samanvāharethā iti /

K10avsata_u:9661: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putrāḥ prajāyante ca mriyante ca /
K10avsata_u:9674: yāvad apareṇa samayena patnyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:9675: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:9678: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko divyasumanaḥkañcikayā prāvṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9679: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā sumanā iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
K10avsata_u:9680: tataḥ sthavirāniruddham antargṛhe bhaktenopanimantrya sa dārako niryātitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9684: yadā saptavarṣo jātas tadā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sthavirāya dattaḥ /

K10avsata_u:9698: tatra snātvā udakasya ghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā vihāyasaṃ prasthitaḥ /

K10avsata_u:9703: imaṃ paśya śāriputra śramaṇoddeśam āgacchantam udakasya ghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā smṛtimantaṃ susamāhitendriyam* /
K10avsata_u:9704: hitvā rāgaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca abhidhyāṃ ca virāgayan* /

K10avsata_u:9710: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko divyayā ca sumanasāṃ kañcukayā prāvṛtto jātaḥ,

K10avsata_u:9716: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:9720: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:

K10avsata_u:9724: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:9729: yadā vṛddho bhūtas tadā tasya vipratisāro jātaḥ:
K10avsata_u:9730: na me śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yad ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane na pravrajita iti /
K10avsata_u:9732: vipaśyī ca samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9733: tataḥ tena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
K10avsata_u:9734: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlema cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca anāgatān samyaksaṃbuddhānām ārāgayeyam* /

K10avsata_u:9755: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
K10avsata_u:9759: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:9762: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:9765: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
K10avsata_u:9768: ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9769: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:9774: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:9776: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmād devanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9786: saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
K10avsata_u:9787: {saced dārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
K10avsata_u:9791: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:9801: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
K10avsata_u:9802: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
K10avsata_u:9804: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
K10avsata_u:9806: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharāṃ bhūmim* /
K10avsata_u:9807: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya //
K10avsata_u:9808: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:9811: yadā tad apanītaṃ bhavati tadā anyat prādurbhavati /
K10avsata_u:9812: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:9815: yasmād asya jātamātrasya pāṇidvaye lakṣaṇāhataṃ karmavipākajaṃ dīnāradvayaṃ prādurbhūtam*,
K10avsata_u:9816: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya hiraṇyapāṇir iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:9817: hiraṇyapāṇir dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:9818: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:9820: sa śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko
K10avsata_u:9828: yāvad hiraṇyapāṇir dārako 'pareṇa samayena jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:9829: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:9833: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:9836: icchāmy aham ācārya bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṃghasya bhaktaṃ kartum iti /
K10avsata_u:9839: tato hiraṇyapāṇinā buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya purastāt sthitvā pāṇidvayaṃ prasārya hiraṇyasuvarṇasya mahān rāśiḥ sthāpitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:9840: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃghasthaviro 'nye ca bhikṣavaḥ sthavirānandaś ca paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ /
K10avsata_u:9841: tato hiraṇyapāṇir dārako buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:9842: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:9843: yāṃ śrutvā hiraṇyapāṇidārikeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:9844: dṛṣṭasatyo jñātīnāṃ bhāgasaṃvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇkṛpaṇanīpakān saṃtarpya mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9845: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:9848: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /

K10avsata_u:9869: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:9870: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9871: tasya rājñā kṛkiṇā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
K10avsata_u:9872: tatra ca stūpamahe vartamāne dyūtakareṇa dīnāradvayaṃ tasmin stūpe yaṣṭyāṃ samāropitam* /

K10avsata_u:9917: ayaṃ me bhagavan putro jātamātra eṣa
K10avsata_u:9925: tato rājā prasenajit param vismayam āpannaḥ //
