K10avsata_u:9952: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:9956: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:9957: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī saṃsāravairāgyikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:9958: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāre doṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī bhūtvā rājānaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa:
K10avsata_u:9961: rājovāca: na śakyam etan mayā kartum* /
K10avsata_u:9968: dvau trayo vā yāvat ṣaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ /
K10avsata_u:9974: karitaḥ: tāvat te 'smākaṃ darśanaṃ na deyam*,
K10avsata_u:9976: yāvad asau pitaram anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9977: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena nacireṇa trayaḥ piṭakā adhītāḥ /
K10avsata_u:9980: yanv ahaṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:9983: kiṃ putra asti kiṃcid adhītam iti?
K10avsata_u:9985: tatas tena pitus tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:9989: tenoktam*: icchāmy ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham upanimantrya ṣaḍbhiḥ pariṣkārair ācchādayitum iti /
K10avsata_u:9993: tatas tripiṭena bhagavān viṃśatisahasraparivāraḥ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9994: ekaikaś ca bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pariṣkārair ācchāditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:9996: yan mayā idānīṃ kṛcchreṇa pravrajyā pratilabdhā,
K10avsata_u:9998: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya tatra tatra kāṣāyavastraprāvṛta eva śramaṇaveṣadhārī jātismaraś ca syām iti //
K10avsata_u:10000: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena kṛkiṇaḥ putraḥ,
K10avsata_u:10002: tenaiva hetunā āḍhye rājakule putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko jātismaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10003: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10006: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:10010: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:10013: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:10014: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:10018: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ sārthavāha āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:10020: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:10021: tena khalu samayena durbhikṣam abhūt kṛcchram* /
K10avsata_u:10026: naimittikaiś ca nirdiṣṭo devo na varṣiṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:10028: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:10030: yatra ca divase dārako jātas tatraiva divase 'nāvṛṣṭir bhagnā /
K10avsata_u:10032: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:10036: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya yaśomitra iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:10037: yaśomitro dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:10038: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:10040: yadā yaśomitro mahān saṃvṛttas tadā jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena /
K10avsata_u:10041: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:10045: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:10046: tasya bhagavatā tādṛśī saṃsāravairāgyikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:10047: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāradoṣadarśī nirvāṇaguṇadarśī bhūtvā mātapitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10048: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:10051: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10052: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10055: yadā nidāghakāle bhikṣavas tṛṣārtāḥ pānakasyārthe saṃgham avataranti,
K10avsata_u:10058: kena hetunā bhavatas tṛṣā na bādhata iti /
K10avsata_u:10061: yena na me tṛṣā bādhatā iti //
K10avsata_u:10062: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:10068: yaśomitreṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:10071: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:10075: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:10078: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_85.1 //
K10avsata_u:10079: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:10080: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
K10avsata_u:10081: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:10082: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:10083: yāvad anyataraḥ śreṣṭhiputro 'nyatarasya vṛddhabhikṣoḥ sakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10086: sa upasthāyakam ātmānaṃ matvā vṛddhatarāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti /
K10avsata_u:10092: svakaṃ kamaṇḍalukam upagṛhya pānīyaṃ pāsyāmīti paśyati nirudakam* /
K10avsata_u:10098: sa udvignaḥ svakānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇām udvejanārthaṃ śraddhādeyasya ca gurutvasaṃdarśanārtham*,
K10avsata_u:10104: yāvad dvitīye divase prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām etad vṛttāntaṃ sabrahmacāriṇām ārocayati /
K10avsata_u:10114: eṣa vṛttānto vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ samantato visṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10116: yāvad upādhyāyena vṛddhānte niṣādayitvā udakapurṇā kuṇḍikā dattā /
K10avsata_u:10118: sa pratyakṣaphaladarśī tenaiva saṃvegena buddhe bhagavti śrāvakeṣu ca prasādam utpādya tīvreṇāśayena tad udakaṃ saṃghe cāritavān* /
K10avsata_u:10119: tato bhagavatā tasyānugrahārthaṃ gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya bhītānām āśvāsanakareṇa tad udakaṃ gṛhītaṃ mahāśrāvakaiś ca /
K10avsata_u:10123: tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:10126: tadā tena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ pānīyenālpotsukaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10127: dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi tena saṃghe pānīyaṃ cāritam* /
K10avsata_u:10129: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
K10avsata_u:10130: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10132: daṃṣṭrāntarāc ca me 'ṣṭāṅgopetaṃ pānīyaṃ nirgacched iti //
K10avsata_u:10135: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena bhikṣur āsīt, ayaṃ saḥ /
K10avsata_u:10136: yat tena dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi saṃghe pānīyaṃ cāritam*,
K10avsata_u:10138: teneha janmani daṃṣṭrāntarād aṣṭāṅgopetam pānīyaṃ nirgacchati /
K10avsata_u:10140: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10143: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:10147: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:10150: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:10151: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:10154: varṣā upagataḥ pāṇḍukambalaśilāyāṃ pārijātasya kovidārasya nātidūre /
K10avsata_u:10157: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ śrāvastyāṃ varṣā upagato jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
K10avsata_u:10158: atha catasraḥ parṣado yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
K10avsata_u:10160: catasraḥ parṣada āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano dharmakathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
K10avsata_u:10161: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K10avsata_u:10162: atha catasraḥ parṣada utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:10163: kaccit te bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana śrutaṃ kutra bhagavān etarhi varṣā upagata iti /
K10avsata_u:10165: śrutaṃ me bhavanto bhagavān deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu varṣā upagataḥ,
K10avsata_u:10169: atha catasraḥ parṣadaḥ āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāḥ //
K10avsata_u:10170: atha catasraḥ parṣadas trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇām atyayād yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10171: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10172: catasraḥ parṣada āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati (Speyer:
K10avsata_u:10177: anekaparyāyeṇa dhamyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K10avsata_u:10178: atha catasraḥ parṣada utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:10187: upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
K10avsata_u:10189: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
K10avsata_u:10191: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣada ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam* /
K10avsata_u:10192: evaṃ cāhuḥ: nāsti khalu bhadanta jambūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhir vā anubhāvo vā yena jambūdvīpakā manuṣyā devāṃs trāyastriṃśān (Speyer:
K10avsata_u:10195: asti khalu devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhiś cānubhāvaś ca,
K10avsata_u:10196: yena devās trāyastriṃśā jambūdvīpam avatareyur bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramaṇāya paryupāsanāya /
K10avsata_u:10197: sādhu bhagavān devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpam avatared anukampām upādāyeti /
K10avsata_u:10198: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena /
K10avsata_u:10199: atha catasraḥ parṣada āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāḥ //
K10avsata_u:10200: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'ciraprakrāntāś catasraḥ parṣado viditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet*,
K10avsata_u:10202: evam evāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ śrāvastyām antarhito deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu pratyaṣṭhāt pāṇdukambalaśilāyāṃ pārijātasya kovidārasya nātidūre
K10avsata_u:10203: tena khalu samayena bhagavān anekaśatāyā devaparṣado dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10avsata_u:10204: adrākṣīc ca mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam anekaśatāyā devaparṣadaḥ purastān niṣaṇṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam* /
K10avsata_u:10206: ihāpi bhagavān ākīrṇo viharati tadyathā jambūdvīpe catasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhir iti /
K10avsata_u:10207: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya cetasā cittam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:10209: api tu yadā me evaṃ bhavati:
K10avsata_u:10215: iti me cetasā cittam ājñāya āgacchanti ca gacchanti //
K10avsata_u:10217: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10218: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān maudgalyāyanaḥ sarvāṃ devaparṣadam avalokya bhagavantam idam avocat:
K10avsata_u:10220: santy asyāṃ devaparṣadi devatā yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10226: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya bhāṣitam anuvarṇayann āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:10230: santy asyāṃ devatā yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
K10avsata_u:10236: atha śakro śakro devānām indro bhagavata āyuṣmataś ca mahāmaudgalyāyanasya bhāṣitam anuvarṇayann āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:10237: evam etad bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana, evam etat* /
K10avsata_u:10246: athānyatamo devaputro bhagavata āyuṣmataś ca mahāmaudgalyāyanasya śakrasya ca devānām indrasya bhāṣitam anuvarṇayann āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:10247: evam etad bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana, evam etat* /
K10avsata_u:10250: yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10253: santi āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kāyasya bhedād ihopapannā iti //
K10avsata_u:10254: tatrānekāni devatāśatāni anekāni devatāsahasrāṇy anekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataḥ purastāt pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtya tatraivāntarhitāni //
K10avsata_u:10255: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ praviviktāṃ devaparṣadaṃ viditvā ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam
K10avsata_u:10256: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣado bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandante alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchanti,
K10avsata_u:10257: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
K10avsata_u:10259: sukhino maudgalyāyana bhavantu jambūdvīpe catasraḥ parṣadas tvaṃ ca /
K10avsata_u:10261: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣada ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam* /
K10avsata_u:10262: evaṃ cāhuḥ: nāsti bhadanta jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhir vā anubhāvo
K10avsata_u:10263: vā yena jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā devāṃs trāyastriṃśān abhiroheyur bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya /
K10avsata_u:10264: asti tu bhadanta devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhiś cānubhāvaś ca,
K10avsata_u:10265: yena devās trāyastriṃśā jambūdvīpam avatareyur bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya /
K10avsata_u:10266: sādhu bhagavān devebhyaś trāyastriṃśebhyo 'vatared anukampām upādāya /
K10avsata_u:10268: tena hi tvaṃ gaccha maudgalyāyana jambūdvīpam* /
K10avsata_u:10270: avatariṣyati bhavanto bhagavān itaḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpaṃ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle iti //
K10avsata_u:10271: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pādau śirasā vanditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ saṃpanno yathā samāhite citte tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayet*,
K10avsata_u:10274: evam evāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣv antarhitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10276: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano jambūdvīpam āgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocayati:
K10avsata_u:10277: avatariṣyati bhavanto bhagavān itaḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpaṃ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle iti //
K10avsata_u:10278: avatīrṇo bhagavāṃs tataḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyaḥ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle /
K10avsata_u:10280: tadā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato darśanāya saṃnipatitāni /
K10avsata_u:10282: tena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghas te ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā bhaktenopanimantritāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10283: yāvad gaṇḍīdeśanākāle sahacittotpādād divyāny āsanāny udārapaṭācchāditāni prādurbhūtāni,
K10avsata_u:10287: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:10288: yāṃ śrutvopapādukena bhikṣuṇā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
K10avsata_u:10291: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10292: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:10293: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:10300: upapādukenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:10303: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:10307: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:10309: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_86.1 //
K10avsata_u:10310: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka
K10avsata_u:10311: udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
K10avsata_u:10314: yāvad anyatarasmin grāmake 'raṇyāyatane pañca bhikṣavo varṣā upagatāḥ tatraikena bhikṣuṇā caturṇāṃ
K10avsata_u:10317: tair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:10320: anena me kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca pravrajitasya upakaraṇaviśeṣair avaikalyaṃ syād iti //
K10avsata_u:10321: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena vaiyāvṛtyaṃ kṛtavān*,
K10avsata_u:10326: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi (Speyer:
K10avsata_u:10328: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K10avsata_u:10329: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:10330: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:10332: tasya bhāryā prasavakāle duḥkhavedanābhibhūtā ārtasvarā kradanti /
K10avsata_u:10333: sa taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā paraṃ saṃvegam āpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10334: sa śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10336: yanv ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane pravrajya praṇidhānaṃ kuryām*,
K10avsata_u:10338: sa tenaiva saṃvegena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya pravacane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10340: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya,
K10avsata_u:10343: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāha āsīt*,
K10avsata_u:10349: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10352: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:10356: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:10358: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:10359: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:10363: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:10365: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:10366: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā / sā
K10avsata_u:10368: aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:10369: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
K10avsata_u:10372: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:10375: yasmād asya janmani kapilavastu nagaraṃ samantataḥ śobhitam*,
K10avsata_u:10376: tasmād asya bhavatu śobhita iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:10377: śobhito dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:10378: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:10380: sa yadā mahān samvṛttas tadā nyagrodhārāmaṃ gato bhagavato darśanāya /
K10avsata_u:10381: dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair
K10avsata_u:10382: virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ
K10avsata_u:10385: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:10386: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:10387: yāṃ śrutvā śobhitena dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:10388: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10389: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:10392: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10393: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:10394: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:10396: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam*,
K10avsata_u:10400: śobhitenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:10403: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:10407: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:10409: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_87.1 //
K10avsata_u:10411: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:10412: prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
K10avsata_u:10413: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:10416: yāvat kasmiṃścit parvaṇi pratyupasthite goṣṭhikāḥ stūpasamīpaṃ gatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10417: tais taṃ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā pasādajātaiḥ puṣpāropaṇaṃ kartum ārabdham* /
K10avsata_u:10423: tena vicitrapuṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā tasminn eva stūpe puṣpāropaṇaṃ kṛtam* //
K10avsata_u:10425: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena goṣṭhika āsīt,
K10avsata_u:10426: yena vipratisārajātena krakucchandasya keśanakhastūpe puṣpāripaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:10428: anyāny api hi bhikṣavaḥ śobhitena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
K10avsata_u:10429: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī /
K10avsata_u:10431: tataḥ prasādajātena pādayor nipatya piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ paṭena cācchāditaḥ //
K10avsata_u:10432: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhī,
K10avsata_u:10438: tatas tena prasādajātena tṛṇāny utpāṭya saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvā stūpāṅgaṇaṃ ca saṃmṛṣṭam* /
K10avsata_u:10439: tataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:10440: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deydharmaparityāgena ca abhirūpaḥ syāṃ darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10441: anāgatāṃś ca buddhān ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:10443: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena kāṣṭhahāraka āsīt,
K10avsata_u:10446: tena yatra yatra jātas tatra tatrābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10448: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10451: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:10455: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:10457: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:10458: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:10463: tena khalu samayena dakṣiṇāpathe kalpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ
K10avsata_u:10464: ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:10467: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:10468: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10469: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kapphiṇa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
K10avsata_u:10470: kapphiṇo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:10471: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:10473: yasminn eva divase kapphiṇaḥ kumāro jātaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10474: tasminn eva divase aṣṭādaśānām amātyasahasrāṇāṃ putrā jātāḥ,
K10avsata_u:10480: athāpareṇa samayena rājā mahākapphiṇo 'ṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛto mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:10481: purastāt pṛṣṭhataś ca sarvabalaugham avalokyāmātyān āmantrayate:
K10avsata_u:10482: asti bhavantaḥ kasyacid evaṃrūpo balaughaḥ tadyathā mamaivaitarhīti?
K10avsata_u:10491: deva kecid deśā gaṇādhīnāḥ kecid rājādhīnā iti /
K10avsata_u:10492: yāvad rājñā mahākapphiṇena śrāvastyādiṣu ṣaṭsu mahānagareṣu dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:10496: etad vacanam upaśrutya ṣaṇmahānagaravāsino rājāno bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ saṃgamya samāgamya ekasamūhena śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ
K10avsata_u:10498: taiḥ sa vṛttānto bhagavato vistareṇa niveditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10500: uktāś ca: sa dūto matsakāśam ānetavya iti /
K10avsata_u:10504: tato bhagavatā dūtāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayam nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
K10avsata_u:10511: saptatālodgataṃ ca simḥāsanaṃ yatra bhagavān niṣaṇṇāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10512: tato dūtas tathāvidhāṃ śobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10513: tato bhagavatā lekhaṃ lekhayitvā sa dūto 'bhihitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:10520: aham eva mahatā balaughena sārdham āgamiṣyāmīti /
K10avsata_u:10521: tato dūtena gatvā rājño mahākapphiṇasya lekhaṃ vācikaṃ ca yat saṃdiṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ niveditam* //
K10avsata_u:10522: tataḥ kapphiṇo rājā aṣṭādaśāmātyagaṇasahasraparivṛto 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10523: prātisīmāś ca rājāno rājānaṃ mahākapphiṇaṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10526: tato bhagavatā tasyāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayaṃ nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
K10avsata_u:10533: saptatālodgataṃ ca siṃhāsanaṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva nirmitam* /
K10avsata_u:10540: aho bata śakro devendra aindraṃ dhanur ādāya āgacchatv iti /
K10avsata_u:10541: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ sārathiveṣeṇa aindraṃ dhanur upanāmayati /
K10avsata_u:10543: tac ca rājā mahākapphiṇa utkraṣṭum api na śaknoti,
K10avsata_u:10546: svayaṃ ca tad dhanur ardhacandrākāreṇāropya śaraḥ kṣiptaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10550: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // AVŚ_88.1 //
K10avsata_u:10551: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K10avsata_u:10552: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // AVŚ_88.2 // iti
K10avsata_u:10553: sa ca śabdo yāvad akaniṣṭhān devān gataḥ /
K10avsata_u:10558: tato bhagavān rājño mahākapphiṇasya cittaprakāram upalakṣya rājaveṣam antardhāpya idaṃ sūtram āradbhavān*: (Cf. DbSū(2))
K10avsata_u:10559: daśabalasamanvāgato bhikṣavas tathāgato 'han samyaksaṃbuddhaś catur vaiśāradyaviśārada udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānīte,
K10avsata_u:10575: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
K10avsata_u:10590: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
K10avsata_u:10592: uttāno vivṛtaś chinnaplotiko yāvad devamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksuprakāśitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10593: evaṃ svākhyāte me dharme uttāne vivṛte chinnaplotike yāvad devamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksuprakāśite yāvad alam eva bhikṣavaḥ śraddhāpravrajitena kulaputreṇa alaṃ yogāya alam apramādāya,
K10avsata_u:10597: atha ca punar yat tadārabdhavīryeṇa prāptavyaṃ sthāmavatā vīryavatā utsāhinā dṛḍhaparākrameṇānikṣiptadhureṇa kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu,
K10avsata_u:10601: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair duḥkhavipākaiḥ āyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyaiḥ mahataś cārthasya parihāṇir bhavati
K10avsata_u:10602: ārabdhavīryas tu sukhaṃ viharaty avakīrṇaḥ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair duḥkhavipākaiḥ āyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyaiḥ
K10avsata_u:10604: maṇḍayeyam idaṃ pravacanaṃ yaduta śāstā ca saṃmukhībhūtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10605: dharmaś ca deśyata aupaśamikaḥ pārinirvāṇikaḥ saṃbodhigāmī sugatapraveditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10606: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ātmārthaṃ ca samanupaśyadbhiḥ parārthaṃ cobhayārthaṃ ca,
K10avsata_u:10611: teṣāṃ ca te kārāḥ kṛtāḥ kaccid atyarthamahāphalā bhaviṣyanti,
K10avsata_u:10614: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe rājñā mahākapphiṇena aṣṭādaśāmātyagaṇasahasraparivāreṇa
K10avsata_u:10615: viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:10617: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:10620: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10621: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:10622: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:10627: kapphiṇenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:10631: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:10635: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:10637: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_88.3 //
K10avsata_u:10638: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka
K10avsata_u:10639: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:10640: sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniśritya viharati bandhumatīyake dāve /
K10avsata_u:10641: yāvad anyatamena sārthavāhena mahāsamudrāt prabhūtāni ratnāny ānītāni /
K10avsata_u:10643: vihāraṃ ca kārayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitavān* //
K10avsata_u:10645: eṣa evāsau kapphiṇo rājā tena kālena tena samayena /
K10avsata_u:10646: yad anena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghas traimāsyaṃ svāntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10647: vihāraṃ ca kārayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitaḥ {tenedānīm abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ} aparāṇy api bhikṣavaḥ kapphiṇena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
K10avsata_u:10648: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā
K10avsata_u:10649: rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
K10avsata_u:10657: parinirvṛtasya ca śarīrastūpaṃ kārayitvā amātyagaṇasahāyena tailābhiṣeko dattaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10662: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10665: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:10669: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:10672: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:10673: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:10677: yadā bhagavān ṣaḍvarṣābhisaṃbuddho dvādaśavarṣanirgataḥ kapilavastu anuprāptaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10678: tadā droṇodanāmṛtodanapramukhair anekaiḥ śākyasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtaṃ sthāpayitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanam* /
K10avsata_u:10679: tato rājā śuddhodanas tāṃ putraśobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10682: so 'yam abhaviṣyad rājā cakravartī caturantavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10684: yanv ahaṃ śākyakulebhya ekaikaṃ pravrājayeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:10685: tato rājñā śuddhodanena nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*:
K10avsata_u:10687: tataḥ sarvaśākyeṣu saṃnipatiteṣu rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati:
K10avsata_u:10691: tad idānīm asya pravrajitasya ekaikena kulapuruṣeṇa śākyenopasthāyakena pravrajitavyam iti /
K10avsata_u:10693: teṣām upālir nāma kalpaka upasthāyakaḥ tān pravrajitān dṛṣṭvā roditum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10703: tataḥ śākyaiḥ śarīrāvalagnānāṃ hārārdhahāramaṇimukhtāvaiḍūryakeyūrāṅgulīyakānāṃ mahān rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10704: tata upāleḥ kalpakasya tān dṛṣṭvā vicitraṃ cālaṃkāram abhivīkṣya yoniśo manasikāra utpannaḥ:
K10avsata_u:10705: ime tāvac chākyāḥ kularūpayuvanavanto 'ntaḥpurāṇi imaṃ cālaṃkāraṃ kheṭavad utsṛjya pravrajitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10706: kim utāham alpavibhavaḥ imam alaṃkāraṃ gṛhaṃ neṣyāmi? alam anena /
K10avsata_u:10709: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:10711: labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam*,
K10avsata_u:10717: te upāliṃ jñātvā kularūpavibhavānvitatvān necchanty upāleḥ
K10avsata_u:10722: yasmād idaṃ māmakaṃ śāsanaṃ na kularūpayauvanaiśvaryacāturvarṇyaviśuddhim apekṣata iti /
K10avsata_u:10723: tato mūlanikṛttā iva drumā bhadrikapramukhāni pañca śākyaśatāni dharmatām avalambya pādayor nipatitāni /
K10avsata_u:10724: teṣām pādavandanasamakālam eveyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā /
K10avsata_u:10725: tatrāyuṣmatā bhadrikeṇa yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ
K10avsata_u:10728: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10729: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10731: so 'pareṇa samayena pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ gocarāya prasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10733: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśala ekapuṇḍarīkaṃ hastināgam abhiruhya dīrgheṇa cārāyaṇena sārathinā bhagavato darśanāya saṃprasthitaḥ
K10avsata_u:10734: dadarśa rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhadrikaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasam*,
K10avsata_u:10735: parameṇa ca cittadamavyupaśamanasamanvāgataṃ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛtaṃ lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tasmāc caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgacchantam* /
K10avsata_u:10736: dṛṣṭvā ca punar dīrghaṃ cārāyaṇaṃ sārathim āmantrayate:
K10avsata_u:10739: iti śrutvā rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ saṃmoham āpannaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10742: tato rājā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam uvāca: bhagavan,
K10avsata_u:10744: asau bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛto lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā devamanuṣyāvarjanakareṇātipraśānteneryāpathena piṇḍapātam ādāya caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:10747: yatra nāma evaṃvidhāḥ kumārāḥ sukhaidhitā evaṃvinītapracārāḥ saṃvṛttā iti /
K10avsata_u:10750: ayaṃ mahārāja bhadriko 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā trir udānayati:
K10avsata_u:10752: yad aham apravrajitaḥ san rājakulamadhyagato 'mātyanaigamajānapadasusaṃrakṣitaḥ prākāraparikhādvārastūpābhinigūḍhaḥ pariśaṅkitahṛdayaḥ saṃvignaḥ samantataḥśaṅkī nidrāṃ nāsādayāmi /
K10avsata_u:10753: so 'ham etarhi nirapekṣaḥ kāye jīvite ca sukhaṃ yatratatrastho viharāmīti //
K10avsata_u:10754: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:10755: kāni bhadanta bhadrikeṇa pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni,
K10avsata_u:10756: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādika āḍhye rājakule pratyājātaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10759: bhadrikeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:10763: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:10767: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:10768: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
K10avsata_u:10769: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_89.1 //
K10avsata_u:10770: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ koṭṭamallakaḥ kṣutkṣāmaparigataśarīraḥ itaś cāmutaś cānvāhiṇḍate /
K10avsata_u:10771: yāvad anyatarā dārikā pūpalikā ādāya gacchati /
K10avsata_u:10772: tatas tena koṭṭamallakena sā dārikā pūpalikānām arthe abhibhūtā /
K10avsata_u:10773: tato balād ekām pūpalikām ādāya itas tataḥ (Speyer:
K10avsata_u:10778: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
K10avsata_u:10779: tadā anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tasya koṭṭamallakasyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10780: tataḥ koṭṭamallasya taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ śānteryāpathaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasādo jātaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10781: tena svaṃ vyasanam agaṇayya pratyekabuddhāya pūpalikā pratipāditā /
K10avsata_u:10782: tasya vipraharṣasaṃjananārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10783: tataḥ koṭṭamallakas tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūlanikṛttā iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K10avsata_u:10784: yan me siddhavrato dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūpalikayā pratipāditaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10785: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya,
K10avsata_u:10788: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:10790: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena koṭṭamallakaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10797: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10800: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:10804: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:10808: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:10809: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:10813: tena khalu samayena sthūlakoṣṭhake kauravyo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ
K10avsata_u:10814: ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:10817: tasya bhrātṛputro rāṣṭrapālo nāmnā abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10818: tasya vinayakālam avekṣya bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ sthūlakoṣṭhakaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ
K10avsata_u:10819: dadarśa rāṣṭrapālo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:10823: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pravrajyāṃ yācate /
K10avsata_u:10829: na hi vatsa tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā anujñātaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayanti,
K10avsata_u:10834: sphītaṃ cakravartirājyam apahāya pravrajitaḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ cāntaḥpurasahasrāṇi /
K10avsata_u:10835: muṇḍaḥ saṃghāṭipravṛtto 'sminn eva sthūlakoṣṭhake piṇḍapātam aṭati /
K10avsata_u:10837: yad ahaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:10840: dvau trayo vā yāvac chaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ //
K10avsata_u:10841: atha rāṣṭrapālasya mātāpitarau yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntau /
K10avsata_u:10851: ihaiva tvaṃ tāta rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva,
K10avsata_u:10856: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau jñātīn udyojayataḥ:
K10avsata_u:10857: aṅga tāvaj jñātayaḥ tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam utthāpayata /
K10avsata_u:10858: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya jñātayo yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10868: ihaiva tvaṃ tāta rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva,
K10avsata_u:10872: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakān udyojayataḥ:
K10avsata_u:10875: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakā yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10885: ihaiva tvaṃ saumya rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva,
K10avsata_u:10889: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakā yena rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:10890: upasaṃkramya rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarāv idam avocan*: amba tāta,
K10avsata_u:10891: anujānītaṃ saumya rāṣṭrapālaṃ pravrajituṃ samyag eva śraddhayā agarād anagārikām*,
K10avsata_u:10896: kā anyā putrasya gatir anyatra mātāpitarāv eva /
K10avsata_u:10897: evam āvāṃ kumārakāḥ tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam anujānīyāvaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10899: atha rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputro 'nupūrveṇa kāyasya sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca saṃjanayya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10901: ekānte sthito rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputro bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:10903: labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K10avsata_u:10905: labdhavān rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K10avsata_u:10906: sa evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sann idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ
K10avsata_u:10908: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo
K10avsata_u:10911: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10913: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ {āraṇyakānāṃ }yaduta rāṣṭrapālo bhiksur iti //
K10avsata_u:10914: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:10920: rāṣṭrapālenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:10923: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:10927: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:10929: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_90.1 //
K10avsata_u:10930: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani videharājaḥ saparivāraḥ paracakravitrāsito 'ṭavīm anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10931: sa madhyāhne tīkṣṇasūryaraśmiparitāpitaḥ sabalaugha itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramati,
K10avsata_u:10933: asati ca buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
K10avsata_u:10934: yāvad anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tasmin kāntāramārge prativasati /
K10avsata_u:10935: tena kāruṇyam utpādya tasya videharājasya mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10938: tato rājñā prasādajātena svanagaram ānīya traimāsyaṃ sarvopakaraṇair upasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10941: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ labhī syām*,
K10avsata_u:10942: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ ca śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:10944: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
K10avsata_u:10946: aparāṇy api rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
K10avsata_u:10947: asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho
K10avsata_u:10948: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
K10avsata_u:10950: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:10951: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ kṛkī rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ
K10avsata_u:10952: ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:10956: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:10962: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:10964: tena prasādajātena bhagavān kāśyapaḥ saparivāra upasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10966: parinirvṛtasya ca stūpe kanīyāñ chatram āropitavān* /
K10avsata_u:10968: ayam evāsau rāṣṭrapālas tena kālena tena samayena /
K10avsata_u:10969: aparāṇy api rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
K10avsata_u:10970: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamo mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10972: tena tatra paryaṭatā vanānte glānaḥ pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10977: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:10978: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10980: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre na kadācid duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
K10avsata_u:10981: idānīm apy āḍhye rājakule pratyājāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ /
K10avsata_u:10983: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:10986: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:10990: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:10994: subhūtiḥ sthaviraś cāpi hasta lekuñcikas tathā /
K10avsata_u:10995: saṃsāro guptikaś cāpi virūpo gaṅgikena ca /
K10avsata_u:10996: dīrghanakhaḥ saṃgītiś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:10998: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:10999: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:11003: yadā bhagavatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya śrāvakā niyuktās teṣu janapadeṣu vineyajanānugrahārtham*,
K10avsata_u:11004: tadā ye 'dhyāyinas te sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāṃ dhyānaparā sthitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:11006: sa taṃ sumerupariṣaṇḍāyām āropya bhakṣayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11007: tato nāgapotalako jīvitād vyaparopyamāṇo mahāśrāvakāṇām antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ //
K10avsata_u:11008: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā śrāvastyāṃ bhūtir nāma brāhmaṇaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11010: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:11012: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:11016: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhūtir iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:11017: subhūtir dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān samvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11018: sa pūrveṇa hetubalādhānena atīva roṣaṇaḥ krodhaparyavasthānabahulo mātāpitṛbhyām ātharvaṇād vinivartya ṛṣiṣu pravrājitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11019: sa ca tatra dhyānaparaḥ saṃyato 'nyatarad vanaṣaṇḍam upaniśritya viharati /
K10avsata_u:11020: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe devatā prativasati dṛṣṭasatyā /
K10avsata_u:11023: yanv aham enaṃ bhagavaddarśane niyojayeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:11024: tatas tayā devatayā subhūteḥ purastād buddhasya varṇo bhāṣito dharmasya ca saṃghasya ca /
K10avsata_u:11029: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:11035: tataḥ prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:11036: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:11037: yāṃ śrutvā subhūtinā kulaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:11039: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena maitrībhāvanayā cittaṃ damayitvā sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:11040: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11041: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:11045: paśyati: pañca jātiśatāni nāgebhyaś cyuto nāgeṣv evopapannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11050: idānīṃ punas tathā kariṣyāmi yat pareṣām antike dveṣopasaṃbhāro notpatsyate /
K10avsata_u:11051: yena samanvāgataḥ kāyasya bhedād apāyaṃ durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /
K10avsata_u:11053: yadā saṃghe vā grāme vā deśe vā janapade vā bhikṣāhetor vihartukāmo bhavati,
K10avsata_u:11055: mā māṃ kaścit kāraṇena dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ pradūṣayiṣyati,
K10avsata_u:11061: yanv aham idānīṃ mahājanānugrahārthaṃ kuryām iti /
K10avsata_u:11062: tatas tena ṛddhyā pañca suparṇiśatāni nirmitāni,
K10avsata_u:11063: yāni dṛṣṭvā nāgā bhītās trastā saṃvignā itaś cāmutaś ca saṃbhrāntāḥ /
K10avsata_u:11066: punar api mahāntaṃ nāgarūpam abhinirmāya pañca garuḍaśatāny abhidrutāni /
K10avsata_u:11068: evaṃ tena nāgānāṃ garuḍānāṃ ca pañca kulaśatāni vinītāni /
K10avsata_u:11070: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇām araṇāvihāriṇāṃ yaduta subhūtiḥ kulaputraḥ //
K10avsata_u:11071: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:11072: kāni bhadanta subhūtinā karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāraṇāvihāriṇām agro nirdiṣṭa iti /
K10avsata_u:11074: subhūtinaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:11077: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau,
K10avsata_u:11081: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:11083: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_91.1 //
K10avsata_u:11084: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:11085: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
K10avsata_u:11086: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:11087: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:11092: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
K10avsata_u:11093: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
K10avsata_u:11094: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajya araṇāvihāriṇām agraḥ syām iti //
K10avsata_u:11096: aprahīṇatvāt kleśānām udbhrāntatvād indriyāṇām aparyantīkṛtatvāt karmapathānāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣabhikṣuṣu cittaṃ pradūṣya āśīviṣavādena samudācaritāḥ,
K10avsata_u:11102: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11105: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:11109: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************

K10avsata_u:11112: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:11116: anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:11118: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:11119: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā,
K10avsata_u:11121: yāvad bhūyas tayaiva sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:11122: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11123: sa prathamagarbho yathāvasthitaḥ eva mātur udare /
K10avsata_u:11131: yadā cāsyā maraṇāntikī vedanā prādurbhūtā nacireṇa kālaṃ kariṣyatīti,
K10avsata_u:11133: yat khalv āryaputra jānīyāḥ mamātra prathamagarbho 'vatiṣṭhate /
K10avsata_u:11135: tadā dakṣiṇapārśvaṃ śastreṇa ghātayitvā tataḥ prathamasthitaṃ dārakam uddharethāḥ / ity uktvā:
K10avsata_u:11137: saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam* // AVŚ_92.1 //
K10avsata_u:11139: tasyāḥ kālagatāyā nīlapītalohitāvadātair vastraiḥ śibikām (Speyer: śivikām)
K10avsata_u:11140: alaṃkṛtya śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nītvā jīvako (Speyer: jīviko)
K10avsata_u:11142: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtaḥ:
K10avsata_u:11143: evam amukastriyā iyanti varṣāṇi garbhaḥ sthitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11145: na cāsau prathamataram avasthito garbho nirgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:11146: adya jīvako vaidyarājaḥ śastreṇa mṛtāyā udaraṃ ghātayitvā taṃ prathamasthitaṃ dārakam uddhariṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:11147: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kutūhalād bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi śītavanaśmaśāne saṃnipatitāni /
K10avsata_u:11155: yāvad bhagavān ājñātakauṇḍinyabāṣpamahānāmāniruddhaśāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapānandarevataprabhṛtibhir mahāśrāvakaiḥ parivṛtaḥ śītavanaśmaśānaṃ gataḥ /
K10avsata_u:11156: janakāyena ca bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vivaraṃ kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:11157: tatra jīvakena tasyāḥ striyā dakṣiṇaḥ kukṣiḥ pāṭitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11158: tataḥ svayam eva nirgato valipalitacitāṅgaḥ parijīrṇaśarīrāvayavaḥ:
K10avsata_u:11160: nirgatamātraś ca taṃ janakāyam avalokya vācaṃ niścārayati sma:
K10avsata_u:11161: mā bhavanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu kharāṃ vācaṃ niścārayata /
K10avsata_u:11163: yad aham āmāśayapakvāśayayor madhye ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇy uṣitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11175: tato bhagavatā tadadhiṣṭhānā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:11176: yāṃ śrutvā saṃvignair bahubhiḥ satvaśatair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ //
K10avsata_u:11177: sa ca daśavarṣāṇi gṛhāgāram adhyāsya saptativarṣo bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11178: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pañcaviṃśatyā bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ varṣā upagataḥ /
K10avsata_u:11181: trayāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāc caturviṃśatyā bhikṣubhir arhatvaṃ prāptam* /
K10avsata_u:11183: tataḥ saṃghasthavireṇa pravāraṇāyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ subahu paribhāṣya gaṇamadhyān niṣkāsitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11184: sa śastram ādāya kuṭiṃ praviśya rudan bahuvidhaṃ paridevate / āha ca:
K10avsata_u:11186: ādīptaṃ kānanaṃ sarvaṃ parvatā pi palīkṛtā /

K10avsata_u:11189: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate // AVŚ_92.3 //

K10avsata_u:11193: athedaṃ pāpakaṃ cittam adyāpi na vimucyate // AVŚ_92.5 //

K10avsata_u:11196: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /

K10avsata_u:11202: trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
K10avsata_u:11203: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11205: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,

K10avsata_u:11211: yāṃ śrutvā sthavirakeṇa idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ
K10avsata_u:11213: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /

K10avsata_u:11221: tataḥ sthavireṇa ṛddhyā gatvā tasmād bhayāt paritrātāḥ /
K10avsata_u:11224: taiḥ sarvair eva yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:11225: teṣāṃ ca guṇeṣu na kaścit pratyakṣaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11231: tata āyuṣmān ānandaḥ sabrahmacārivatsalaḥ parānugrahapravṛtta āyuṣmantaṃ sthavirakanāmān udbhāvayitukāmo yenāyuṣmān sthaviranāmā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K10avsata_u:11232: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmatā sthavireṇa sthaviranāmnā bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ
K10avsata_u:11233: ekānte niṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān ānandaḥ sthaviraṃ sthavirakanāman idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:11234: pṛcchema vayam āyuṣmantaṃ sthaviraṃ sthavirakanāmānaṃ kaṃcid eva pradeśam*,
K10avsata_u:11238: araṇyagatenāyuṣman sthavira bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena katame dharmā abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyāḥ?
K10avsata_u:11239: āha: araṇyagatena āyuṣmann ānanda bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena dvau dharmāv abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyau:
K10avsata_u:11242: sthavira āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
K10avsata_u:11243: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
K10avsata_u:11244: śamatha āyuṣmann ānanda āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto vipaśyanām āgamya vimucyate /
K10avsata_u:11245: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā śamatham āgamya vimucyate /
K10avsata_u:11246: śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitam āyuṣmann ānanda śrutavataḥ āryaśrāvakasya cittaṃ dhātuśo vimucyate /
K10avsata_u:11251: kasya nu sthavira prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate?
K10avsata_u:11254: sarvasaṃskārāṇām āyuṣmann ānanda prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate /
K10avsata_u:11257: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ sthavirasya sthavirakanāmno bhikṣor bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya yena pañca bhikṣuśatāni tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11259: araṇyagatenāyuṣmanto bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena katame dharmā abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyāḥ?

K10avsata_u:11262: śamatha āyuṣmanta āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
K10avsata_u:11263: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
K10avsata_u:11264: śamatha āyuṣmann ānanda āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto vipaśyanām āgamya vimucyate /
K10avsata_u:11265: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā śamatham āgamya vimucyate /
K10avsata_u:11273: kasya nu āyuṣmantaḥ prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate?
K10avsata_u:11276: sarvasaṃskārāṇām āyuṣmann ānanda prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate /
K10avsata_u:11279: āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11281: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:11282: araṇyagatena bhadanta bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena katame dharmā abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyāḥ?
K10avsata_u:11283: araṇyagatenānanda bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena dvau dharmāv abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyau:
K10avsata_u:11285: śamatho bhadanta āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
K10avsata_u:11286: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati?
K10avsata_u:11287: śamatha ānanda āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto vipaśyanām āgamya vimucyate /
K10avsata_u:11288: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā śamatham āgamya vimucyate /
K10avsata_u:11289: śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitānanda śrutavata āryaśrāvakasya cittaṃ dhātuśo vimucyate /
K10avsata_u:11294: kasya nu bhadanta prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate?
K10avsata_u:11298: sarvasaṃskārāṇām ānanda prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate /
K10avsata_u:11306: ihāhaṃ bhadanta yena sthaviraḥ sthavirakanāmā bhikṣus tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11307: upasaṃkramya sthaviraṃ sthavirakanāmānaṃ bhikṣum etam evārtham ebhiḥ padair ebhir vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavān* /
K10avsata_u:11308: tena mama eṣa evārtha ebhiḥ padair ebhir vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭena vyākṛtaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11310: so 'ham āyuṣmataḥ sthavirasya sthaviranāmno bhikṣor bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya yena pañca bhikṣuśatāni tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11311: upasaṃkramya pañca bhikṣuśatāny etam evārtham ebhiḥ padair ebhir vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavān* /
K10avsata_u:11312: tair api mama eṣa evārtha ebhiḥ padair ebhir vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭair vyākṛtaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11314: bhadanta āścaryaṃ yāvac chāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca arthenārthaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11317: kaṃ punas tvam ānanda sthavirakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃjānīyāḥ?
K10avsata_u:11318: sthavirako bhadanta bhikṣur arhan kṣīṇāśravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyo 'pahṛtabhāro 'nuprāptasvakārthaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ
K10avsata_u:11319: tāny api bhikṣuśatāni sarvāṇy arhanti kṣīṇāsravāṇi kṛtakṛtyāni kṛtakaraṇīyāny apahṛtabhārāṇy anuprāptasvakārthaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittāni
K10avsata_u:11321: yadā bhagavatā āyuṣmatānandena sthavirakas te ca bhikṣava udbhāvitāḥ prakāśitāś ca,
K10avsata_u:11322: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:11323: kāni bhadanta sthavirakeṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
K10avsata_u:11324: yena ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇi mātuḥ kukṣāv uṣitaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11325: kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yena dhandhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paramadhandhaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11328: sthavirakeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:11331: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:11335: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:11337: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_92.8 //
K10avsata_u:11338: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:11339: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
K10avsata_u:11340: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:11341: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:11351: dvir api trir api taruṇabhikṣuṇā sthavira utthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:11353: dvir api trir api sthavira āha: vatsa,
K10avsata_u:11360: tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaṣṭi varṣasahasrāṇi mātuḥ kukṣāv uṣitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11363: yad anena tatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:11364: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:11368: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaivārhatvaṃ prāptasya /
K10avsata_u:11371: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:11374: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:11375: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:11379: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:11381: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:11382: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:11383: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:11384: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ prakṛtijātismaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:11385: sa svakaṃ hastaṃ gṛhītvā āliṅgate cumbati pariṣvajati,
K10avsata_u:11387: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhau,
K10avsata_u:11388: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti /
K10avsata_u:11389: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:11392: yasmād ayaṃ jātamātra eva hastāv āliṅgate cumbati,
K10avsata_u:11393: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya hastaka iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:11394: hastako dāraka aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:11395: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:11397: yadā tatra deśe kiṃcid bhavati bhayam*,
K10avsata_u:11398: tadā sa janakāyo bhīta itaś cāmutaś codbhrānto bhāṇḍaṃ gopāyati /
K10avsata_u:11403: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakau,
K10avsata_u:11404: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti //
K10avsata_u:11405: yāvad apareṇa samayena hastako jetavanaṃ gataḥ /
K10avsata_u:11406: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:11410: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:11411: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K10avsata_u:11412: yāṃ śrutvā hastakena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:11413: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11414: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:11417: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto
K10avsata_u:11420: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11421: so 'rhatvaprāpto 'py evam eva bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati:
K10avsata_u:11424: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakau,
K10avsata_u:11425: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti //
K10avsata_u:11426: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:11427: kāni bhadanta hastakena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni yenārhatvaprāpto 'py evam eva kathayati:
K10avsata_u:11428: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakau,
K10avsata_u:11429: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti /

K10avsata_u:11437: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:11441: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:

K10avsata_u:11445: kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
K10avsata_u:11447: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:11452: sa jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ bahūni ca nimantraṇakāni pratilabhate /
K10avsata_u:11453: sa taṃ saṃśīlikabhikṣuṃ yatra nimantrito bhavati,
K10avsata_u:11458: tatas tena tasyādarśanād anyo bhikṣur nītaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11459: yāvat tatra taruṇabhikṣubhir auddhatyābhiprāyair evam uktam*:
K10avsata_u:11460: paśyata bhadantā yāvat tenāyaṃ paścācchramaṇo 'dya na nīto 'nyo nīta iti /
K10avsata_u:11461: tatas tena krodhābhibhūtenārhato 'ntike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam* /
K10avsata_u:11463: yadā āśayato vipratisārajātena atyayam atyayato deśitaṃ vivṛtam uttānīkṛtam*,

K10avsata_u:11469: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11472: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
