K10avsata_u:11484: śrāvastyām anyatamo brahmaṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:11486: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:11487: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:11488: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:11490: jātamātrasya cāsya mātuḥ stanābhyāṃ kṣīram antarhitam* /
K10avsata_u:11491: yāvat tena brāhmaṇena tasyānyā dhātrī ānītā /
K10avsata_u:11494: yadāsya kṣīrasaṃbhavaḥ sarvair apy upāyair na saṃbhavati,
K10avsata_u:11499: yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā udarapūraṇam api nāsādayati /
K10avsata_u:11500: paśyati ca bhikṣūn sunivasitān suprāvṛtān bhramarasadṛśāni pātrāṇi gṛhītvā śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśataḥ /
K10avsata_u:11503: sa mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajito 'py udarapūraṇaṃ nāsādayati /
K10avsata_u:11504: tena tenaiva saṃvegena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ
K10avsata_u:11507: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11508: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:11510: yāvad asāv apareṇa samayena bhagavato gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmārjituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11511: sa tāṃ saṃmṛjya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
K10avsata_u:11512: tatas tena prabhūtaḥ praṇītaś ca piṇḍapāta āsāditaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11514: tatas tena saṃtarpitendriyeṇa kṛtsnā rātrir dhyānavimokṣasamāpattibhir atināmitā /
K10avsata_u:11516: śobhano 'yam upāyo yanv ahaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ vijñāpayeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:11518: ahaṃ bhadanta alpapuṇyo yadā gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmṛjya piṇḍapātaṃ praviśāmi,
K10avsata_u:11524: sa visrabdho gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmṛjya paścāc chrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśati //
K10avsata_u:11525: tasmiṃś ca samaye āyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro janapade varṣoṣitaḥ śrāvastyām abhyāgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:11526: tataḥ śāstur gauravajāto gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmārṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11528: tenocyate: sthavira udare mama prahāro dattaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11532: yadāhaṃ gandhakuṭīṃ na saṃmārjitavāṃs tadā piṇḍapātaṃ nāsādayāmīti /
K10avsata_u:11539: yadā gṛhapater gṛhasamīpaṃ gatas tadā lekuñcikasya karmavipākena tasmin gṛhe mahān kalahaḥ samutpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11542: tataḥ pratinivṛtya vihāraṃ gatvā bhaktacchedam akarot* /
K10avsata_u:11546: mamālpapuṇyatayā yādṛśas tatra kalaho jāta iti /
K10avsata_u:11547: tataḥ sthaviraśāriputreṇānyatra divase taṃ puraskṛtya tad gṛhaṃ praveśitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11548: saṃghamadhye copaviṣṭasya sataḥ pradakṣiṇaś cāhāro dīyate /
K10avsata_u:11553: tena hi tvam ihaiva jetavane tiṣṭha,
K10avsata_u:11559: caturthe divase sthavirānandenāsthāṃ kṛtvā piṇḍapāto dattaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11563: pañcame divase sthaviramaudgalyāyanena śrutvā lekuñcikasyāthāya piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā ṛddhyā saṃprasthitam* /
K10avsata_u:11564: lekuñcikasya karmavipākena suparṇinā pakṣirājena pakṣaiḥ parāhatya mahāsamudre pātitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11568: yanv ahaṃ lekuñcikasya piṇḍapātaṃ lekuñcikasya kuṭikādvāre 'vasthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11569: tato lekuñcikasya karmavipākena tad api dvāraṃ śilābhir āvṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:11570: tataḥ śāriputreṇa ṛddhyā mokṣyāmīti tat pātraṃ pṛthivyāṃ sthāpitam* /
K10avsata_u:11573: tato 'pi sthaviraśāriputreṇa ṛddhyā samuddhṛtya tat piṇḍakaṃ mukhadvāraśleṣite piṇḍapāte tasya karmāvaraṇena tan mukham ekadhanaṃ saṃvṛttam*
K10avsata_u:11574: tata āyuṣmāñ chāriputro lekuñcikasyābhavyatāṃ jñātvā saṃvignaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11575: tena ca bhadantena ṣaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ //
K10avsata_u:11576: tataḥ saptame divase āyuṣmāl lekuñcikaḥ satvānām udvejanārthaṃ karmaṇāṃ cāvipraṇaśasaṃdarśanārthaṃ
K10avsata_u:11577: karmabalodbhāvanārthaṃ ca bhasmanā pātraṃ pūrayitvā buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya
K10avsata_u:11578: purastān niṣadya udakenāloḍya pītvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11579: tam abhivīkṣya bhikṣavaḥ saṃvignāḥ tasya śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:11581: yenārhatvaprāpto 'pi ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kṛtvā saptame divase nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛta iti /
K10avsata_u:11583: lekuñcikenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:11586: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:11590: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:11592: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_94.1 //
K10avsata_u:11593: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamā gṛhapatipatnī śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā /
K10avsata_u:11596: yāvad asyāḥ putraḥ svagṛhe svāmī saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11597: sa ca matsarī kuṭukuñcakaḥ āgṛhītapariṣkāraḥ kākāya baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati /
K10avsata_u:11599: tasya mātā tenaiva pūrvakrameṇa śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānapradānāny anuprayacchati /
K10avsata_u:11604: putraka iha kule eṣa kuladharma iti /
K10avsata_u:11609: tatas tena mātsaryābhibhūtena krodhenāvṛtabuddhinā bhūyo nivāryata eva /
K10avsata_u:11615: tatas tena dvāraṃ baddhvā ekaṃ bhaktacchedaṃ kāritā /
K10avsata_u:11620: yāvat tenāsau kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptā sakaruṇakaruṇaṃ vikrośamānā ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kāritā,
K10avsata_u:11625: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatiputraḥ,
K10avsata_u:11627: yad anena mātur apakāraḥ kṛtas tasya karmaṇo vipākena kalpam avīcau mahānaraka utpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11628: tenaiva hetunā idānīm apy arhatvaprāptaḥ ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kṛtvā bhasmād anāhāra eva parinirvṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11629: anyāny api bhikṣavo lekuñcikena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
K10avsata_u:11630: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo brāhmaṇo devatārcikaḥ
K10avsata_u:11631: sarveṣāṃ vārāṇaseyānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'bhimataś ca sarvajanasya /
K10avsata_u:11632: dharmatā caiṣā yad asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
K10avsata_u:11633: yāvad anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho vārāṇasīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11634: sa ca tatra pūrṇahastaḥ pūrṇapātro nirgacchati /
K10avsata_u:11638: asamanvāhṛtya ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartata iti /
K10avsata_u:11642: na ca tasya brāhmaṇasya vipratisāro jātaḥ //
K10avsata_u:11648: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11651: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:11655: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // * ******************************************************
K10avsata_u:11657: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:11658: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:11663: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:11665: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:11666: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:11667: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:11669: sa jātamātra eva gṛham avalokya vācaṃ niścārayati sma:
K10avsata_u:11673: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:11676: yasmād ayaṃ jātamātra eva saṃsāra iti ghoṣayati,
K10avsata_u:11677: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya saṃsāra iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:11678: saṃsāro dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:11679: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:11681: yadā saṃsāro dārakaḥ krameṇa mahān saṃvṛttaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11682: sa prakṛtijātismaratvāc ca janakāyasya dharmaṃ deśayati:
K10avsata_u:11683: mā bhavanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu vā kharavācaṃ niścārayata /
K10avsata_u:11685: yāvad apareṇa samayena itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramañ jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:11686: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:11690: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:11692: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāro dārakaḥ saṃsāre doṣadarśī bhūtvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11693: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:11696: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11697: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11699: mā āyuṣmanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu {vā} kharavācaṃ niścārayata /
K10avsata_u:11702: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:11704: yena pañca janmaśatāni mṛtakuṇapa eva mātuḥ kukṣer nirgataḥ / pravrajya
K10avsata_u:11708: saṃsāreṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:11711: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:11715: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:11717: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_95.1 //
K10avsata_u:11718: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi
K10avsata_u:11719: prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
K10avsata_u:11720: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:11721: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:11722: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhīputraḥ sthavirasakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11731: dvir api trir api taruṇabhikṣuṇā sthavira utthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:11733: dvir api trir api sthavira āha:
K10avsata_u:11736: tatas tena taruṇabhikṣuṇā rasagṛdhreṇa kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam:
K10avsata_u:11737: mā tvaṃ pañcabhir api janmaśatair jīvaḥ kośān nirgaccha,
K10avsata_u:11740: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena taruṇabhikṣuḥ,
K10avsata_u:11742: yad anenārhato 'ntike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*,
K10avsata_u:11743: tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañca janmaśatāni mṛtakuṇapa eva mātuḥ kukṣer nirgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:11744: nirgateṣu pañcasu janmaśateṣu idānīm anena manuṣyatvam āsāditam* /
K10avsata_u:11751: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11754: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:11758: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:11761: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:11762: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:11766: yadā bhagavatā stavakarṇikanimantritena saupārake nagare mahājanavineyākarṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
K10avsata_u:11767: tadā sarvaḥ saupārakanivāsī janakāyo buddhanimno dharmapravaṇaḥ saṃghaprāgbhāro vyavasthitaḥ //
K10avsata_u:11768: saupārake nagare 'nyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:11770: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:11771: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:11772: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:11773: dārako jātaḥ jātamātrasya sarvaśarīraṃ piṭakaiḥ sphuṭaṃ saṃvṛttam* /
K10avsata_u:11776: pūyaśoṇitaṃ cāsya śarīrāt pragharan mahaddaurgandhaṃ janayati /
K10avsata_u:11777: tato 'sya pitā aiśvaryabalādhānena dravyamantrauṣadhiparicārakasametaḥ svayam evārabdhaś cikitsāṃ kartum*,
K10avsata_u:11778: na cāsau vyādhir upaśamaṃ gacchati karmabalādhānaprāptatvāt* /
K10avsata_u:11779: sa svaśarīraṃ tathā vikṣatam apatrāpya parigṛhītaṃ vastrair gopāyati /
K10avsata_u:11781: yāvad guptiko dārako mahān saṃvṛttas tasya vayasyakāḥ sahajātakāḥ śrāvastyāḥ saupārakanagaram anuprāptāḥ /
K10avsata_u:11785: yasmāt tatra santi vaidyabhaiṣajādayaḥ sulabhā iti //
K10avsata_u:11786: tataḥ pitrā tad vacanam upaśrutya prabhūtāni ratnāni paricārakāṃś ca datvā śrāvastīm anupreṣitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11788: tatrāpy asya karmajo vyādhiḥ saty api vaidyadravyauṣadhiparicārakabāhulye na śakyate cikitsitum* /
K10avsata_u:11789: yāvad asāv apareṇa samayena jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ /
K10avsata_u:11790: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
K10avsata_u:11794: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:11795: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā pañcopādānaskandhā rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataś ca deśitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:11797: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
K10avsata_u:11799: sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:11800: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11801: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11802: te 'py asya sahajātakās tenaiva saṃvegena pravrajitāḥ //
K10avsata_u:11809: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣmantaḥ pralopadharma /
K10avsata_u:11814: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tan na vā, duḥkham*?
K10avsata_u:11817: satyam api tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan mama,
K10avsata_u:11822: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā?
K10avsata_u:11827: api tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacchet*: etan mama,
K10avsata_u:11831: tasmāt tarhi āyuṣmanto yat kiṃcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā,
K10avsata_u:11836: naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam* /
K10avsata_u:11837: yā kācid vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yat kiṃcid vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ
K10avsata_u:11842: naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam* /
K10avsata_u:11843: evaṃdarśī āyuṣmantaḥ śrutavān āryaśrāvako rūpād api nirvidyate,
K10avsata_u:11851: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe teṣāṃ sahajātakānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* /
K10avsata_u:11852: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:11854: yenāsya śārīram evaṃ bībhatsavyādhibahulaṃ durgandhaṃ saṃvṛttam* /
K10avsata_u:11855: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena tīkṣṇaniśitabuddhiḥ saṃvṛttaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11858: guptikenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:11862: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:11866: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:11868: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_96.1 //
K10avsata_u:11869: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī /
K10avsata_u:11871: tatas tena rājā prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ datvā vijñāpitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:11876: tato rudhirāvasiktaśarīrasya prabhūtaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca viṣacūrṇaṃ datvoptam*,
K10avsata_u:11877: yenāsya tac charīram ekadhanaṃ māṃsapiṇḍavad avasthitam* /
K10avsata_u:11880: tatas taiḥ sametair bhūtvā {upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ} yair upakaraṇaviśeṣais tasmād vyādheḥ parimocitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11881: tato 'sau tenaiva ca saṃvegena gṛhān niṣkramya pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11882: tena anācāryakeṇa saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayitvā pratyekā bodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā /
K10avsata_u:11884: bahv anena śreṣṭhinā matsaṃtāpād apuṇyaṃ prasūtam* /
K10avsata_u:11885: yanv aham enaṃ gatvā saṃvejayeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:11886: tatas tasyāgrato gatvā upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11888: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ vijñāpayati: avatara,
K10avsata_u:11893: tenāsau pratyekabuddhaḥ kṣamāpayitvā piṇḍakena pratipādya paṭenācchāditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11901: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhī āsīt*,
K10avsata_u:11903: tasya karmaṇaḥ prabhāvāt pañca janmaśatāni kaśābhis tāḍyamānaḥ kālaṃ kṛtavān* /
K10avsata_u:11904: tenaiva hetunā ayam evaṃvidhaṃ āśraya āsāditaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11905: bhūyaḥ kāśyape bhagavati sahajātakair vayasyakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pravrajita āsīt*/
K10avsata_u:11908: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:11911: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:11915: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:11918: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:11919: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:11923: anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:11925: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:11926: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:11927: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:11930: durvarṇo durdarśano 'ṣṭādaśabhir doṣavarṇakaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa dārako bhūtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11931: tasya mātāpitarau sarvāṅgaṃ durvarṇaṃ durdarśanaṃ vikṛtarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā cintāparau vyvasthitau /
K10avsata_u:11932: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyvasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:11936: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya virūpa iti nāma //
K10avsata_u:11937: ydā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā tasya lajjayā mahān saṃkoco jātaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11942: sa bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā jehrīyamāṇa itaś cāmutaś ca palāyitum ārabdhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11943: tato bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathādhiṣṭhito yan na śaknoti palāyitum* /
K10avsata_u:11944: tato bhagavān saha śrāvakair nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11945: tato nirodhād vyutthāya virūpam ātmānaṃ nirmitavān* /
K10avsata_u:11946: nirmāya śarāvaṃ bhojanapūrṇam ādāya virūpam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣajāta āmantritavān*:
K10avsata_u:11954: tato virūpo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
K10avsata_u:11964: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:11969: virūpeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:11973: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:11977: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:11979: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_97.1 //
K10avsata_u:11980: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani puṣyo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
K10avsata_u:11983: paśyati tasmin kāle dvau bodhisatvau saṃnikṛṣṭau:
K10avsata_u:11989: atha puṣyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śākyamuner bodhisatvasya saṃtatiparipācanārthaṃ himavantaṃ parvatam abhiruhya ratnaguhāṃ praviśa paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā tejodhātuṃ samāpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11990: tasmiṃś ca kāle śākyamunir bodhisatvaḥ phalamūlānām arthe himavantaṃ parvatam abhirūḍhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:11991: sa itas tataś cañcūryamāṇo dadarśa puṣyaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃṣatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
K10avsata_u:11992: samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ
K10avsata_u:11995: yad ekapādena sapta rātriṃdivāni ekayā gāthayā stutavān*:
K10avsata_u:11996: na divi bhuvi vā nāsmiṃl loke na vaiśravaṇālaye
K10avsata_u:11997: na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā /
K10avsata_u:11999: puruṣavṛṣabhāsty anyas tulyo mahāśramaṇas tava // AVŚ_97.2 //
K10avsata_u:12000: atha puṣyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ paripakvasaṃtatiṃ śākyamuniṃ bodhisatvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhukāram adāt*:
K10avsata_u:12003: nava kalpāḥ parāvṛttāḥ saṃstutyādya tathāgatam* // AVŚ_97.3 //
K10avsata_u:12004: tato bhagavān maheśākhyābhir devatābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ sthitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12005: tatra guhānivāsinī devatā alpeśākhyatvān na śaknoti tāṃ guhāṃ samabhiroḍhum* /
K10avsata_u:12007: yadā suciram api bhīṣayamāṇā na śaknoti bhagavato 'pakāraṃ kartum*,
K10avsata_u:12010: tataḥ sā udāraṃ rūpam abhinirmāya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayitvā piṇḍakena pratipāditavatī //
K10avsata_u:12013: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena guhānivāsinī devatā babhūva,
K10avsata_u:12015: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
K10avsata_u:12016: idānīm api tenaiva hetunā virūpaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12020: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:12023: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:12027: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:12029: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:12030: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:12033: vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10avsata_u:12034: vārāṇasyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
K10avsata_u:12036: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:12037: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
K10avsata_u:12038: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
K10avsata_u:12041: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:12044: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
K10avsata_u:12046: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
K10avsata_u:12047: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
K10avsata_u:12049: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12050: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K10avsata_u:12055: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
K10avsata_u:12057: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12058: pañcāveṇikā dharmā ekatye paṇḍitajātīye mātṛgrāme / katame
K10avsata_u:12060: pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti viraktaṃ {puruṣaṃ} jānāti /
K10avsata_u:12072: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
K10avsata_u:12083: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā mama nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate:
K10avsata_u:12084: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
K10avsata_u:12085: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvā upariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati,
K10avsata_u:12086: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
K10avsata_u:12088: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharāṃ bhūmim* /
K10avsata_u:12089: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
K10avsata_u:12090: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:12092: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā gaṅgika iti nāma kṛtam* /
K10avsata_u:12093: gaṅgiko dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:12094: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:12096: sa ca nirbhedabhāgīyaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhāvāse nābhiramate /
K10avsata_u:12100: tato 'sya mātāpitarāv ekaputraka iti kṛtvā nānujānītaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12105: ko me upāyo bhaved yad ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane pravrajeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:12107: yanv ahaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā ātmānamātmanā jīvitād vyaparopayeyam*,
K10avsata_u:12108: yathā manuṣyātvam āsādya laghu laghv eva pravrajeyam iti /
K10avsata_u:12116: kaḥ upāyaḥ syād yena kālaṃ kuryām iti /
K10avsata_u:12118: sarvathāyaṃ rājā ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ sāhasikaś ca /
K10avsata_u:12119: yanv aham asya gṛhe rātrau saṃdhiṃ chindyām iti /
K10avsata_u:12120: sa rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā rātrau saṃprāptāyāṃ bhagne cakṣuṣpathe saṃdhim ārabdhaś chettum* /
K10avsata_u:12121: tato rakṣibhir jīvagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'jātaśatror upanītaḥ:
K10avsata_u:12125: tato rājñā aparādhika iti kṛtvā vadhya utsṛṣṭaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12127: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu śrāvaṇāmukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa niṣkāsya
K10avsata_u:12131: mā kadācid rājñaś cittasyānyathātvaṃ syād iti /
K10avsata_u:12132: tato vyadhyaghātair eṣā pravṛttī rājño niveditā /
K10avsata_u:12134: ko hetur yat tvam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktum icchasīti /
K10avsata_u:12135: tena sa vṛttānto vistareṇa rājñe samākhyātaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12136: tato rājā ajātaśatruḥ kadambapuṣpavad āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho rudan mukha udānam udānayati:
K10avsata_u:12140: yatra nāmāyaṃ pravrajyāhetor idam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktuṃ vyavasitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12145: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:12148: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12149: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:12151: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ śraddhāpravrajitānāṃ yaduta gaṅgiko vārāṇaseyaḥ śreṣṭhiputra iti //
K10avsata_u:12152: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:12160: gaṅgikenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:12163: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:12167: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:12169: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_98.1 //
K10avsata_u:12170: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śmaśānamoṣako mātaṅgaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12171: yāvat tena pāthān hatvā bhāṇḍam āsāditam* /
K10avsata_u:12173: yāvad anyatamasmin śmaśāne pratyekabudho nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12176: mātaṅgas tasya purastād bhāṇḍam apasṛjya tatraiva nilīnaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12177: tats te taskarāḥ pratyekabuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā asyārabdhāḥ kṣeptuṃ śastram agniṃ ca /
K10avsata_u:12178: na cāsya cīvarakarṇakam api śaknuvanti cālayitum*,
K10avsata_u:12182: tatas tena śmaśānamoṣakeṇa mātaṅgena taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
K10avsata_u:12183: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
K10avsata_u:12185: evam aham api yatra yatra jāyeya,
K10avsata_u:12187: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:12189: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śmaśānamoṣako mātaṅgaḥ,
K10avsata_u:12194: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:12197: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:12201: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* // *******************************************************
K10avsata_u:12204: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:12205: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:12209: tena khalu samayena nāladagrāmake tiṣyo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12210: tena śārī nāma dārikā māṭharasakāśāl labdhā /
K10avsata_u:12212: tadā bhrātrā saha dīrghanakhena vivādaṃ kurvantī nigrahasthānaṃ prāpayati / /
K10avsata_u:12213: tato dīrghanakhena dakṣiṇāpathaṃ gatvā bahūni śāstrāṇy adhītāni /
K10avsata_u:12225: tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
K10avsata_u:12226: śāriputro 'pi bhagavataḥ purastāt sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavanataṃ vījayan* /
K10avsata_u:12227: atha dadarśa dīrghanakhaparivrājako bhagavantam ardhacandrākāreṇopaviṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam*,
K10avsata_u:12229: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:12230: sarvaṃ me bho gautama na kṣamata iti /
K10avsata_u:12232: eṣāpi te agnivaiśyāyana dṛṣṭir na kṣamate,
K10avsata_u:12235: eṣāpi me bho gautama dṛṣṭir na kṣamate,
K10avsata_u:12238: api tu te agnivaiśyāyana evaṃ jānato 'yāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ;
K10avsata_u:12239: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ?
K10avsata_u:12240: api me bho gautama evaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyato 'syāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12248: punar aparam ihaika evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati evaṃvādī:
K10avsata_u:12250: punar aparam eka evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati evaṃvādī:
K10avsata_u:12253: tatrāgnivaiśyāyana yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me kṣamata iti,
K10avsata_u:12263: iyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate na saṃrāgāya,
K10avsata_u:12275: tat saṃrāgāya saṃdveṣāya saṃmohāya saṃyogāya saṃkleśāya,
K10avsata_u:12289: dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ syād vivādaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12293: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti /
K10avsata_u:12296: iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann
K10avsata_u:12300: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ,
K10avsata_u:12301: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ //
K10avsata_u:12310: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti /
K10avsata_u:12313: iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati,
K10avsata_u:12315: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12316: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ //
K10avsata_u:12325: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamate iti /
K10avsata_u:12328: iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati,
K10avsata_u:12330: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12331: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ //)
K10avsata_u:12344: iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati,
K10avsata_u:12346: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12347: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ //
K10avsata_u:12348: ayaṃ khalv agnivaiśyāyana kāyo rūpī audārikaś cāturmahābhūtika iti āryaśrāvakeṇa abhīkṣṇam udayavyayānudarśinā vihartavyam*,
K10avsata_u:12351: yo 'sya bhavati kāye kāyacchandaḥ kāyasnehaḥ kāyapremā kāyālayaḥ kāyaviṣaktiḥ kāyādhyavasānam*,
K10avsata_u:12352: tac cāsya cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati //
K10avsata_u:12356: yasmin samaye śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
K10avsata_u:12357: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ:
K10avsata_u:12359: sukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
K10avsata_u:12361: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
K10avsata_u:12362: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ,
K10avsata_u:12364: duḥkhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
K10avsata_u:12366: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
K10avsata_u:12367: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ,
K10avsata_u:12369: aduḥkhāsukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
K10avsata_u:12372: imā vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhāvā iti?
K10avsata_u:12373: imā vedanā sparśanidānāḥ sparśasamudayāḥ sparśajātīyāḥ sparśaprabhāvāḥ /
K10avsata_u:12374: tasya sparśasya samudayāt tās tā vedanāḥ samudayante
K10avsata_u:12376: tasya sparśasya nirodhāt tās tā vedanā nirudhyante,
K10avsata_u:12378: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate sukhāṃ vā duḥkhāṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhā vā,
K10avsata_u:12379: tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmīti,
K10avsata_u:12380: tasya vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānata utpannāsu vedanāsv anityatānudarśī viharati,
K10avsata_u:12382: sa kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10avsata_u:12383: jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamāno jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K10avsata_u:12384: bhedāc ca kāyasyorddhvaṃ jīvitaparyādānād ihaivāsya sarvāṇi vedanāni apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante apariśeṣam astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti
K10avsata_u:12386: sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
K10avsata_u:12389: aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
K10avsata_u:12394: duḥkhām api aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayate,
K10avsata_u:12401: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmāñ śāriputro 'rdhamāsopasaṃpanno bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ vījayan* /
K10avsata_u:12403: bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam eva varṇayati,
K10avsata_u:12404: virāgam eva nirodham eva pratiniḥsargam eva varṇayati /
K10avsata_u:12405: yanv ahaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇānudarśī vihareyam*,
K10avsata_u:12408: āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaiṣāṃ dharmāṇām anityatānudarśino viharato vyayānudarśino virāgānudarśino
K10avsata_u:12409: nirodhānudarśinaḥ pratiniḥsargānudarśino viharataḥ anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam* /
K10avsata_u:12410: dīrghanakhasya ca parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* //
K10avsata_u:12411: atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane
K10avsata_u:12413: dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat /
K10avsata_u:12414: lābheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K10avsata_u:12416: labdhavān dīrghanakhaparivrājakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
K10avsata_u:12417: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* /
K10avsata_u:12418: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
K10avsata_u:12421: dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā pratipadya pravedayate:
K10avsata_u:12424: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
K10avsata_u:12425: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12427: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisaṃvitprāptānāṃ yaduta koṣṭhilo bhikṣur iti //
K10avsata_u:12428: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K10avsata_u:12429: kāni bhadanta mahākoṣṭhilena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
K10avsata_u:12433: koṣṭhilenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K10avsata_u:12436: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:12440: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:12442: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_99.1 //
K10avsata_u:12443: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ pañcamātrāṇi taskaraśatāni senāpatipramukhāṇi cauryeṇa saṃprasthitāni /
K10avsata_u:12444: yāvat te cañcūryamāṇā anyatamaṃ khadiravaṇam anuprāptāḥ /
K10avsata_u:12446: paśyata yūyaṃ kamalāyatākṣaḥ kaścid aparakīyo manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
K10avsata_u:12449: tatas tais taskaraiḥ paryaṭadbhir dṛṣṭvā senāpatisakāśaṃ nītaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12450: tataś caurasenāpatinā vadhyatām ayam ity ājñā dattā /
K10avsata_u:12451: tato 'sau pratyekabuddhas teṣām anugrahārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ khagapatham abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ
K10avsata_u:12452: tataḥ senāpatir mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya atyayaṃ deśitavān* /
K10avsata_u:12454: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
K10avsata_u:12455: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti //
K10avsata_u:12457: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena caurasenāpatiḥ,
K10avsata_u:12462: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:12465: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:12469: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
K10avsata_u:12472: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ
K10avsata_u:12473: śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair
K10avsata_u:12477: atha bhagavāṃs tad eva parinirvāṇakālasamaye āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
K10avsata_u:12478: prajñāpaya ānanda tathāgatasya āntareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcam* /
K10avsata_u:12479: adya tathāgatasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K10avsata_u:12480: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K10avsata_u:12481: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt* /
K10avsata_u:12482: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K10avsata_u:12483: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12485: upasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pādaṃ pādenopadhāya ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvann iti //
K10avsata_u:12486: tatra bhagavān rātryā madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12487: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt* ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ /
K10avsata_u:12489: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati ubhau yamakaśālavanasya drumottamau tathāgatasya siṃhaśayyāṃ śālapuṣpair avākiratām* /
K10avsata_u:12490: samanantaraparinirvṛte bhagavati anyataro bhikṣus tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:12492: yad avākiratāṃ puṣpaiḥ śāstāraṃ parinirvṛtam* // AVŚ_100.1 //
K10avsata_u:12493: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati śakro devendro gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:12495: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukham* // AVŚ_100.2 // iti
K10avsata_u:12496: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati brahmā sahāṃpatir gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:12500: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān āniruddho gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:12502: ānijyāṃ śāntim āgamya cakṣumān parinirvṛtaḥ // AVŚ_100.4 //
K10avsata_u:12507: pradyotasy eva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣas tasya cetasaḥ // AVŚ_100.6 // iti //
K10avsata_u:12508: saptāhaparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataś citāṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvan* gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K10avsata_u:12509: yena kāyaratanena nāyako brahmalokam agaman maharddhikaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12510: dahyate sma tanujena tejasā pañcabhir yugaśataiḥ sa veṣṭitaḥ (Speyer: veṣṭhitaḥ) // AVŚ_100.7 //
K10avsata_u:12511: sahasramātreṇa hi cīvarāṇāṃ buddhasya kāyaḥ pariveṣṭito 'bhūt* /
K10avsata_u:12513: dve cīvare tatra tu naiva dagdhe abhyantaraṃ bāhyam atha dvitīyam* // AVŚ_100.8 //
K10avsata_u:12514: varṣaśataparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati pāṭaliputre nagare rājā aśoko rājyaṃ kārayati
K10avsata_u:12515: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
K10avsata_u:12518: yāvad apareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10avsata_u:12519: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K10avsata_u:12520: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
K10avsata_u:12521: dārako jāto abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ kuṇālasadṛśābhyāṃ netrābhyām* /
K10avsata_u:12522: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
K10avsata_u:12526: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kuṇāla iti nāmeti /
K10avsata_u:12527: kuṇālo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
K10avsata_u:12528: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
K10avsata_u:12530: tatas taṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ rājā utsaṅgena kṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ prekṣya rūpasaṃpadā praharṣita uvāca:
K10avsata_u:12532: tatra ca samaye gāndhāre puṣpabherotso nāma grāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12533: tatrānyatamasya gṛhapateḥ putro jāto 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
K10avsata_u:12537: puṣpasaṃpannaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca /
K10avsata_u:12538: yatra yatra kumāro gacchati tatra tatra ca puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
K10avsata_u:12541: tato 'pareṇa samayena puṣpabherotsād vaṇijaḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena pāṭaliputraṃ gatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:12542: te prābhṛtam ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upagatāḥ /
K10avsata_u:12543: tataḥ pādayor nipatya prābhṛtaṃ rājñe upanamayya purastād vyavasthitāḥ /
K10avsata_u:12544: tato rājā aśokas teṣāṃ kuṇālaṃ darśayati:
K10avsata_u:12546: kadācit kutracid bhavadbhiḥ paryaṭadbhir evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaviśeṣayuktaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvam iti ?
K10avsata_u:12547: tatas te vaṇijaḥ kṛtakarapuṭāḥ pādayor nipatya abhayaṃ mārgayitvā rājānam ūcuḥ:
K10avsata_u:12548: asti deva asmadīye viṣaye sundaro nāma kumāro 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
K10avsata_u:12549: janmani cāsya divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
K10avsata_u:12551: yatra yatra ca kumāro gacchati tatra tatra puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
K10avsata_u:12552: śrutvā rājā aśokaḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12554: eṣa rājā aśoka āgantum icchati sundarasya kumārasya darśanahetoḥ /
K10avsata_u:12555: yad vaḥ kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kurudhvam iti /
K10avsata_u:12559: tataḥ sa kumāro bhadrayānaṃ yojayitvā śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ prābhṛtasyārthe datvā aśokasya sakāśaṃ preṣitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12561: śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'śokasya sakāśam anuprāptaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12562: rājā aśokaś ca sahadarśanāt sundarasya kumārasya rūpaṃ śobhāṃ varṇapuṣkalatāṃ ca divyāṃ puṣkariṇīm udyānaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ
K10avsata_u:12563: tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviropaguptasya vismayajananārthaṃ sundaraṃ ca kumāram ādāya kukkuṭāgāraṃ gataḥ /
K10avsata_u:12566: tataḥ sa sthavirasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10avsata_u:12568: tataḥ kumāraḥ paripakvasaṃtatir dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12569: sa rājānam aśokam anujñāpya sthaviropaguptasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12570: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
K10avsata_u:12573: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12574: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ //
K10avsata_u:12575: tato rājā aśokaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ sthaviraṃ pṛcchati:
K10avsata_u:12578: kāni punaḥ karmāṇi yena divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
K10avsata_u:12583: mahārāja pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
K10avsata_u:12586: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K10avsata_u:12590: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
K10avsata_u:12592: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* // AVŚ_100.1 //
K10avsata_u:12594: tadā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ pañcaśataparivāro magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran dharmasaṃgītiṃ kartukāmaḥ /
K10avsata_u:12595: yāvad anyatamena daridrakarṣakeṇa mahān bhikṣusaṃgho dṛṣṭaḥ,
K10avsata_u:12598: tatas tena kāśyapapramukhāṇi pañca bhikṣuśatāni jentākasnātreṇopanimantritāni /
K10avsata_u:12599: tatas tena nānāgandhaparibhāvitam uṣṇodakaṃ kṛtvā te bhikṣavaḥ snāpitāḥ,
K10avsata_u:12601: praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpya śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni datvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
K10avsata_u:12602: asminn eva śākyamuneḥ pravacane pravrajya cārhatvaṃ prāpnuyām iti //
K10avsata_u:12603: kiṃ manyase mahārāja yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena daridrakarṣakaḥ,
K10avsata_u:12607: divyacandanodakaparipūrṇā ramaṇīyā puṣkariṇī puṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ prāptam* /
K10avsata_u:12610: iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K10avsata_u:12613: tasmāt tarhi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K10avsata_u:12616: atha rāhā aśoka āyuṣmataḥ sthaviropaguptasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
